title: Scrum Master - Advanced English - Remote
description:
About HCLTech

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.

To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit

Scrum Master will support the teams continuous progress by ensuring each person is working on the right tasks, helping to remove any obstacles, and protecting the team from distractions. The Scrum Master will maintain communication, transparency and visibility with sponsors, collaborators, Product Owners and others involved with the sprints.

Domain experience preferred

PMC/OTC/Supply Chain experience

Responsibilities:

Scrum Team Support Facilitate conversations that will help the team come up with their own solutions Facilitates the removal of obstacles and distractions that impede the team’s velocity. Assist team in sizing-up efforts and tracks team velocity Radiates team information to promote visibility and transparency Promotes team brainstorming to identify potential solutions Educates team and stakeholders on their Role & Responsibilities Ensure individual and team accountability Ascertains the teams needs in training, materials and support. Escalates to appropriate personnel as needed. Identifies precursors to team derailment and develops a safe environment to promote conversations address potential conflict areas to maintain the overall health of the team and its members Researches and identifies unique frameworks and methodologies that can be incorporated within the team to increase overall team hygiene and create a hyper-collaborative environment. Event Facilitation Facilitate Scrum and/or other ceremonies put in place for communication purposes - Retrospective, Sprint Planning, refinement sessions, backlog discussions, Sprint Review, Daily Stand-ups, etc. Product Owner Partnership Support and educate the Product Owner, especially with respect to grooming and maintaining the product backlog. Ensure everyone on the team understands the project’s goals and scope. Other job duties and projects as assigned.

Skills and qualifications

Proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), Visio

TBD Agile Software First level Scrum Master certification (CSM, PSM I) required Experience leading projects and/or agile teams required Strong knowledge of SCRUM theory, rules and practices Knowledge of Agile techniques such as: User Stories, Continuous Integration, Quality checks Knowledge about task estimation and tracking such as burndown metrics, velocities, and effective backlog management Experience with Jira or other tool for managing Sprints and User Stories Knowledge of other agile methodologies and frameworks such as Kanban Lean Six Sigma Knowledge – 5S, Waste Elimination Advanced English

Please share your resume in English

title: Key Accounts Sales Manager of Latin America
description:
Company :Sungrow Hydrogen Postion: Key Accounts Sales Manager Report line: report to SUNGROW Hydrogen Latin America Head of Marketing and Sales Location: Brasil or Chile , could travel as needed.

Company Induction: As the subsidiary of Sungrow (Stock Code: 300274), Sungrow Hydrogen Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. (hereinafter Sungrow Hydrogen) specializes in water electrolysis technology for hydrogen production. Its main products include ALK electrolyzer, PEM electrolyzer, PWM hydrogen production power supply, gas-liquid separation equipment, hydrogen purification equipment and intelligent hydrogen management system. Sungrow Hydrogen is committed to providing“efficient, intelligent, safe” flexible green hydrogen production system solutions. Sungrow Hydrogen adheres to market demand orientation, and takes technological innovation as the driving force for development. It has cultivated a professional R&D team with rich experience and strong independent innovation ability, applied for more than 480 patents and copyright certificates, participated in the drafting of a number of industrial standards, mastering core technologies of flexible green hydrogen production and offshore wind hydrogen production. The company has built a leading 20MW water electrolysis hydrogen production empirical base, a product research center, a key materials research center, a Hydrogen Research Institute in Germany, and the world's leading hydroge

Main responsibilities:

As a key member of sales organization to accomplish the revenue, margin and account receivable target set on annual basis. The candidate will need to manage key accounts and maintain long-term partnership. The candidate will work with all major utilities, owner, developer, EPC, O&M customers to drive the business. The candidate will perform in business development role for potential market segment or new market. The candidate will also need to perform the following: Help to develop product marketing strategy and establish a long-term strategic partnership with key account Have strong sales ability to close deal and achieve the sales target and KPI Periodically visit key customers，and have project order contacts with leading contractors (big scale) in Hydrogen related industry Help company to gain better brand recognition by assisting trade shows and other public functions; Collect market information, including emerging market data, industry trend, product standard and competitor’s information etc. The candidate will work closely with technical team to fulfill customers’ request and timely communicate with HQ; Other assigned tasks as required.

Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years’ sales experience and 2 years’ direct sales experience in the PV and Wind energy related business. Familary with renewable energy industry in Latin America /European and have a good understanding of business culture in this area. Having a wide network with key players in renewable energy industry is perferred. Having strong ability to build up the customer’s relationship quickly is perferred. Professional in dealing with international business. Good teamwork and strong team coordination ability. Public speaking skills is a plus Excellent communication skills and team player Self-starter and continuous learner Strong passion about hydrogen industry

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity We are looking for a Senior / Staff Engineer

BASED IN LATAM

with full-stack experience, particularly in back-end, distributed, API-based, and platform systems. Ideally, you have a solid understanding of front-end technologies, including React, and have worked in the credit reporting, financial, and/or accounting sectors. You will play a pivotal role in the future growth of our company during a critical time of transformation. You will be responsible for the

credit reporting and internal services technical systems and direction . You will closely work with various product owners and credit reporting specialists to create and own the product and business initiatives and roadmap pertaining to our credit reporting and internal services strategy. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with senior leadership, key managers, and product owners across the organization (e.g, Product, Credit Reporting Specialists, Operations, Risk Management). Your product and technical guidance along with working through and empowering others will enable new products and improve current ones in order to reach more customers and provide delightful and enriching customer experiences.

You will be working on our next generation back-end services and credit reporting engine that will enable the company to benefit millions of people . This work will allow you to own and lead the development of key features across multiple lines of business. In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach, mentor, and develop our engineers by providing professional training and direct mentorship. You will help recruit, hire, and onboard new talent into the team. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, setting expectations, prioritizing, and delegating. You will exhibit and foster the company's culture and operating principles.

Core Competencies Thoughtful and Adaptable Leadership :

As part of the engineering leadership team, you will help set the direction for all data centric initiatives. You are deliberate in your ability to clearly define the vision and approach. You are able to focus on achieving the big picture while being able to drill down into details to enable, empower, guide, and unblock your teams and individuals. Product and Business Acumen :

You demonstrate ownership and an entrepreneurial mindset. You believe that technology is a tool to be leveraged to delight customers and deliver business value. You are able to articulate the definition of a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) without sacrificing quality. You believe that perfection should not hinder progress. You have experience being a Product Owner and/or Business Owner, producing roadmaps and product/business plans. Technology :

Although there is no expectation for you to be working directly with code on a daily basis, it is expected that you are able to write, review, debug, and test code and systems. You get involved in troubleshooting, building proof of concepts, and architecting systems and features. Your experience as a technologist enables you to optimally function in engineering and data design discussions. You champion automation and look for opportunities to automate and codify manual processes. Compliance and Security :

Security considerations are always top of mind for you. You demonstrate good stewardship of data which is demonstrated in your planning and design approach. You apply compliance and governance considerations to every decision you and your team make; making sure to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. You help the company achieve compliance and security attestations. Empathetic Leader :

Your leadership style sets the tone for communication and collaboration within your teams. You invest time in regular 1:1s with your directs and peers. You provide direction and autonomy to your teams and empower them to deliver within time and budget. You coach and provide regular feedback/advice to growth and develop the individuals in your teams. You leverage radical candor, directness, and kindness when communicating with others. Balance Velocity with Long Term Goals :

You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. Your and your team’s work is of the highest quality and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization. When appropriate, you take shortcuts due to customer or business needs; documenting them and outlining fast-follows to remediate any shortcomings. You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.

Basic Qualifications Very Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience. Strong experience in the

credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry. Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers. Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery. Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java. Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS. Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores. Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures. Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps. Experience managing globally distributed teams. Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.

Above and Beyond Experience in the FinTech or PropTech areas. Experience in a startup environment. Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations. Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.

Key Technologies We Use Cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Backend: Go Frontend: Typescript, Javascript, React Mobile: Flutter Data: MongoDB, PostgreSQL

Benefits Competitive Salary for Series B startup Remote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you. Mission driven company with strong culture

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
About Ultahost Ultahost is a leader in premium web hosting services, delivering exceptional solutions to clients worldwide. Our mission is to innovate, empower, and foster a thriving technology ecosystem by attracting top technical talent.

Role Overview We are seeking an experienced

Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist

with a deep understanding of programming languages, frameworks, and IT technologies. This role involves sourcing, evaluating, and onboarding top-tier candidates specializing in

programming frameworks ,

hosting technologies , and

IT infrastructure .

Key Responsibilities

Identify, interview, and manage the hiring process for talented professionals in critical technical roles such as Full Stack, Frontend, Backend, and DevOps. Collaborate with hiring managers to define role requirements and expectations for technical positions. Source, evaluate, and shortlist candidates for positions requiring expertise in: Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, and others. Front-End Frameworks: Next.js, React.js, and Angular. Back-End Frameworks: Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, and Golang. Hosting Technologies: OpenLiteSpeed, NGINX, Apache, and Docker environments. IT Infrastructure: Networking, Linux operating systems, and cloud hosting platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Assess candidates’ technical knowledge through interviews and problem-solving exercises tailored to specific domains. Build a robust pipeline of highly skilled technical talent using modern tools and strategies. Maintain an up-to-date knowledge base of emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends. Utilize platforms like , job boards, and professional networks effectively to find and engage candidates. Coordinate interview logistics and ensure a seamless candidate experience. Collaborate with team leads to provide market insights and recommendations on hiring strategies.

Requirements Proven experience (3+ years) as a Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist or in a similar role. Strong technical understanding of programming frameworks and languages: Front-end: Next.js, React.js, Angular. Back-end: Node.js, Nest.js, Golang, Express.js. Programming: JavaScript, Python, Go. Familiarity with hosting technologies and IT infrastructure, including Linux systems, NGINX, Apache, and cloud platforms. Excellent ability to assess technical competencies through structured interviews. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with a focus on building relationships with candidates and hiring managers. Fluent in English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in using ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) and recruitment platforms. Excellent communication and interview skills.

Nice-to-Have Skills Hands-on coding or technical background in IT-related fields. Experience in hiring for hosting environments and DevOps roles. Familiarity with additional frameworks like Django, Ruby on Rails, and Flask. Understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Certifications in recruitment or technical fields.

What We Offer Competitive Salary in USD Fully remote work with a flexible schedule. Opportunities for career advancement in a fast-paced, global company. A supportive, innovation-driven work culture. Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and recruitment practices.

title: Senior Software Engineer (React)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (React) to work on a project in the data analytics sector.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation.

You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems and you will be responsible for configuring and maintaining tracking solutions for platforms like Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics (GA4), Google AdWords, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Data Management Platforms (DMPs) like LiveRamp, and CDPs like Segment Twilio, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

We are looking for someone with good communication skills, ideally with experience making decisions, being proactive, used to building software from scratch, and with good attention to detail.

What you will do:

Implement and manage third-party marketing and analytics tags/pixels across web and mobile platforms. Integrate and configure CDPs (Segment Twilio, Amperity, Tealium AudienceStream) and align data collection strategies with business goals. Collaborate with marketing, analytics, product, and engineering teams to define tracking requirements and ensure seamless data flow across systems. Draft business requirements documents (BRDs), solution design references (SDRs), and technical implementation guides for tagging and data capture. Develop and maintain data layers to ensure structured and scalable event tracking. Perform QA and troubleshoot tagging issues, ensuring data accuracy through debugging tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and network request monitoring. Ensure privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA) in data collection and align tracking with first-party data strategies and server-side tagging. Collaborate on CDP audience segmentation and activation and enhance attribution capabilities across digital channels.

What you will bring:

Front-end developer with proficiency in JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS with an emphasis on event-based tracking and tag implementation. Ability to draft BRDs, SDRs, and technical documentation for data tracking implementations. Understanding of cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, first-party cookies, and server-side tagging. Knowledge of data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and their impact on data collection and marketing strategies. Excellent troubleshooting and debugging skills using tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and Tag Assistant.

Nice to have:

Hands-on experience with Tag Management Solutions (TMS) like Google Tag Manager (GTM), Adobe Launch, and Tealium iQ. Experience working with 3rd party event tracking, such as Web Analytics (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics / GA4) and Paid Media (e.g. Google AdWords, Meta Pixels, and DMPs (LiveRamp). Familiarity with Customer Data Platforms (CDPs) like Segment Twilio, Adobe Launch, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth: We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

title: Senior Software Engineering, Full-Stack
description:
About the job About Freight Hero

The US freight brokerage industry has experienced rapid growth over the past decade, expanding from 6% to over 20% market share and reaching a current value of $21 billion. However, this growth has been accompanied by a decline in profit margins from 20% to 5%. Operational back-office tasks now consume up to 90% of freight brokers' time, highlighting a key area for improvement and innovation.

Freight Hero, in partnership with AI Fund and Dynamo Ventures, is transforming the freight brokerage and supply chain sectors. Through AI-driven solutions and human oversight, the company streamlines back-office processes and increases operational efficiency.

About Our Two Powerhouse Investors AI Fund:

Founded by Dr. Andrew Ng, AI Fund is a venture studio that supports AI startups, focusing on the transformative power of AI to enhance business processes. Dynamo Ventures:

Dynamo Ventures is a venture capital fund focused on the Supply Chain and Mobility spaces.

By combining AI Fund's technical expertise with Dynamo's industry-specific insights and connections, as well as an experienced exited founder in the supply chain tech space, Freight Hero is well positioned to dominate the AI space for freight brokerage.

About the Role Want to use your front-end skills to make an impact? AI is the new electricity. We're seeking a self-motivated Senior Full Stack Developer who is comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries. You will play a key role in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, focused on iterative development and ensuring our products are safe and reliable. You will have a passion for building beautiful user-centric products and solutions, and work closely with the CEO to design and develop a proprietary AI-powered platform that revolutionizes freight brokerage operations by automating and optimizing back-office processes, improving efficiency and scalability.

Responsibilities 4+ years of experience building and shipping full-stack solutions. Ability to maintain high-quality, scalable code and write clear documentation. Experience in developing and evaluating user interfaces for cloud platforms. Proven ability to design and develop internal tools to enhance team speed. Self-driven and able to solve complex problems. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.

Key Skills Front-end proficiency (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js). Database expertise (SQL, NoSQL, in-memory cache). Familiarity with Test-Driven Development. Excellent English communication skills. Self-starter with a willingness to take ownership of tasks.

Bonus Capable of converting pixel-perfect designs into responsive front-ends. Experience building AI-powered products. A sharp eye for design. Familiarity with the Vercel platform. Experience with the Python ecosystem.

Tech Stack Frontend:

TypeScript, React, Tailwind, Next.js, and shadcn/UI or Radix UI Backend:

Python, Node.js (collaboration with backend team) Cloud:

AWS Design:

Figma

Why Join Us Be part of a world-class team of subject matter experts from various fields (marketing, operations, product, etc.) trying to change the Freight Industry. Work across cultural and geographical lines alongside our offices in different parts of the world. The opportunity to be exceptionally creative with your high-impact ideas.

title: Médico (a) Radiologista / Ultrassonografista - SP

title: Analista de logística Jr
description:
Quem Somos?

Venha fazer parte da transformação na Wipro Brasil!

Reconhecida como Top Employer no Brasil pela quarta vez em 2024, a Wipro é uma potência global em tecnologia com uma jornada marcada pela inovação e excelência. Somos especialistas em consultoria, design, engenharia e operações de tecnologia, ajudando nossos clientes a realizar suas ambições e construir negócios sustentáveis e prontos para o futuro.

Com mais de 240.000 colaboradores em 65 países, nosso DNA Digital e compromisso com a sustentabilidade nos coloca à frente para escrever as próximas páginas do futuro da tecnologia no Brasil. Desde 2006, temos construído este legado atendendo às necessidades dos nossos clientes com soluções futuristas em diversos setores.

Hoje, oferecemos tecnologia de ponta para mais de 1.349 clientes no mundo todo em diversos setores, como bancário, varejo, mineração, manufatura, saúde e telecomunicações. Se você tem o desejo de fazer parte de grandes projetos nacionais e internacionais e está preparado para criar impacto global, junte-se a nós na missão de construir um futuro mais brilhante e sustentável para todos!

Nossa oportunidade:

Analista de Logística Jr

Cargo & Responsabilidades: Responsável por auditar faturas de 3PL e 4PL Brasil e América Latina.

Responsabilidades: Selecionar os processos que serão auditados mensalmente; Garantir que o 3PL/4PL disponibilize toda documentação requerida dentro do prazo pré-estabelecido; Suportar todas as atividades e/ou requerimentos do Agente de Aduanas e/ou 4PL; Analisar, reportar e tratar os erros encontrados pela empresa auditora; Realizar análise da documentação aduaneira de importação e exportação, de acordo com o Regulamento Aduaneiro; Realizar análise de faturamento dos 3PLs de acordo com o BID; Solicitar informações adicionais ao 4PL caso haja necessidade ou dúvidas – através de I/Trade; Informar à área de Trade Operations o resultado de cada auditoria; Informar os dados referentes ao KPI Perfect Declaration para RDEx; Assegurar todos os prazos e processos estabelecidos pelo cliente; Participar de revisões de processos, discussões de atualizações de projetos; Recomendar melhorias nos negócios ou processos internos; Participar de reuniões de time e cliente, juntamente com o coordenador/gerente; Suportar e contribuir para os programas de qualidade da companhia; Facilitar projetos e criar documentos relativos aos processos (SOP – Standard Operational Procedures); Suporte à coordenação/gerência nos controles e relatórios diários e mensais.

Requisitos para a Função:

Qualificação Educacional: Ensino superior completo preferencialmente em: Logística, Auditoria, Administração, Gestão de Projetos ou áreas correlatas.

Conhecimentos Técnicos: Informática (Pacote Office): nível intermediário; Espanhol intermediário mandatório; Inglês desejável, não mandatório; Experiência anterior como auditor ou controller.

Por que ser um Wiproite? Na Wipro, valorizamos nossos colaboradores e oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho que promove o desenvolvimento profissional e pessoal.

Confira alguns dos benefícios de fazer parte da nossa equipe:

Vale refeição ou alimentação

Assistência médica e odontológica

Seguro de Vida

Auxílio Creche

Vale Transporte

Remuneração variável para posições de vendas

Licenças maternidade e paternidade estendidas

Ginástica laboral

Oportunidades de capacitação, certificações, programas de línguas e parcerias com escolas de idiomas e universidades

Acesso a plataformas internas de educação corporativa, como o WiLearn (com 10.000 treinamentos) e Udemy (com 40.000 treinamentos técnicos), com certificados reconhecidos mundialmente

Descontos para compras e cursos em rede de parceiros

Palestras e workshops: incentivo à saúde e bem-estar, oficinas de carreira, plano de desenvolvimento profissional e de liderança

PreferToRefer (Wiplinks): todo colaborador ganha um bônus ao indicar uma pessoa que também se torna um #Wiproite

Programa de Reconhecimento por tempo de empresa: comemoração com certificado + pontos no programa “Círculo de Vencedores”

Gostou? Não perca a oportunidade de fazer parte de uma empresa que está moldando o futuro da tecnologia. Candidate-se agora e venha construir um futuro mais brilhante e sustentável conosco!

Verifique se seus dados, como telefone e e-mail, estão atualizados. Todas as nossas posições estão disponíveis também para pessoas com deficiência.

Junte-se à Wipro e seja parte da transformação!

title: Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description:
Open Video project is focused on OTT platform development for one of the largest North American TV providers. We are looking for QA Automation Engineer to assess software quality through automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities: • Review and analyze system specifications • Execute test cases and analyze results • Create logs to document testing phases and defects • Report bugs and errors to development teams • Help troubleshoot issues • Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing • Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle • Selection or identification of test cases for automation. • Creating an automation test plan. • Automation framework design and implementation according to the project structure. • Creating, Enhancing, Debugging, and Running Test Cases. • Organizing, monitoring defect management process Handling changes and conducting regression tests. • Find solutions for issues related to object identity issues and error handling. • Interaction with the people of the client-side to solve problems and update the situation. • Conduct performance testing to verify system scalability, efficiency, and reliability. • Create a test summary report for management review. • Analyze the underlying causes of performance issues and provide corrective action. • Suggest new tools and techniques to improve test efficiency. • Help in project planning, scheduling, budget, and tracking activities. • Assist in project design, development, and deployment activities. • Develop automated test scenarios and environments for performance testing. • Review and recommend improvements in existing test procedures.

Mandatory Skills Description: • Good written/verbal communication skills. • Experience in writing test cases • Good problem-solving, and analytical abilities • Good planning, organizational, and follow-up skills. • Experience in testing Android platforms • Familiar with Git, JIRA, Bitbucket, Jenkins. • Experience with Agile Development. • Development experience with Java, Appium, Selenium, Webdriver.io. • Knowledge and use of Android Studio, Charles Proxy, ADB logcat

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: • Experience with AndroidTV is a plus

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Vendedor Externo
description:
Vendedor(a) Ambev é responsável por realizar o atendimento aos pontos de vendas para alavancar volume e desenvolvimento dos produtos através de negociação e execução das nossas marcas, garantindo um excelente nível de serviço e auxiliando no crescimento dos nossos clientes. Responsabilidades e atribuições

A rotina do cargo inclui:

Realizar visitas regulares aos clientes para negociar e promover nossos produtos. Utilizar o aplicativo de vendas para otimizar a rotina diária e impulsionar os resultados. Implementar estratégias de marca e utilizar ferramentas digitais para aumentar as vendas, introduzir novos produtos e cadastrar novos pontos de venda. Executar a aplicação de materiais de marketing nos pontos de venda. Desenvolver relacionamentos de confiança com os clientes, gerenciando situações do dia a dia com foco na solução de problemas.

Competências Desejáveis:

Organização, Planejamento e Disciplina; Foco em resultados; Digitalização : Facilidade em usar tecnologias, como aplicativos e smartphones; Adaptabilidade : Capacidade de se adapta e adequar a novas situações, mudanças e desafios Boa comunicação e influência; Desejável experiência em vendas.

Qualificações e Pré Requisitos:

Formação: Ensino Médio Completo obrigatório Possuir CNH A ou AB definitiva, com menos de 8 pontos e nenhuma multa gravíssima nos últimos 12 meses. Residir na região da Grande Florianópolis/SC (Palhoça, São José, Florianópolis, entre outras regiões).

title: Key Accounts Sales Manager of Latin America
description:
Company :Sungrow Hydrogen Postion: Key Accounts Sales Manager Report line: report to SUNGROW Hydrogen Latin America Head of Marketing and Sales Location: Brasil or Chile , could travel as needed.

Company Induction: As the subsidiary of Sungrow (Stock Code: 300274), Sungrow Hydrogen Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. (hereinafter Sungrow Hydrogen) specializes in water electrolysis technology for hydrogen production. Its main products include ALK electrolyzer, PEM electrolyzer, PWM hydrogen production power supply, gas-liquid separation equipment, hydrogen purification equipment and intelligent hydrogen management system. Sungrow Hydrogen is committed to providing“efficient, intelligent, safe” flexible green hydrogen production system solutions. Sungrow Hydrogen adheres to market demand orientation, and takes technological innovation as the driving force for development. It has cultivated a professional R&D team with rich experience and strong independent innovation ability, applied for more than 480 patents and copyright certificates, participated in the drafting of a number of industrial standards, mastering core technologies of flexible green hydrogen production and offshore wind hydrogen production. The company has built a leading 20MW water electrolysis hydrogen production empirical base, a product research center, a key materials research center, a Hydrogen Research Institute in Germany, and the world's leading hydroge

Main responsibilities:

As a key member of sales organization to accomplish the revenue, margin and account receivable target set on annual basis. The candidate will need to manage key accounts and maintain long-term partnership. The candidate will work with all major utilities, owner, developer, EPC, O&M customers to drive the business. The candidate will perform in business development role for potential market segment or new market. The candidate will also need to perform the following: Help to develop product marketing strategy and establish a long-term strategic partnership with key account Have strong sales ability to close deal and achieve the sales target and KPI Periodically visit key customers，and have project order contacts with leading contractors (big scale) in Hydrogen related industry Help company to gain better brand recognition by assisting trade shows and other public functions; Collect market information, including emerging market data, industry trend, product standard and competitor’s information etc. The candidate will work closely with technical team to fulfill customers’ request and timely communicate with HQ; Other assigned tasks as required.

Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years’ sales experience and 2 years’ direct sales experience in the PV and Wind energy related business. Familary with renewable energy industry in Latin America /European and have a good understanding of business culture in this area. Having a wide network with key players in renewable energy industry is perferred. Having strong ability to build up the customer’s relationship quickly is perferred. Professional in dealing with international business. Good teamwork and strong team coordination ability. Public speaking skills is a plus Excellent communication skills and team player Self-starter and continuous learner Strong passion about hydrogen industry

title: Desenvolvedor FrontEnd / Full Stack
description:
Estamos buscando desenvolvedores com perfil frontend / fullstack perfil pleno ou sênior, para integrar a equipe e contribuir com o desenvolvimento dos nossos produtos digitais focado em mercado financeiro e trading.

Principais atribuições: Participação no processo criativo para construção de produtos digitais; Arquitetar, analisar e desenvolver as soluções propostas; Avaliar a qualidade do trabalho entregue; Contribuir nos testes das funcionalidades entregues;

title: Engenheiro de instalações
description:
Estamos em busca de um Engenheiro de Instalações experiente para se juntar à nossa equipe. Este profissional será responsável por supervisionar e coordenar projetos/execução de instalações elétricas, cabeamento estruturado, hidráulicas, climatização, exaustão e sistema de incêndio em obras corporativas. O candidato ideal deve ter sólida experiência técnica, habilidades de gestão de equipes, e um perfil focado em resultados e cumprimento de prazos.

Principais Responsabilidades: • Gerenciar e supervisionar as instalações elétricas, cabeamento estruturado, hidráulicas, climatização, exaustão e sistema de incêndio em projetos de construção. • Elaborar, revisar e acompanhar cronogramas e planos de instalação para garantir que os prazos e padrões técnicos sejam cumpridos. • Realizar visitas técnicas para inspeção de qualidade e conformidade com as normas de segurança e regulamentações vigentes. • Colaborar com a equipe de projetos e fornecedores para otimizar soluções técnicas e orçamentos. • Garantir a documentação completa dos projetos, incluindo as built, relatórios técnicos e manuais de operação. • Acompanhar e supervisionar a execução das obras, garantindo o cumprimento dos critérios de qualidade e segurança. Requisitos: • Formação em Engenharia Elétrica, Mecânica, Civil ou áreas correlatas. • Habilidades de liderança e comunicação para gerenciar equipes de campo e fornecedores. • Desejável Experiência com ferramentas de acompanhamento de projetos e cronogramas (por exemplo, MS Project). • Registro ativo no CREA. Diferenciais: • Experiência prévia com projetos que envolvem coordenação de múltiplas disciplinas de instalações.

title: Analista de Marketplace Sênior
description:
Estamos em busca de um Analista de Marketplace Sênior para se juntar à nossa equipe.

Modelo de trabalho: Presencial Local de trabalho: Campinas/SP

Requisitos Experiência comprovada em gestão de marketplaces e e-commerce e otimização de processos. Experiência com ferramentas de ERP (Itens, Pedidos e Clientes) Proatividade e capacidade de resolver problemas rapidamente. Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e negociação. Formação em Administração, Marketing, Gestão Comercial ou áreas correlatas.

Diferenciais Experiência com ferramentas CRM. Habilidade em gestão de KPIs, análise de dados Conhecimento em plataformas como Mercado Livre, Amazon, Shopify, etc. Conhecimento de Varejo

Responsabilidades Suportar a operação do nosso Marketplace, garantindo a fluidez e eficiência de todas as etapas, desde a gestão de estoque até a logística de entrega. Acompanhar e analisar o desempenho de vendas, indicadores de performance (KPIs) e sugerir melhorias contínuas para maximizar os resultados. Gerenciar o relacionamento com Sellers (Distribuidores/Vendedores), garantindo que todos os produtos estejam atualizados e dentro dos padrões de qualidade da empresa, que o fluxo de pedidos seja atendidos e as apurações financeiras estejam de acordo com a operação. Identificar oportunidades de novos parceiros e produtos para integrar ao marketplace. Assegurar a correta gestão do fluxo financeiro, incluindo comissões e pagamentos, bem como o cumprimento das normas e regulamentações da plataforma. Suportar o processo de onboarding do Seller, desde o processo de implantação, compartilhamento de boas práticas de operação até o inicio de vendas. Apoiar na validação de vendas com os clientes B2B, garantindo a sustentação do processo. Atuar na interface entre a equipes internar de vendas, suporte, desenvolvimento, marketing e logística para garantir a sinergia entre as áreas.

title: Analista de Controladoria Sênior
description:
A Brunel está em busca de um(a)

Analista de Controladoria Sênior

para atuar em um contrato de temporário de 9 meses junto a um de nossos clientes! Essa oportunidade será para um regime 100% presencial para ficar alocado no escritório em

Itaboraí (RJ) .

Atividades: Auxiliar nas análises que visam demonstrar a performance do negócio da empresa no Brasil, variações de custos, desvios de orçamento e aderência ao planejamento estratégico; Garantir o cumprimento dos controles internos e políticas corporativas; Garantir a correta aplicação dos princípios contábeis na geração das informações financeiras e análises gerais. Auxiliar no Report mensal à Matriz; Colaborar na elaboração do orçamento anual; Acompanhar o Orçamento x Realizado das contas de G&A e analisar os desvios; Auxiliar no monitoramento e teste da aderência dos controles internos e políticas corporativas; Realizar registros e manter as reconciliações contábeis de acordo com as normas vigentes; Elaborar relatórios financeiros; Atualização das rotinas e responsabilidades referente ao fechamento mensal; Fornecer análises e relatórios gerenciais e de performance visando suportar todas as áreas de empresa na obtenção dos objetivos definidos na estratégia local e mundial do Grupo;

Requisitos: Formação superior em Ciências Contábeis; Inglês Avançado (será testado); Conhecimento em MS Office (Excel avançado, Power Point); Experiência profissional mínima de 5 anos em área de contabilidade, controladoria e/ou auditoria, preferencialmente em empresas de médio e grande porte; Desejável conhecimento em ERP.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
A Foursys é um time apaixonado por inovação, design e transformação digital.

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

♿️ Na Foursys, celebramos a diversidade e acreditamos que são as diferentes ideias e perspectivas que nos enriquecem. Portanto, sua cor, religião, gênero, raça, nacionalidade, idade, origem, identidade de gênero, deficiência ou orientação sexual não são barreiras para se juntar à nossa equipe. #VemSerFoursys!

Que tal se juntar a nós e se tornar um(a) #FourTalent? Então se liga nessa oportunidade incrível:

Conhecimento Técnico: Experiência sólida com infraestrutura e automação, utilizando ferramentas como Terraform, Ansible, Puppet ou Chef; Proficiência em linguagens de programação como Python, Go, Bash ou Ruby para automação de tarefas; Experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento e observabilidade (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack); Conhecimento profundo em plataformas de cloud computing (AWS, GCP, Azure); Familiaridade com bancos de dados (SQL e NoSQL), com foco em escalabilidade e performance; Experiência com conteners e orquestração (Docker, Kubernetes); Inglês para comunicação integral (leitura e escrita).

Responsabilidades: Monitorar, manter e melhorar a infraestrutura e sistemas em produção, garantindo alta disponibilidade e escalabilidade; Automatizar processos de deploy, provisionamento e gerenciamento de infraestrutura (IaC - Infrastructure as Code); Trabalhar em conjunto com as equipes de desenvolvimento para identificar gargalos e falhas e implementar soluções de confiabilidade; Gerenciar ferramentas de monitoramento e alertas (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog); Implementar e manter pipelines de CI/CD, garantindo eficiência no desenvolvimento e implantação de código; Gerenciar e otimizar o uso de recursos em cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure); Criar e executar planos de recuperação de desastres e garantir a continuidade dos negócios em caso de falhas; Colaborar na definição de SLAs e SLOs para garantir os padrões de serviço esperados.

Diferenciais: Certificações em cloud computing ou SRE (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Professional Cloud Architect, etc.); Conhecimento de práticas de segurança e devsecops; Experiência com infraestrutura como código em ambientes híbridos; Familiaridade com redes e protocolos de comunicação (TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS).

E temos também o Clube da Four que oferece ótimas vantagens!

Assistência médica; VR e VA flexível; ️ Gympass e Wellz; ⚽ Parceria com o SESC; Descontos em restaurantes; Descontos em cursos técnicos e de ensinos superior; Descontos em escolas e plataformas de idiomas.

E aí, aceita o desafio? Então conclua sua candidatura e #VemSerFoursys! Boa sorte!

title: Analista Financeiro - Bilíngue
description:
A Cushman & Wakefield é uma empresa multinacional que atua no ramo imobiliário. Trabalhamos para sermos o provedor global preferencial de serviços imobiliários, oferecendo as soluções mais criativas e inovadoras de forma consistente, gerando valor significativo aos nossos clientes. Queremos aumentar ainda mais a diversidade das nossas pessoas, pois entendemos que essa é a chave para a inovação. Por isso, incentivamos que mulheres, pessoas da comunidade LGBTQIAP+, indígenas, afrodescendentes, pessoas com deficiência, maiores de 50 anos se candidatem as nossas vagas. Celebramos a diversidade e o nosso compromisso é criar um ambiente inclusivo para todos os colaboradores.

Um dia do(a) Analista Financiero

Modelo de trabalho: CLT

Atuação: Presencial - São Paulo - Zona Sul

Horário de Trabalho: Segunda a sexta-feira das 08h as 17h48.

Principales responsabilidades:

Análisis y control presupuestario: preparación de reportes financieros actuals vs budget. Consolidación de información de diferentes sitios/países. Confección de presupuestos y proyecciones de gastos. Generación reportes ad hoc. Análisis de desvíos Preparación de presentaciones para la Gerencia del área. Soporte administrativo a los equipos de operaciones Generación de facturación del área Confección de papeles de trabajo para control interno y auditorías Análisis de la contabilidad del cliente (emisión de reportes contables para generación de reportes financieros). Control de cumplimiento de ahorros Alcance de la posición: Regional (Latinoamérica)

Requisitos Técnicos Graduado o estudiante avanzado en las carreras de Ciencias Económicas (Economía o Contabilidad preferentemente). Sólidos conocimientos contables. Experiencia en armado de presupuestos y análisis de desvíos. Dominio de Excel (nivel avanzado excluyente) Ingles avanzado. Español avanzado. Manejo de sistemas contables: emisión de reportes, registración de asientos.

title: Senior Software Engineer (React)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (React) to work on a project in the data analytics sector.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation.

You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems and you will be responsible for configuring and maintaining tracking solutions for platforms like Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics (GA4), Google AdWords, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Data Management Platforms (DMPs) like LiveRamp, and CDPs like Segment Twilio, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

We are looking for someone with good communication skills, ideally with experience making decisions, being proactive, used to building software from scratch, and with good attention to detail.

What you will do:

Implement and manage third-party marketing and analytics tags/pixels across web and mobile platforms. Integrate and configure CDPs (Segment Twilio, Amperity, Tealium AudienceStream) and align data collection strategies with business goals. Collaborate with marketing, analytics, product, and engineering teams to define tracking requirements and ensure seamless data flow across systems. Draft business requirements documents (BRDs), solution design references (SDRs), and technical implementation guides for tagging and data capture. Develop and maintain data layers to ensure structured and scalable event tracking. Perform QA and troubleshoot tagging issues, ensuring data accuracy through debugging tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and network request monitoring. Ensure privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA) in data collection and align tracking with first-party data strategies and server-side tagging. Collaborate on CDP audience segmentation and activation and enhance attribution capabilities across digital channels.

What you will bring:

Front-end developer with proficiency in JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS with an emphasis on event-based tracking and tag implementation. Ability to draft BRDs, SDRs, and technical documentation for data tracking implementations. Understanding of cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, first-party cookies, and server-side tagging. Knowledge of data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and their impact on data collection and marketing strategies. Excellent troubleshooting and debugging skills using tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and Tag Assistant.

Nice to have:

Hands-on experience with Tag Management Solutions (TMS) like Google Tag Manager (GTM), Adobe Launch, and Tealium iQ. Experience working with 3rd party event tracking, such as Web Analytics (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics / GA4) and Paid Media (e.g. Google AdWords, Meta Pixels, and DMPs (LiveRamp). Familiarity with Customer Data Platforms (CDPs) like Segment Twilio, Adobe Launch, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth: We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

title: Sales Manager
description:

2. 8 years channel sales, solution selling or project selling experience in IT industry, prefer with Government sector customer experience, experience with local famous IT networking distributors or vendors is a plus.

5. Good interpersonal and communication skills.

title: Consultor(a) SAP - RAR
description:
Consultor(a) SAP - RAR

Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Estamos à procura de um

Consultor(a) SAP RAR

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

Seu Papel & Responsabilidades

Requisitos Inglês avançado

(Obrigatório). Experiência com

SAP Revenue Accounting and Reporting (RAR). Experiência com metodologias e ferramentas de gerenciamento de projetos. Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e colaboração para trabalhar de forma eficaz com clientes e equipes internas.

Por que nos escolher?

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores. Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas.

• Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo. • Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real. • Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. • Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários. • Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários.

Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos

Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

title: Middle Sysadmin&Kubernetes Engineer
description:
This is us Qinshift and Avenga merge together to start a new era of technology that matters. Leveraging the power of innovations, we are on a journey to shape the future of work, and we are inviting you to co-create it with us.

This is the job We are looking for a Middle Sysadmin + Kubernetes Engineer to join our team and play a key role in managing and optimizing our infrastructure and containerized environments. You will work with Linux systems, Kubernetes, and networking technologies, ensuring high availability, security, and scalability for our platforms.

This is you Kubernetes Expertise: Deep knowledge of Kubernetes (K8s networking, general configuration, troubleshooting) – certifications like CKA, CKSS, CKAD are a plus. Linux Administration: Strong experience in system configuration, monitoring, and troubleshooting. Networking: In-depth understanding of network protocols, configurations, and security best practices. Storage Management: Experience with storage solutions is a plus. Customer-Facing Experience: Ability to interact with clients, troubleshoot issues, and provide expert guidance. Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Electrical/Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience. English level - upper intermediate or higher.

This is your role Manage and maintain Linux-based systems for high availability and performance. Administer and optimize Kubernetes clusters, ensuring security and efficiency. Troubleshoot and resolve Kubernetes, Linux, and networking issues. Implement monitoring and logging solutions for system health and performance. Work with teams to improve infrastructure automation and deployment processes. Collaborate with clients and stakeholders, providing technical support and best practices.

We take pride in the diverse skills and character of our teams, welcoming everyone to apply and contribute to our collective strength.

title: Analista de remuneração
description:
Analista de Remuneração (Presencial)

Localização: Santo Antônio de Posse

Atribuições: Apoiar nas atividades de estruturação, análise e manutenção dos processos internos, garantindo que programas de metas, prêmios e benefícios estejam alinhados com as diretrizes organizacionais da Salus. Realizar pesquisas de mercado para avaliar a competitividade dos salários e benefícios oferecidos. Auxiliar na elaboração de tabelas salariais com base em benchmarks e políticas internas. Coletar e consolidar dados de remuneração para embasar decisões internas. Apoiar na administração de planos de benefícios, como vale alimentação, assistência médica e outros. Analisar benefícios e sugerir melhorias para agregar valor à empresa e aos colaboradores. Acompanhar tendências e boas práticas do mercado para propor atualizações no pacote de remuneração total. Auxiliar no controle de promoções, méritos e ajustes salariais , garantindo a aplicação correta das políticas internas. Apoiar processos de revisão salarial e elaboração de simulações de impacto financeiro. Elaborar relatórios e dashboards para acompanhar KPIs de remuneração e benefícios. Gerar insights para a tomada de decisão sobre competitividade salarial e estrutura de cargos. Manter dados de metas e orçamento organizados conforme demanda.

Requisitos: Experiência prévia com metodologias de remuneração (Towers, Mercer, Hay Korn Ferry, Carreira Muller ou correlacionadas); Conhecimento em Power BI; Experiência com dados financeiros . Graduação em Administração, Economia, Contabilidade, Engenharia ou áreas correlatas.

Benefícios: Unimed Uniodonto PLR (Participação nos Lucros e Resultados) Convênio Farmácia Seguro de vida Vale refeição de R$29,90/dia Vale alimentação de R$300,00/mês Transporte fretado para Jaguariúna, Campinas e Santo Antônio de Posse

description: Estamos buscando desenvolvedores com perfil frontend / fullstack perfil pleno ou sênior, para integrar a equipe e contribuir com o desenvolvimento dos nossos produtos digitais focado em mercado financeiro e trading.Principais atribuições:Participação no processo criativo para construção de produtos digitais;Arquitetar, analisar e desenvolver as soluções propostas;Avaliar a qualidade do trabalho entregue;Contribuir nos testes das funcionalidades entregues;Necessário:JavaScript;Vue;CSS e Tailwind;GIT Source Control;Habilidades com a linha de comando, processos de build e empacotamento;Desejável:Experiência com algum CMS Headless;TypeScript;Node JS, Redis, PostgreSQL;Experiência com Docker;Conhecimento de testes automatizados (unitários / integração / interface);Conhecimento de processos de trabalho Agile, Scrum / Kanban;---- Acredita que pode contribuir? Se candidate através do e-mail

title: Contract Manager (Brazil/Remote)
description:
Lawyers on Demand, a Consilio company

is one of the largest and fastest growing global legal services businesses, and as a ‘new law’ pioneer, we continue to lead the market we’ve created. With a global team of over 600 attorneys and consultants working across our secondments, legal advisory services, and legal operations & tech solutions, we want you to be a part of our exciting journey!

Who are we looking for? We have a strong pipeline of exciting and career-enhancing full-time and part-time assignments across the Biotech, Marketing, Fintech, Consumer Goods, Pharma and Technology sectors, and we're interested in hearing from

Contract Managers in Brazil

to join us and commence their LOD journey.

To join us, you will: Have at least 3 years of experience ideally gained from top or mid-tier law firms or in-house (with strong legal training) Be client centric - commercially minded, adaptable and able to hit the ground running Enjoy partnering with businesses and managing stakeholder relationships No assignment or day is ever the same. Our clients are large national and international companies. This is a great opportunity to diversify your experience and bolster your CV through a career with LOD. These assignments are of varied durations, ranging anywhere from 3-6 months initially or long term.

What sets us apart? People join us for a range of reasons - the life of an LOD secondment is like no other. CV-enhancing work with global brands: We provide our people with varied, challenging, career-enhancing work with world-class global brands, allowing them to take control of their career and diversify their experience across a range of industries. No limits: We’ve helped open doors, break glass ceilings, facilitate the transition from private practice to in-house, and develop career pathways to become a GC. Whatever direction you want to take your career, we can help you get there. You call the shots: We take work-life balance pretty seriously. You can work on-site with our clients or remotely, undertake full-time or part-time assignments, or assignments that are for set months of a year – it's your choice! You’re never on your own: Throughout your LOD career, you’ll become part of a community. You’ll be supported by your LOD colleagues and our HQ team, LOD social events, and receive training opportunities to assist in your ongoing growth and development. Our Ways Of Working help shape who we are and what we do: we deliver, we are creative, we are inclusive, we care & collaborate, and we are trusted. We’re global: LOD can provide you with local, interstate and international working opportunities.

LOD is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Diversity and inclusion is a core part of our Ways of Working, and we celebrate and embrace it. We know the individual differences of our people make us collectively better and we encourage all applicants; including people with disability, career breaks, gender diverse, LGBTQIA, and culturally diverse communities to join us so we can do great things together.

title: Atendente de Loja - Goiânia
description:
A Swift tem a missão de alimentar uma vida melhor através de produtos de qualidade, uma boa culinária e um atendimento amigável que ajuda a construir lembranças memoráveis na mesa dos nossos clientes. Nossa missão também se estende na vida de cada colaborador que representa a nossa marca. Aqui, cuidamos das nossas pessoas, pois acreditamos que é o nosso bem mais precioso, proporcionando um ambiente de trabalho leve e com um clima agradável, no qual todos são respeitados e valorizados, independente de raça, gênero, etnia, orientação sexual ou deficiências. Além disso, aqui na Swift, trabalhamos muito para que o nosso time cresça conosco, podendo construir uma carreira emocionante junto a nós, tendo a possibilidade de fazer a diferença.

Então, se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser e quer ajudar a construir essa história, convidamos você a fazer parte do nosso time!

Responsabilidades: O principal papel do Atendente de Loja na Swift é ser

especialista , com foco em oferecer a melhor experiência e solução para o cliente, sendo

embaixador da marca Swift .

Principais Atividades: Atendimento com foco na melhor solução para o cliente; Garantir a melhor experiência do cliente com a marca; Venda consultiva e especializada nos produtos; Operação de caixa / PDV; Recebimento e armazenamento de mercadorias; Abastecimento da loja; PVPS (FIFO): organização direcionada aos produtos que chegam primeiro e com vencimento mais próximo; Organização da câmara fria e estoque seco (alinhamento e etiquetagem); Garantir a limpeza e a organização geral da loja.

Requisitos e qualificações: Idade superior a 18 anos; Residir próximo às lojas; Disponibilidade para trabalhar aos finais de semana e feriados.

DESEJÁVEL: Ensino médio completo; Vivência de 2 anos de experiência em vendas, atendimento ao cliente; Ter atuado no segmento de varejo; Cursos em vendas ou atendimento.

O QUE ESPERAMOS DE VOCÊ:

Nossos Valores (JBS); Brilho nos olhos, alta energia e entusiasmo; Interesse pela marca e desejo por crescer com a Swift; Gostar de cozinhar e/ou fazer churrasco; Comprometimento e estabilidade na carreira; Gostar de trabalhar em equipe; Comunicar-se de forma influente; Protagonismo na vida; Ser ágil nas atividades cotidianas e inquietude; Obstinação por atingir objetivos.

Informações adicionais Aqui na Swift, oferecemos alguns benefícios que você poderá usufruir assim que iniciar a sua trajetória com a gente! Confira alguns deles abaixo

Vale-Refeição e Vale-Alimentação flexível, para usar como quiser; Vale-Transporte; Experiência Swift (mensalmente oferecemos um produto diferenciado para que todos os nossos colaboradores possam experimentar, se deliciar e aprimorar seus argumentos de venda); Acesso ao Sempre JBS (aplicativo interno): Sempre Cuida: oferece acesso gratuito para cuidar do seu bem-estar (saúde mental, física, nutricional, dentre outras); Sempre Educa: disponibiliza conteúdos de treinamentos corporativos, incentivando o seu desenvolvimento profissional; Sempre Cresce: dedicado a oportunidades de carreira no grupo JBS, para que você possa crescer com a gente! Compras na loja com repasse em folha; Parceria com o Gympass (convênio de academias); Assistência Médica/Odontológica e Seguro de vida (opcionais); Descontos em Instituições de Ensino e de Idiomas (opcional).

Vem pra cá!!

title: Analista de portfólio
description:
A inovação e o pioneirismo sempre fizeram parte da nossa história, que começou em 1980. Temos o DNA de varejo, já que nascemos da Pernambucanas – marca centenária que sempre contou com os serviços financeiros para apoiar as famílias brasileiras de maneira fácil e democrática. Ao longo dos anos, as soluções evoluíram e se diversificaram, permitindo à Pefisa se consolidar no mercado financeiro.

Somos responsáveis pelo desenvolvimento e gestão de produtos como cartões, empréstimo pessoal, seguros e a conta digital, com diferenciais como simplicidade, praticidade e sem burocracia. Prezamos por bons relacionamentos, pelo atendimento próximo e por jogar junto.Com mais de 5 milhões de clientes ativos e grande relevância na área do varejo, disponibilizamos um amplo portfólio de serviços para pessoas físicas e jurídicas, além de um Banking as a Service (BaaS) para marcas de diversos segmentos. Com isso, adotamos iniciativas inovadoras para clientes e parceiros.Na Pefisa tudo é simples. Tudo é rápido. Te ajudamos com o que você precisa para realizar seus sonhos ou alavancar seu negócio. E você escolhe como quer conversar, pois nós somos Fígital. Atuamos com a melhor experiência entre o físico e o digital, com nossas plataformas digitais ou através de nossas lojas físicas. Somos a fintech pra gente como a gente.Se você se identifica com nossos valores, essa é a sua chance de brilhar!Analista Pleno de Gestão de PortfólioPrincipais Atividades da área de Gestão de Portfólio:- Acompanhar performance da carteira- Produzir relatórios e apresentações gerenciais que suportem decisões estratégicas (operacionais e executivas)- Direcionar as tomadas de decisão de Crédito e Cobrança- Realizar estudos na carteira, identificando oportunidade de crescer e rentabilizar o portfolio- Realizar projeções e exercício de orçamentoFerramentas- Linguagem de programação: SQL (essencial) | Python (desejável) | PySpark (diferencial)- Pacote Office: principalmente Excel e PowerPoint | Publisher (diferencial)- Dashboard: Power BI (desejável) – compatíveis Tableau, Qlik Sense etcConhecimentos:- Produtos de crédito: PF (desejável) | PF+PJ (diferencial)- Conceitos de gestão de carteira: ciclo de crédito (concessão, manutenção e cobrança)- Indicadores de crédito: carteira em dia e atrasoFormação- Graduação completa na área de exatas: Matemática, Engenharia, Ciências da Computação, etcNossos benefícios:Assistência Médica Mediservice (cooparticipação);Assistência Odontológica Odontoseg (por adesão);Restaurante Interno;Vale-Alimentação;Vale-Refeição no período de férias;Vale Cultura (por adesão);Seguro de Vida (por adesão);PPR;Bicicletário;Desconto nos produtos Pernambucanas;Auxilio Creche;Plano de Carreira;Parceria com instituições de Ensino para cursos de graduação, pós graduação e descontos em curso de idiomas.Horário de trabalho:
