Se interessou? Basta fazer o primeiro teste (múltipla escolha) que já estará no processo seletivo!

title: Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
About Ultahost Ultahost is a leader in premium web hosting services, delivering exceptional solutions to clients worldwide. Our mission is to innovate, empower, and foster a thriving technology ecosystem by attracting top technical talent.

Role Overview We are seeking an experienced

Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist

with a deep understanding of programming languages, frameworks, and IT technologies. This role involves sourcing, evaluating, and onboarding top-tier candidates specializing in

programming frameworks ,

hosting technologies , and

IT infrastructure .

Key Responsibilities

Identify, interview, and manage the hiring process for talented professionals in critical technical roles such as Full Stack, Frontend, Backend, and DevOps. Collaborate with hiring managers to define role requirements and expectations for technical positions. Source, evaluate, and shortlist candidates for positions requiring expertise in: Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, and others. Front-End Frameworks: Next.js, React.js, and Angular. Back-End Frameworks: Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, and Golang. Hosting Technologies: OpenLiteSpeed, NGINX, Apache, and Docker environments. IT Infrastructure: Networking, Linux operating systems, and cloud hosting platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Assess candidates’ technical knowledge through interviews and problem-solving exercises tailored to specific domains. Build a robust pipeline of highly skilled technical talent using modern tools and strategies. Maintain an up-to-date knowledge base of emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends. Utilize platforms like , job boards, and professional networks effectively to find and engage candidates. Coordinate interview logistics and ensure a seamless candidate experience. Collaborate with team leads to provide market insights and recommendations on hiring strategies.

Requirements Proven experience (3+ years) as a Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist or in a similar role. Strong technical understanding of programming frameworks and languages: Front-end: Next.js, React.js, Angular. Back-end: Node.js, Nest.js, Golang, Express.js. Programming: JavaScript, Python, Go. Familiarity with hosting technologies and IT infrastructure, including Linux systems, NGINX, Apache, and cloud platforms. Excellent ability to assess technical competencies through structured interviews. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with a focus on building relationships with candidates and hiring managers. Fluent in English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in using ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) and recruitment platforms. Excellent communication and interview skills.

Nice-to-Have Skills Hands-on coding or technical background in IT-related fields. Experience in hiring for hosting environments and DevOps roles. Familiarity with additional frameworks like Django, Ruby on Rails, and Flask. Understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Certifications in recruitment or technical fields.

What We Offer Competitive Salary in USD Fully remote work with a flexible schedule. Opportunities for career advancement in a fast-paced, global company. A supportive, innovation-driven work culture. Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and recruitment practices.

title: Coordenador(a) de CRM
description:
Sobre a Jüssi: A Jüssi é uma agência de marketing digital fundada em 2010 e que faz parte do maior grupo de comunicação do mundo, a WPP. Somos guiados pelo posicionamento “The Experience Agency”, que materializa a nossa capacidade de impulsionar o crescimento dos nossos clientes por meio de experiências que contemplem o poder da inovação, da criatividade, dos dados e da tecnologia.

Conheça o time: Na Jüssi, o time de CRM é responsável por toda gestão que envolve os canais de CRM, como: automações, réguas, disparos de e-mail marketing, SMS, Push e APP Messages, segmentação de base e controle/análise de KPIs.

Para esta posição, estamos procurando uma pessoa que tenha conhecimentos profundos sobre a plataforma Salesforce Marketing Cloud, estando também disposta a aprender diariamente. Se você tem esta vontade e enxergou nesta vaga uma oportunidade de aprendizado e colaboração conosco, venha para a Jüssi!

Como será o seu dia a dia: Colaborar junto à gerência no desenho de escopo, necessidades, times, prioridades e ferramentas; Auxiliar a gerência em RFPs, concorrências e/ou negociações; Acompanhar e gerir os projetos do dia-a-dia fazendo a interlocução direta com o(a) cliente através de comunicação verbal e escrita; Dar suporte técnico-ferramental aos analistas quando necessário; Gerar relatório de atividades, apresentar resultados, gerenciar ferramentas de gestão ágil e propor soluções; Gerenciar as pessoas de sua equipe direta controlando o clima organizacional da área e intervindo em resoluções de conflitos quando necessário; Gerenciar tempo e prioridades; Realizar entregas relacionadas a estratégias de CRM (Campanhas, Lifecycle, Always On, etc); Dar feedback à equipe direta; Ter a percepção de potencializar talentos;

O que buscamos: Formação em Exatas ou Sociais Aplicadas; Pós-Graduação em Marketing ou Administração será um diferencial; Experiência de pelo menos 5 (cinco) anos em CRM; Experiência em gestão de pessoas ou mentoria de pelo menos 1 (um) ano; Perfil analítico e lógico; Inglês fluente será um diferencial; Boa comunicação escrita e verbal; Conhecimentos em ferramentas de CRM; Conhecimentos ou contato com Google Analytics, Google Ads e Facebook Ads; Conhecimentos em ferramentas de Bancos de Dados; Empatia, resiliência, senso de priorização e escuta ativa;

Contratação e Benefícios: Regime de contratação: CLT Vale Refeição — Cartão Flash sem desconto; Vale Transporte; Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Totalpass; Modelo Híbrido — Presencial 4x.

Valores que nos guiam: Não conformismo: questionamos, investigamos, testamos e criamos soluções únicas que geram experiências extraordinárias.

Empirismo: conhecimentos geram experiências. E experiências geram conhecimentos. Desta forma buscamos evoluir, por meio da prática, tentativa e aprendizado.

Respeito: abraçamos a pluralidade, ouvimos e aprendemos o que cada pessoa tem a ensinar. É assim que a gente se conecta, troca e vivencia experiências.

Nós nos preocupamos em potencializar o desenvolvimento das pessoas! Por isso, aqui você encontrará: Ciclo de avaliação anual - para promover o crescimento e o desenvolvimento das pessoas colaboradoras, alinhar a equipe com os objetivos da empresa estimulando uma cultura de feedback e reconhecimento. Learning - plataforma de gerenciamento de aprendizagem, na qual todas as pessoas colaboradoras têm acessos para realizar cursos durante o ano, de acordo com suas necessidades, visando seu desenvolvimento.

Nosso olhar para Diversidade e Inclusão: Na Jüssi, acreditamos que a riqueza está nas diferenças. Por isso, abrimos nossas portas para talentos diversos, construindo um ambiente onde a inclusão e a pluralidade são protagonistas. Nossos processos seletivos são para todas as pessoas, sem exceção! Acreditamos no poder da empatia e da justiça, e queremos que você faça parte dessa construção! Junte-se a nós e contribua para que a Jüssi continue sendo um espaço seguro e inspirador, onde cada um pode ser autenticamente quem é.

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Analista de Microbiologia Pl.
description:
A

Phibro Animal Health Corporation

é uma organização global de capital aberto com uma rica história em saúde e nutrição animal que fabrica e comercializa aditivos medicamentosos para alimentação animal, vacinas, produtos de especialidades nutricionais e nutrição mineral. Nós nos esforçamos para ser um parceiro confiável para os produtores de gado, aves, suínos e aquacultura, agricultores, veterinários e consumidores que criam ou cuidam de animais de produção e de companhia, fornecendo soluções para ajudá-los a manter e melhorar a saúde de seus animais. A Phibro é uma empresa diversificada. Além de nutrição e saúde animal, fabricamos e comercializamos produtos para melhorar a performance na produção de etanol, microbianos para plantas, aplicações domésticas e industriais e especialidades químicas para vários mercados industriais.

As receitas da Phibro são superiores a US$ 1 bilhão e são suportadas por mais de 2.300 colaboradores em todo o mundo.

Na Phibro, as pessoas são nosso maior patrimônio. Nós nos esforçamos para desenvolver uma força de trabalho diversificada que promova um ambiente onde as pessoas se sintam apoiadas em compartilhar abertamente sua criatividade e habilidades que lhes permitam ser o mais bem-sucedidas possível. Se você está interessado em trabalhar para a Phibro, mas sente que não atende todos os requisitos, recomendamos que você se candidate, pois pode ser o candidato certo para esta posição ou outros processos seletivos.

Função:

Analista de Microbiologia Pl.

Principais atividades:

Realizar e acompanhar via supervisão direta as atividades do laboratório de microbiologia, desde o recebimento das amostras, sejam para diagnóstico, identificação ou seleção de sementes para produção de vacinas; Digitar resultados; Manter limpo e organizado setor, realizando 5 S periodicamente; Garantir o arquivamento dos dados brutos, documentos da qualidade e técnicos produzidos; Manter controle do estoque mínimo de insumos para realização das atividades; Realizar os controles internos e externos de qualidade; Auxiliar na análise dos resultados dos programas internos e externos de Controle da Qualidade; Garantir que os procedimentos sejam realizados de acordo com os protocolos aprovados no laboratório; Garantir que os registros de todas as etapas de diagnóstico sejam mantidos; Liberar resultados pertinentes ao setor nos prazos acordados; Acompanhar desvios de produção (problemas com amostras, resultados inconclusivos, resultados fora do prazo, resultados inconsistentes); Elaborar, revisar e suportar a implementação de procedimentos, manuais da qualidade, e métodos analíticos necessários ao laboratório; Manter comunicação clara e regular com o setor de diagnóstico, a fim de cumprir as exigências e prazos na entrega dos resultados; Promover reuniões regulares, para alinhamento de processos e treinamento de colaboradores; Propor melhorias nos processos produtivos, implantação de novas tecnologias; Acompanhar as demandas do laboratório de diagnostico, originadas dos problemas de campo a fim de auxiliar na identificação dos patógenos e sua caracterização; Acompanhar os processos de validação de métodos analíticos, qualificação de equipamentos e calibração dos instrumentos do laboratório, referentes ao seu setor; Garantir que os colaboradores do setor executem as operações de acordo com as normas de biossegurança vigentes; Garantir a qualidade das sementes selecionadas para produção das vacinas bacterianas; Propor e executar planos de ação preventiva e corretiva decorrentes de investigações e auditorias; Acompanhar auditorias dos órgãos governamentais e fiscalizadores e outras no setor, quando aplicável; Participar de projetos de melhoria contínua referentes a seu setor; Realizar os programas de treinamento para garantir o treinamento periódico de forma a manter atualizado o cronograma; Auxiliar e acompanhar no desenvolvimento dos colaboradores do laboratório; Acompanhar e auxiliar nos processos de qualificação e desenvolvimento de fornecedores; Participar dos processos de reclamação de clientes, auxiliando na investigação das causas e na eficácia das ações implementadas; Gerar indicadores e relatórios pertinentes a sua área.

Formação: Graduação em Medicina Veterinária Desejável pós-graduação em microbiologia Desejável conhecimento em sistema LIMS

Modelo de trabalho:

100% presencial Local de trabalho:

Guarulhos

Benefícios: Assistência Médica; Assistência Odontológica; Restaurante no local com café da manhã e almoço; Cesta básica; VT /Estacionamento/fretado; Seguro de vida; Auxílio creche; Previdência privada.

title: Sales Analyst
description:
At

Blueground

, our vision is to make people feel at home wherever they choose to live. For us, that means ensuring our guests have the peace of mind, flexibility & confidence they need to explore life’s latest adventure.

We’ve grown a lot since our founding in 2013, having raised more than $258m+ in funding, to date -- and that’s just the beginning. We’re now hosting guests in more than 15,000 homes in 32 cities around the world (and growing!), with an aim to hit 100,000 homes in 100 cities by 2025.Our vision comes to life through our ways of working. For our 1,000+ member team located across 17 countries, we’ve created a culture of collaboration, inclusiveness, and opportunity.We believe our people should have the power to choose their preferred way to work. Depending on the role’s requirements, team members can choose to work full time in one of our offices, work fully remote, or choose a hybrid model between the two.We are driven by our core values. To our team,

Time

is our most important resource.

Excellence

isn’t simply a standard, but an exciting way to look at life. We

Care

deeply about our guests and colleagues. Our relationships are built around

Transparency

, which builds trust and improves communication.We are looking to recruit a Sales Analyst based in São Paulo to join our B2C Inbound Sales department.

As member of our sales team you will manage inbound sales requests concerning bookings of Tabas properties

.RESPONSIBILITIES AND ATTRIBUTIONSRespond to incoming property sales inquiries full cycle and handling requests (via phone, email, whatsapp, etc) generated from all online sales channels (Website, Airbnb, Vivareal, Zap, Corporate Housing Partners, Corporates) offering clients the best accommodation solution based on their need;Support the entire sales process to ensure delivery against key performance metrics;Interact and negotiate with clients, help them to understand the business, and solve any queries they might have;Proactive daily pipeline management in our CRM.REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONSNice to have experience in sales or account management

;Ability to run proper exploratory/discovery calls, be an active listener and objection handling and negotiation;Flexibility to work on weekends and holidays;Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment;Customer-first mindset and hunter mentality;A coachable individual able to implement feedback;Advanced in English, ability to talk and write with normality.INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAISMeal/Food voucher on the Flex Flash card of R$40.00 per day (no payroll discount);Transportation voucher based on your route to the office (with 3% discount on payroll);Our Health Care is Amil (with co-participation);Our Dental Plan is Amil (without co-participation);Daycare allowance for employees with children up to 5 years old;For your Physical Health, we have TotalPass, our gym benefit;For your Emotional Health, we have the Moodar platform;Partnership with Cambly for an English course;Flexible Holidays (from 6 months onwards you are entitled to proportional holidays);25% discount when using Tabas apartments;Once a month we have a celebration the Tabers Birthday's;Birthday Day Off + giftcard paid on the Flash card, to make your day even special;Our workplace has a cinema room, spaces for decompression and an equipped kitchen;In the condominium we have a Bike rack, Full Kitchen and Lunch Room.

e seja

Encrível

como

Cloud , software, serviços e sustentação necessários para uma solução de negócio de maneira

Turn-Key .

Participando também na aplicação de testes, análise de funcionalidade e elaboração de documentação técnica.​

RESPONSABILIDADES E ATRIBUIÇÕES Experiência com projetos de implementação S/4hana módulos de DRC & BTP Consultor deverá ser proativo, ter habilidades de comunicação e facilidade para trabalhar em equipe e com o cliente. Conhecimento de Activate e domínio com levantamento de requisitos, documentação, configurações, migração de dados e testes de homologação (unitários e integrados).

REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES Configurar DRC Outbound e Inbound Conhecimento nas soluções SAP: SAP BTP SAP Integration Suite EventMesh SAP S/4 SAP DRC

DESEJÁVEL • experiência de 5+ anos em como consultor BTP

NOSSA MISSÃO É INOVAR DE FORMA DISRUPTIVA NA CRIAÇÃO DE MODELOS COM AS MELHORES PRÁTICAS E SERVIÇOS PARA SOLUÇÕES DE GESTÃO SAP

Nascemos do sonho de revolucionar a gestão das empresas brasileiras, aliamos o melhor da tecnologia às melhores práticas de gestão, dando aos nossos clientes

agilidade ,

inovação

e

governança

em um mundo em constante evolução.

Somos a

Engine , uma consultoria de gestão e parceira SAP, especializada em soluções que aliam tecnologia, negócio e inovação. Pioneiros na implantação de SAP como Serviço. O

Engine Business as a Service , inclui na forma de serviço todos os componentes de Cloud, Software, Serviços e Sustentação. Com aplicação em diversos segmentos de mercado desde alimentícia, farmacêutica, química, serviços, telecomunicação, logística e ambiental. Possibilitando que pequenas e médias empresas terem acesso ao melhor sistema de gestão empresarial em um modelo econômico e financeiro flexível baseado em OPEX

Nossa cultura é nosso filtro!

Por isso, nossas vagas estão abertas para todas as pessoas, independente de gênero, religião, etnia, deficiência, idade, orientação sexual ou qualquer outro fator.

E o mais importante! Nossa equipe é apaixonada pelo que faz, por isso somos Engineus. Vem fazer parte dessa jornada #VemserEngineus #Engine

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Estágio em Growth
description:
Sobre a Jüssi

:

A Jüssi é uma agência de marketing digital fundada em 2010 e que faz parte do maior grupo de comunicação do mundo, a WPP. Somos guiados pelo posicionamento “The Experience Agency”, que materializa a nossa capacidade de impulsionar o crescimento dos nossos clientes por meio de experiências que contemplem o poder da inovação, da criatividade, dos dados e da tecnologia.

Como será o seu dia a dia: Apoiar na análise de dados para identificar oportunidades de crescimento; Auxiliar no desenvolvimento e execução de testes A/B para otimização de campanhas; Dar suporte na implementação de estratégias de aquisição e retenção de usuários; Monitorar métricas e gerar insights para melhoria da performance; Colaborar com diferentes times para execução de iniciativas de Growth; Contribuir para a criação de relatórios e apresentações de resultados.

O que buscamos: Estar cursando graduação em Administração, Marketing, Engenharia, Publicidade ou áreas correlatas; A pessoa deve ser disposta a estudar e aprender sobre ferramentas dentro da área de dados, além de conceitos básicos de Growth, Analytics, experimentação e data visualization; Capacidade de raciocínio lógico com interesse na área de dados/analytics; Interesse em desenvolvimento de dashboards e relatórios Interesse em Web Analytics, focando em planejamento para implementação de eventos Ter interesse e disposição para aprender sobre métricas, funil de crescimento e experimentação; Habilidade analítica e facilidade com números; Conhecimento básico em Excel/Google Sheets; Noções de ferramentas como Google Analytics, Looker Studio e Meta Ads são um diferencial; Boa comunicação e capacidade de trabalhar em equipe; Inglês avançado.

Contratação e Benefícios: Bolsa Auxílio; Vale Refeição; Auxílio Transporte; Seguro de Vida.

Nosso olhar para Diversidade e Inclusão: Na Jüssi, acreditamos que a riqueza está nas diferenças. Por isso, abrimos nossas portas para talentos diversos, construindo um ambiente onde a inclusão e a pluralidade são protagonistas. Nossos processos seletivos são para todas as pessoas, sem exceção! Acreditamos no poder da empatia e da justiça, e queremos que você faça parte dessa construção! Junte-se a nós e contribua para que a Jüssi continue sendo um espaço seguro e inspirador, onde cada um pode ser autenticamente quem é.

title: ZEISS MED | Banco de Talentos para Técnicos e Engenheiros de Campo | Salvador!
description:
Estamos sempre analisando os currículos cadastrados e, havendo uma oportunidade alinhada ao seu perfil, entraremos em contato para que você participe de nosso processo seletivo!

Sobre a ZEISS: - Fundada como uma fábrica para mecânica de precisão e óptica na cidade de Jena, Alemanha, em 1846, a Carl Zeiss é hoje um líder mundial nas indústrias óptica e optoeletrônica. Temos escritórios em mais de 30 países e somos representados em mais de 100 países, com centros de produção na Europa, América do Norte, América Central e na Ásia. - Nossa tarefa mais importante é levar os usuários da tecnologia ZEISS a áreas que permaneceram escondidas no passado. Nós somos líderes de mercado na maioria dos campos onde atuamos. Oferecemos um espectro extraordinário de soluções inteligentes e produtos nas áreas de tecnologia Médica, Tecnologia em Metrologia Industrial e Tecnologia em Microscopia.

Sobre a nossa Divisão Médica : - Oferecemos soluções completas para diagnósticos e tratamentos oftalmológicos, além da avançada tecnologia de radioterapia intraoperatória e soluções de visualização inovadoras para neurocirurgia, odontologia, entre outros. Nosso portfólio possui promissoras tecnologias do futuro que garante aos seus parceiros e clientes confiança e excelência.

Sobre o nosso Banco de Talentos para Técnicos e Engenheiro de Campo: Base de Trabalho - Salvador e região.

Atividades: - Instalação, treinamento aos usuários e manutenção (preventiva e corretiva) de equipamentos médicos. - Manter registros dos serviços executados e enviar relatórios dos atendimentos realizados. - Garantir a satisfação do cliente de acordo com métricas de atendimento, prazo, performance e qualidade.

Requisitos: - Experiência anterior com instalação e manutenção de equipamentos médicos. - Conhecimentos em TI (Hardware / Software / Redes - instalação / formatação / configuração). - Graduação em Engenharia e/ou formação técnica (Eletrotécnica, Eletromecânica, Mecatrônica, Eletrônica, Elétrica). - CNH em dia e disponibilidade para viagens. - Bom nível de Inglês é imprescindível.

Nosso compromisso com a Diversidade e Inclusão: - A ZEISS acredita na igualdade de oportunidades. Independentemente de gênero, idade, raça, cor, credo, orientação sexual e deficiência, todas as pessoas qualificadas serão consideradas em nossos processos seletivos. Trabalhamos para construir um ambiente diverso e com equidade de oportunidades. Valorizamos e respeitamos todas as diferenças.

title: Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
About Ultahost Ultahost is a leader in premium web hosting services, delivering exceptional solutions to clients worldwide. Our mission is to innovate, empower, and foster a thriving technology ecosystem by attracting top technical talent.

Role Overview We are seeking an experienced

Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist

with a deep understanding of programming languages, frameworks, and IT technologies. This role involves sourcing, evaluating, and onboarding top-tier candidates specializing in

programming frameworks ,

hosting technologies , and

IT infrastructure .

Key Responsibilities

Identify, interview, and manage the hiring process for talented professionals in critical technical roles such as Full Stack, Frontend, Backend, and DevOps. Collaborate with hiring managers to define role requirements and expectations for technical positions. Source, evaluate, and shortlist candidates for positions requiring expertise in: Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, and others. Front-End Frameworks: Next.js, React.js, and Angular. Back-End Frameworks: Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, and Golang. Hosting Technologies: OpenLiteSpeed, NGINX, Apache, and Docker environments. IT Infrastructure: Networking, Linux operating systems, and cloud hosting platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Assess candidates’ technical knowledge through interviews and problem-solving exercises tailored to specific domains. Build a robust pipeline of highly skilled technical talent using modern tools and strategies. Maintain an up-to-date knowledge base of emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends. Utilize platforms like , job boards, and professional networks effectively to find and engage candidates. Coordinate interview logistics and ensure a seamless candidate experience. Collaborate with team leads to provide market insights and recommendations on hiring strategies.

Requirements Proven experience (3+ years) as a Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist or in a similar role. Strong technical understanding of programming frameworks and languages: Front-end: Next.js, React.js, Angular. Back-end: Node.js, Nest.js, Golang, Express.js. Programming: JavaScript, Python, Go. Familiarity with hosting technologies and IT infrastructure, including Linux systems, NGINX, Apache, and cloud platforms. Excellent ability to assess technical competencies through structured interviews. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with a focus on building relationships with candidates and hiring managers. Fluent in English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in using ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) and recruitment platforms. Excellent communication and interview skills.

Nice-to-Have Skills Hands-on coding or technical background in IT-related fields. Experience in hiring for hosting environments and DevOps roles. Familiarity with additional frameworks like Django, Ruby on Rails, and Flask. Understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Certifications in recruitment or technical fields.

What We Offer Competitive Salary in USD Fully remote work with a flexible schedule. Opportunities for career advancement in a fast-paced, global company. A supportive, innovation-driven work culture. Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and recruitment practices.

title: Scrum Master - Advanced English - Remote
description:
About HCLTech

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.

To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit

Scrum Master will support the teams continuous progress by ensuring each person is working on the right tasks, helping to remove any obstacles, and protecting the team from distractions. The Scrum Master will maintain communication, transparency and visibility with sponsors, collaborators, Product Owners and others involved with the sprints.

Domain experience preferred

PMC/OTC/Supply Chain experience

Responsibilities:

Scrum Team Support Facilitate conversations that will help the team come up with their own solutions Facilitates the removal of obstacles and distractions that impede the team’s velocity. Assist team in sizing-up efforts and tracks team velocity Radiates team information to promote visibility and transparency Promotes team brainstorming to identify potential solutions Educates team and stakeholders on their Role & Responsibilities Ensure individual and team accountability Ascertains the teams needs in training, materials and support. Escalates to appropriate personnel as needed. Identifies precursors to team derailment and develops a safe environment to promote conversations address potential conflict areas to maintain the overall health of the team and its members Researches and identifies unique frameworks and methodologies that can be incorporated within the team to increase overall team hygiene and create a hyper-collaborative environment. Event Facilitation Facilitate Scrum and/or other ceremonies put in place for communication purposes - Retrospective, Sprint Planning, refinement sessions, backlog discussions, Sprint Review, Daily Stand-ups, etc. Product Owner Partnership Support and educate the Product Owner, especially with respect to grooming and maintaining the product backlog. Ensure everyone on the team understands the project’s goals and scope. Other job duties and projects as assigned.

Skills and qualifications

Proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), Visio

TBD Agile Software First level Scrum Master certification (CSM, PSM I) required Experience leading projects and/or agile teams required Strong knowledge of SCRUM theory, rules and practices Knowledge of Agile techniques such as: User Stories, Continuous Integration, Quality checks Knowledge about task estimation and tracking such as burndown metrics, velocities, and effective backlog management Experience with Jira or other tool for managing Sprints and User Stories Knowledge of other agile methodologies and frameworks such as Kanban Lean Six Sigma Knowledge – 5S, Waste Elimination Advanced English

title: Consultor(a) SAP - Database
description:
Consultor(a) SAP Basis Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Estamos à procura de um

Consultor(a) SAP Basis

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

Seu Papel & Responsabilidades

Requisitos Inglês avançado

(Obrigatório) Experiência com Upgrades, Migrações, Implementação (S/4Hana)

Por que nos escolher?

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores. Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas.

• Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo. • Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real. • Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. • Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários. • Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários.

title: Contract Manager (Brazil/Remote)
description:
Lawyers on Demand, a Consilio company

is one of the largest and fastest growing global legal services businesses, and as a ‘new law’ pioneer, we continue to lead the market we’ve created. With a global team of over 600 attorneys and consultants working across our secondments, legal advisory services, and legal operations & tech solutions, we want you to be a part of our exciting journey!

Who are we looking for? We have a strong pipeline of exciting and career-enhancing full-time and part-time assignments across the Biotech, Marketing, Fintech, Consumer Goods, Pharma and Technology sectors, and we're interested in hearing from

Contract Managers in Brazil

to join us and commence their LOD journey.

To join us, you will: Have at least 3 years of experience ideally gained from top or mid-tier law firms or in-house (with strong legal training) Be client centric - commercially minded, adaptable and able to hit the ground running Enjoy partnering with businesses and managing stakeholder relationships No assignment or day is ever the same. Our clients are large national and international companies. This is a great opportunity to diversify your experience and bolster your CV through a career with LOD. These assignments are of varied durations, ranging anywhere from 3-6 months initially or long term.

What sets us apart? People join us for a range of reasons - the life of an LOD secondment is like no other. CV-enhancing work with global brands: We provide our people with varied, challenging, career-enhancing work with world-class global brands, allowing them to take control of their career and diversify their experience across a range of industries. No limits: We’ve helped open doors, break glass ceilings, facilitate the transition from private practice to in-house, and develop career pathways to become a GC. Whatever direction you want to take your career, we can help you get there. You call the shots: We take work-life balance pretty seriously. You can work on-site with our clients or remotely, undertake full-time or part-time assignments, or assignments that are for set months of a year – it's your choice! You’re never on your own: Throughout your LOD career, you’ll become part of a community. You’ll be supported by your LOD colleagues and our HQ team, LOD social events, and receive training opportunities to assist in your ongoing growth and development. Our Ways Of Working help shape who we are and what we do: we deliver, we are creative, we are inclusive, we care & collaborate, and we are trusted. We’re global: LOD can provide you with local, interstate and international working opportunities.

LOD is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Diversity and inclusion is a core part of our Ways of Working, and we celebrate and embrace it. We know the individual differences of our people make us collectively better and we encourage all applicants; including people with disability, career breaks, gender diverse, LGBTQIA, and culturally diverse communities to join us so we can do great things together.

title: Analista de suporte técnico
description:
a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 219.000 profissionais espalhados em 54 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Sobre a vaga:

Esta posição auxilia os clientes com análise de alto nível, suporte técnico como SME em computadores desktop, aplicativos e tecnologia relacionada em serviços de campo/deskside support.

Enviar CV em inglês.

Seu papel e responsabilidades

Fornecer recursos de programa de transição - compartilhar conhecimento, processo e procedimento, serviços,assumir projetos de tecnologia e infraestrutura, gerenciamento de contratos e fornecedores · Projetar e atualizar run-books · Monitorar progressos para garantir que as entregas do cliente sejam feitas no prazo e relatados ao head do time field services · Ser multitarefas e ter a capacidade de lidar com vários clientes simultaneamente · Oferecer o melhor servi;o de suporte de TI para a comunidade empresarial, garantindo que todos os requisitos sejam atendidos dentro das metas de serviço acordadas · Executar funções administrativas de Infraestrutura · Fazer backup e restaurar configurações e atividades de administração de sistemas associadas · Supervisionar os problemas até a resolução de todas as solicitações dos clientes · Treinar e orientar a equipe sobre o uso de hardware/software/ferramentas apresentadas ao cliente como parte da solução geral de entrega · Ter disponibilidade para trabalhar em regime de plantoes e fora do expediente quando necessario · Demais funcoes pertinentes ao cargo.

Qualificações & Experiência

Conhecimento de integração de soluções de ITSM para criação automática de tickets Habilidades técnicas em trabalhar com hardware - desktops, laptops, impressoras, portáteis, smartphones etc. e sofftwares e sistemas operacionais de desktop Microsoft Windows e aplicativos de produtividade de negócios, ou seja, Office Familiaridade com o cenário tecnológico, tendências atuais e aplicabilidade no ambiente de terceirização Conhecimento de troubleshooting e resolução de problemas de software; reimaginação de computadores/HD Experiência de administração de usuários e grupos do MS Active Directory, políticas e conceitos de gerenciamento Conhecimento em categoriza;ao e prioriza;ao solicitações de suporte do usuário final e solicitações de serviço, utilizando um sistema de tickets do cliente para rastrea loss e fornecer informações e status atualizados. Ingles avan;ado para conversação.

Desejavel

Experiência em solução de problemas e suporte N2 · Capacidade de interagir com os clientes para garantir que o serviço seja eficiente · Fornecer apoio analítico às PME para uma conclusão bem-sucedida · Capacidade de interagir com equipes multifuncionais da EUC para fornecer suporte em qualquer due diligence necessária para executar a solução da arquitetura de projeto de serviços de campo/suporte · Ser autodidata e ter iniciativa

Qualifica;oes tecnicas

· Superior completo na area de TI e qualifica;ao MSCE ou CNE (desejável) · Mínimo de 3 anos de experiência de campo relacionada ao suporte ao usuário final, incluindo suporte VIP · Instalação e configuração – Desktop / laptop/ Impressora/ Servidor/ Redes etc. · Experiência relevante em gerenciamento de Desktop, Workstations, Notebooks e Impressoras · Certifica;ao em Windows Administration · Experiência de colaboração, incluindo controle remoto de PCs e conhecimento de videoconferência · Fortes habilidades do Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word e Excel) · Compreensão completa da ferramenta de calendário do Outlook · Compreensão das contas funcionais do Exchange e como elas são usadas nas tecnologias da Microsoft · Fortes habilidades de atendimento ao cliente · Fortes habilidades de comunicação escrita e verbal · Deve ser detalhista e auto-motivado

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
We're hiring remote sales professionals in Latin America for our US Clients. Our clients are various lead generation agencies and remote inside sales teams based in the US.

This is a full-time remote, English-speaking role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage in outbound prospecting for potential clients in the US. The primary goal is to schedule introductory meetings for the Account Executives (AEs).

We're looking for salespeople that want to... work for a US company work remotely earn in US dollars

The pay range is between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission

About the role

This is a full-time remote role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage with potential clients, generate leads, conduct sales activities, and contribute to business development efforts. The role will involve daily tasks such as prospecting, qualifying leads, making outbound calls and emails, using , and building relationships with key decision-makers.

Daily Tasks Research accounts and identify key players using tools like , ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc.. Create sequences using outreach tools like Reply, SalesLoft, etc.. Write cold messaging Cold Calls & follow-ups Schedule intro calls for AEs Enter data into the CRM Work with the team to create plans for accounts & campaigns

Qualifications 3+ years of work experience in B2B Sales Fluent in English (full professional proficiency) Experience in outbound prospecting via cold email, cold calling, & Excellent communication skills Ability to work independently and remotely Candidates must be based in Latin America

Additional skills we'd like to see (not required) Experience with sales automation tools (Outreach, SalesLoft, etc...) Experience with lead databases (, ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc...) Experience with CRMs (Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, etc...)

The type of person we're looking for: Solution-oriented - actively looks for solutions to solve a problem Organized - manages their daily and weekly tasks efficiently Well-spoken - Since this is a sales job, being able to communicate well is a must Disciplined - Takes responsibility for finding ways to meet the quota, even if it's hard Driven - Continuous desire to learn and improve Professional - presents themselves well during meetings

Ultimately, we want people who take responsibility for their quota and their own personal development.

What we offer: Pay

- Base Salary ranges between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission Structure USD

- Maximize income by earning in US dollars Remote

- Enjoy the freedom of working from home while being part of a dynamic US-based team Training

- We provide all the tools and training you need to excel in your role and grow your skills. US Economy

- an opportunity to work with great companies and teams that sell into the US market.

Next Steps After you submit your application, we'll ask you to share your resume (must be in English), some highlights from your career, and a 1-minute video of yourself. If you're a fit, we'll schedule a Zoom interview. After the Zoom interview, we'll find a Client(s) for you to interview with. If a Client wants to hire you, then we'll hire you!

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity We are looking for a Senior / Staff Engineer

BASED IN LATAM

with full-stack experience, particularly in back-end, distributed, API-based, and platform systems. Ideally, you have a solid understanding of front-end technologies, including React, and have worked in the credit reporting, financial, and/or accounting sectors. You will play a pivotal role in the future growth of our company during a critical time of transformation. You will be responsible for the

credit reporting and internal services technical systems and direction . You will closely work with various product owners and credit reporting specialists to create and own the product and business initiatives and roadmap pertaining to our credit reporting and internal services strategy. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with senior leadership, key managers, and product owners across the organization (e.g, Product, Credit Reporting Specialists, Operations, Risk Management). Your product and technical guidance along with working through and empowering others will enable new products and improve current ones in order to reach more customers and provide delightful and enriching customer experiences.

You will be working on our next generation back-end services and credit reporting engine that will enable the company to benefit millions of people . This work will allow you to own and lead the development of key features across multiple lines of business. In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach, mentor, and develop our engineers by providing professional training and direct mentorship. You will help recruit, hire, and onboard new talent into the team. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, setting expectations, prioritizing, and delegating. You will exhibit and foster the company's culture and operating principles.

Core Competencies Thoughtful and Adaptable Leadership :

As part of the engineering leadership team, you will help set the direction for all data centric initiatives. You are deliberate in your ability to clearly define the vision and approach. You are able to focus on achieving the big picture while being able to drill down into details to enable, empower, guide, and unblock your teams and individuals. Product and Business Acumen :

You demonstrate ownership and an entrepreneurial mindset. You believe that technology is a tool to be leveraged to delight customers and deliver business value. You are able to articulate the definition of a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) without sacrificing quality. You believe that perfection should not hinder progress. You have experience being a Product Owner and/or Business Owner, producing roadmaps and product/business plans. Technology :

Although there is no expectation for you to be working directly with code on a daily basis, it is expected that you are able to write, review, debug, and test code and systems. You get involved in troubleshooting, building proof of concepts, and architecting systems and features. Your experience as a technologist enables you to optimally function in engineering and data design discussions. You champion automation and look for opportunities to automate and codify manual processes. Compliance and Security :

Security considerations are always top of mind for you. You demonstrate good stewardship of data which is demonstrated in your planning and design approach. You apply compliance and governance considerations to every decision you and your team make; making sure to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. You help the company achieve compliance and security attestations. Empathetic Leader :

Your leadership style sets the tone for communication and collaboration within your teams. You invest time in regular 1:1s with your directs and peers. You provide direction and autonomy to your teams and empower them to deliver within time and budget. You coach and provide regular feedback/advice to growth and develop the individuals in your teams. You leverage radical candor, directness, and kindness when communicating with others. Balance Velocity with Long Term Goals :

You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. Your and your team’s work is of the highest quality and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization. When appropriate, you take shortcuts due to customer or business needs; documenting them and outlining fast-follows to remediate any shortcomings. You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.

Basic Qualifications Very Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience. Strong experience in the

credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry. Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers. Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery. Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java. Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS. Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores. Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures. Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps. Experience managing globally distributed teams. Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.

Above and Beyond Experience in the FinTech or PropTech areas. Experience in a startup environment. Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations. Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.

Key Technologies We Use Cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Backend: Go Frontend: Typescript, Javascript, React Mobile: Flutter Data: MongoDB, PostgreSQL

Benefits Competitive Salary for Series B startup Remote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you. Mission driven company with strong culture

title: Arquiteto de Soluções AWS
description:
A Logicalis valoriza a diversidade, oferecendo iguais oportunidades a todos os candidatos qualificados, independentemente de gênero, raça, orientação sexual, deficiência ou qualquer outra característica.Somos #ArchitectsOfChange.Ajudamos milhares de empresas a se transformarem e terem sucesso em um mundo digital.Acreditamos que a tecnologia pode mudar o mundo e torná-lo um lugar melhor para viver promovendo uma cultura alinhada aos nossos valores: integridade, inovação, excelência, parcerias e empoderamento.Veja como será o seu dia-a-dia:Projetar e implementar soluções escaláveis e seguras utilizando serviços AWS, com foco em alta disponibilidade, desempenho e custo-eficiência.Atuar na migração de workloads para a AWS, definindo arquitetura e soluções de cloud-native.Desenvolver e manter práticas de DevOps, como automação de infraestrutura (IaC), CI/CD, monitoramento e observabilidade.Identificar e implementar soluções de otimização de custos (FinOps) e gerenciamento de capacidade.Trabalhar em colaboração com equipes de segurança para garantir que todas as soluções estejam em conformidade com as melhores práticas de segurança e compliance.Ser referência técnica para o time, promovendo mentorias e revisões de arquitetura.Manter-se atualizado sobre as novas tecnologias e serviços AWS, sugerindo melhorias contínuas para os projetos.O que você precisa para ocupar esta vaga?Certificação completa em AWS

relevantes (como AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional e/ou specialty).Graduação completa.Experiência sólida trabalhando com arquitetura em AWS , no setor

financeiro/banco.Proficiência em serviços como EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC, CloudFormation, CloudFront, entre outros.Conhecimento em automação de infraestrutura usando Terraform, AWS CDK ou CloudFormation.Sólido entendimento de redes, segurança em nuvem e práticas de compliance (IAM, KMS, etc.).Experiência com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban) e práticas DevOps.Capacidade de analisar e otimizar ambientes em cloud com foco em FinOps.Inglês intermediário (para conversação,leitura e escrita).Local de trabalho:

São Paulo, SP. - Disponibilidade para trabalhar no formato híbridoNossos benefícios:Plano de saúdePlano odontológico️ Vale Refeição e AlimentaçãoPrevidência PrivadaSeguro de vidaAuxílio crecheVale transportePrograma de Apoio ao profissionalWellhubBirthday Off

title: Engenheiro Regulatório Sênior
description:
A

Gilbarco Veeder-Root

é a líder mundial em tecnologia de bombas de combustíveis, oferecendo soluções integradas para abastecimento, do tanque à loja de conveniência. ⛽

Estamos com uma vaga para

Engenheiro Regulatório Sênior , que será responsável pelas aprovações de novos produtos e atividades de manutenção no mercado LATAM. Este profissional atuará como Especialista em Assuntos Regulatórios, liderando projetos multifuncionais e construindo relacionamentos com agências reguladoras. É necessário ter experiência com a metodologia LEAN de melhoria contínua, garantir entregas pontuais e dentro do escopo, além de avaliar riscos e desenvolver soluções eficazes que alinhem os projetos às metas de negócios.

Confira as principais responsabilidades desta posição: Trabalhar com agências reguladoras, laboratórios de teste terceirizados e equipes multifuncionais para fornecer aprovações de novos produtos e manter as aprovações existentes durante todo o ciclo de vida do produto; Gerenciar ativamente projetos regulatórios, desde a RFQ até a certificação final e rotulagem do produto, com foco principal na entrega no prazo; Preparar relatórios para a gerência sobre o status do projeto e as principais entregas; Estabelecer relações de trabalho eficazes com agências governamentais e privadas para impulsionar certificações de produtos e atividades de sustentação; Atuar como PME regulatório e de compliance para o mercado LATAM; Atuar como elo entre a empresa e agências governamentais e de terceiros, sendo o principal contato para questões relacionadas a projetos regulatórios; Apoiar a manutenção de arquivos e bancos de dados regulatórios para permitir acesso imediato e preciso às informações regulatórias para novas aprovações e renovações; Fornecer interpretações e impacto de padrões e regulamentos para equipes multifuncionais; Participar de painéis regulatórios e/ou normativos; Participar de projetos de melhoria funcional; Apoiar nossos esforços de estratégia regulatória global.

Requisitos Obrigatórios/Desejáveis: Ensino superior em Engenharia ou experiência equivalente; Experiência anterior trabalhando com órgãos reguladores globais; preferível o conhecimento dos requisitos regulatórios de petróleo e gás. Fluente em inglês e português ou espanhol; Ter disponibilidade para viagens.

Aqui na Gilbarco Veeder-Root oferecemos: Learning - acesso a todos os cursos disponíveis na plataforma; Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de vida em grupo; Vale alimentação - R$ 225,00 no cartão Swile; Previdência privada; Restaurante no local; ❤️‍ Programa de apoio psicossocial; Participação nos lucros e resultados, de acordo com a política global vigente; Licença maternidade de 180 dias e paternidade de 20 dias; Day-off de aniversário; Trabalho Híbrido.

Se essa vaga é pra você, já manda seu CV e vamos conversar! ‍

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
We're hiring remote sales professionals in Latin America for our US Clients. Our clients are various lead generation agencies and remote inside sales teams based in the US.

This is a full-time remote, English-speaking role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage in outbound prospecting for potential clients in the US. The primary goal is to schedule introductory meetings for the Account Executives (AEs).

We're looking for salespeople that want to... work for a US company work remotely earn in US dollars

The pay range is between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission

About the role

This is a full-time remote role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage with potential clients, generate leads, conduct sales activities, and contribute to business development efforts. The role will involve daily tasks such as prospecting, qualifying leads, making outbound calls and emails, using , and building relationships with key decision-makers.

Daily Tasks Research accounts and identify key players using tools like , ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc.. Create sequences using outreach tools like Reply, SalesLoft, etc.. Write cold messaging Cold Calls & follow-ups Schedule intro calls for AEs Enter data into the CRM Work with the team to create plans for accounts & campaigns

Qualifications 3+ years of work experience in B2B Sales Fluent in English (full professional proficiency) Experience in outbound prospecting via cold email, cold calling, & Excellent communication skills Ability to work independently and remotely Candidates must be based in Latin America

Additional skills we'd like to see (not required) Experience with sales automation tools (Outreach, SalesLoft, etc...) Experience with lead databases (, ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc...) Experience with CRMs (Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, etc...)

The type of person we're looking for: Solution-oriented - actively looks for solutions to solve a problem Organized - manages their daily and weekly tasks efficiently Well-spoken - Since this is a sales job, being able to communicate well is a must Disciplined - Takes responsibility for finding ways to meet the quota, even if it's hard Driven - Continuous desire to learn and improve Professional - presents themselves well during meetings

Ultimately, we want people who take responsibility for their quota and their own personal development.

What we offer: Pay

- Base Salary ranges between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission Structure USD

- Maximize income by earning in US dollars Remote

- Enjoy the freedom of working from home while being part of a dynamic US-based team Training

- We provide all the tools and training you need to excel in your role and grow your skills. US Economy

- an opportunity to work with great companies and teams that sell into the US market.

Next Steps After you submit your application, we'll ask you to share your resume (must be in English), some highlights from your career, and a 1-minute video of yourself. If you're a fit, we'll schedule a Zoom interview. After the Zoom interview, we'll find a Client(s) for you to interview with. If a Client wants to hire you, then we'll hire you!

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity

We are looking for a Senior / Staff Engineer

BASED IN LATAM

with full-stack experience, particularly in back-end, distributed, API-based, and platform systems. Ideally, you have a solid understanding of front-end technologies, including React, and have worked in the credit reporting, financial, and/or accounting sectors. You will play a pivotal role in the future growth of our company during a critical time of transformation. You will be responsible for the

credit reporting and internal services technical systems and direction

. You will closely work with various product owners and credit reporting specialists to create and own the product and business initiatives and roadmap pertaining to our credit reporting and internal services strategy. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with senior leadership, key managers, and product owners across the organization (e.g, Product, Credit Reporting Specialists, Operations, Risk Management). Your product and technical guidance along with working through and empowering others will enable new products and improve current ones in order to reach more customers and provide delightful and enriching customer experiences.You will be working on our next generation back-end services and credit reporting engine that will enable the company to benefit millions of people

. This work will allow you to own and lead the development of key features across multiple lines of business. In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach, mentor, and develop our engineers by providing professional training and direct mentorship. You will help recruit, hire, and onboard new talent into the team. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, setting expectations, prioritizing, and delegating. You will exhibit and foster the company's culture and operating principles.Core CompetenciesThoughtful and Adaptable Leadership

:

As part of the engineering leadership team, you will help set the direction for all data centric initiatives. You are deliberate in your ability to clearly define the vision and approach. You are able to focus on achieving the big picture while being able to drill down into details to enable, empower, guide, and unblock your teams and individuals.Product and Business Acumen

:

You demonstrate ownership and an entrepreneurial mindset. You believe that technology is a tool to be leveraged to delight customers and deliver business value. You are able to articulate the definition of a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) without sacrificing quality. You believe that perfection should not hinder progress. You have experience being a Product Owner and/or Business Owner, producing roadmaps and product/business plans.Technology

:

Although there is no expectation for you to be working directly with code on a daily basis, it is expected that you are able to write, review, debug, and test code and systems. You get involved in troubleshooting, building proof of concepts, and architecting systems and features. Your experience as a technologist enables you to optimally function in engineering and data design discussions. You champion automation and look for opportunities to automate and codify manual processes.Compliance and Security

:

Security considerations are always top of mind for you. You demonstrate good stewardship of data which is demonstrated in your planning and design approach. You apply compliance and governance considerations to every decision you and your team make; making sure to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. You help the company achieve compliance and security attestations.Empathetic Leader

:

Your leadership style sets the tone for communication and collaboration within your teams. You invest time in regular 1:1s with your directs and peers. You provide direction and autonomy to your teams and empower them to deliver within time and budget. You coach and provide regular feedback/advice to growth and develop the individuals in your teams. You leverage radical candor, directness, and kindness when communicating with others.Balance Velocity with Long Term Goals

:

You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. Your and your team’s work is of the highest quality and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization. When appropriate, you take shortcuts due to customer or business needs; documenting them and outlining fast-follows to remediate any shortcomings. You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.Basic QualificationsVery Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience.Strong experience in the

credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry.Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers.Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery.Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java.Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS.Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores.Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures.Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps.Experience managing globally distributed teams.Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.Above and BeyondExperience in the FinTech or PropTech areas.Experience in a startup environment.Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations.Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.Key Technologies We UseCloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS)Backend: GoFrontend: Typescript, Javascript, ReactMobile: FlutterData: MongoDB, PostgreSQLBenefitsCompetitive Salary for Series B startupRemote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you.Mission driven company with strong culture

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
A Foursys é um time apaixonado por inovação, design e transformação digital.

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

♿️ Na Foursys, celebramos a diversidade e acreditamos que são as diferentes ideias e perspectivas que nos enriquecem. Portanto, sua cor, religião, gênero, raça, nacionalidade, idade, origem, identidade de gênero, deficiência ou orientação sexual não são barreiras para se juntar à nossa equipe. #VemSerFoursys!

Que tal se juntar a nós e se tornar um(a) #FourTalent? Então se liga nessa oportunidade incrível:

Conhecimento Técnico: Experiência sólida com infraestrutura e automação, utilizando ferramentas como Terraform, Ansible, Puppet ou Chef; Proficiência em linguagens de programação como Python, Go, Bash ou Ruby para automação de tarefas; Experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento e observabilidade (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack); Conhecimento profundo em plataformas de cloud computing (AWS, GCP, Azure); Familiaridade com bancos de dados (SQL e NoSQL), com foco em escalabilidade e performance; Experiência com conteners e orquestração (Docker, Kubernetes); Inglês para comunicação integral (leitura e escrita).

Responsabilidades: Monitorar, manter e melhorar a infraestrutura e sistemas em produção, garantindo alta disponibilidade e escalabilidade; Automatizar processos de deploy, provisionamento e gerenciamento de infraestrutura (IaC - Infrastructure as Code); Trabalhar em conjunto com as equipes de desenvolvimento para identificar gargalos e falhas e implementar soluções de confiabilidade; Gerenciar ferramentas de monitoramento e alertas (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog); Implementar e manter pipelines de CI/CD, garantindo eficiência no desenvolvimento e implantação de código; Gerenciar e otimizar o uso de recursos em cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure); Criar e executar planos de recuperação de desastres e garantir a continuidade dos negócios em caso de falhas; Colaborar na definição de SLAs e SLOs para garantir os padrões de serviço esperados.

Diferenciais: Certificações em cloud computing ou SRE (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Professional Cloud Architect, etc.); Conhecimento de práticas de segurança e devsecops; Experiência com infraestrutura como código em ambientes híbridos; Familiaridade com redes e protocolos de comunicação (TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS).

title: Developer Productivity Engineer
description:
Developer Productivity Engineer #2470

Position Summary:

Our partner, a fast-growing SaaS company known for its IT operations and infrastructure product solutions seeks a Developer Productivity Engineer (DPE) to supercharge developer efficiency across the organization. In this role, you’ll build internal tools, optimize CI/CD pipelines, and champion processes that accelerate product delivery. If you’re a software developer at heart who loves DevOps best practices, thrives on automating workflows, and wants to make a real impact on engineering teams, this is your chance.

Experience and Education:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field. 7+ years of experience in software development, DevOps, or a similar role focused on improving development workflows and productivity. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI). Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and branching strategies. Knowledge of automation frameworks and scripting languages (e.g., Ansible, Python, Go, Shell). Experience with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Exposure to cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Familiarity with monitoring and logging systems to track and improve developer workflows.

Skills and Strengths:

AWS (Amazon Web Services) Auto Scaling Development (Typescript, GO, Java) Tooling and Process Optimization CI/CD Pipeline Optimization IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation, Helm, CDK) Scripting (e.g., Ansible, Python, Bash, Shell) Containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) Code Quality Assurance Version Control Systems Optimizing deployment workflows Monitoring and Metrics Tools (e.g., Grafana, Prometheus, Splunk)

Primary Job Responsibilities:

Build, Enhance and optimize internal tooling/products to improve developer productivity and workflow. Design, develop, and maintain automation tools for deployment, testing, and code quality. Work with engineers to identify challenges in development processes and propose solutions. Improve build and deployment pipelines to reduce friction in the software delivery process. Implement DevOps practices to streamline development, integration, and deployment processes, ensuring smoother collaboration between development and QA teams. Evaluate and

redefine

existing build/test/release pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.) to reduce friction. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the effective integration of tooling and processes. Implement best practices for continuous integration, version control, and performance optimization. Optimize the development environment for efficiency, ensuring that tools and processes align with the needs of the engineering teams. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the development environment, tools, and processes. Ensure successful adoption and integration of new tools, systems, and workflows across teams, providing training and support as needed to improve productivity.
