title: Senior Software Engineer (React)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (React) to work on a project in the data analytics sector.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation.

You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems and you will be responsible for configuring and maintaining tracking solutions for platforms like Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics (GA4), Google AdWords, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Data Management Platforms (DMPs) like LiveRamp, and CDPs like Segment Twilio, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

We are looking for someone with good communication skills, ideally with experience making decisions, being proactive, used to building software from scratch, and with good attention to detail.

What you will do:

Implement and manage third-party marketing and analytics tags/pixels across web and mobile platforms. Integrate and configure CDPs (Segment Twilio, Amperity, Tealium AudienceStream) and align data collection strategies with business goals. Collaborate with marketing, analytics, product, and engineering teams to define tracking requirements and ensure seamless data flow across systems. Draft business requirements documents (BRDs), solution design references (SDRs), and technical implementation guides for tagging and data capture. Develop and maintain data layers to ensure structured and scalable event tracking. Perform QA and troubleshoot tagging issues, ensuring data accuracy through debugging tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and network request monitoring. Ensure privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA) in data collection and align tracking with first-party data strategies and server-side tagging. Collaborate on CDP audience segmentation and activation and enhance attribution capabilities across digital channels.

What you will bring:

Front-end developer with proficiency in JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS with an emphasis on event-based tracking and tag implementation. Ability to draft BRDs, SDRs, and technical documentation for data tracking implementations. Understanding of cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, first-party cookies, and server-side tagging. Knowledge of data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and their impact on data collection and marketing strategies. Excellent troubleshooting and debugging skills using tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and Tag Assistant.

Nice to have:

Hands-on experience with Tag Management Solutions (TMS) like Google Tag Manager (GTM), Adobe Launch, and Tealium iQ. Experience working with 3rd party event tracking, such as Web Analytics (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics / GA4) and Paid Media (e.g. Google AdWords, Meta Pixels, and DMPs (LiveRamp). Familiarity with Customer Data Platforms (CDPs) like Segment Twilio, Adobe Launch, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth: We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

description:

title: Sr Backend Developer - Java
description:

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Tech Lead - Software
description:

title: PO Sênior - Carnê Digital MagaluPay
description:
Sobre o MagaluPay e o Carnê Digital MagaluPay:

No

Magalu , estamos transformando a experiência de consumo dos nossos clientes, e o

Carnê Digital MagaluPay

é uma peça fundamental dessa evolução. Essa nova operação de crédito de consumo oferece uma forma inovadora de pagamento no app, ampliando o poder de compra de nossos clientes com propostas pré-aprovadas. O produto, já estruturado, possui um backlog robusto com inúmeras oportunidades de melhorias e evoluções, identificadas durante as sessões de discovery com times cross-funcionais. Precisamos de alguém que acompanhe de perto o início dessa operação, gerencie entregas do backlog e descubra novas oportunidades por meio da análise de indicadores, feedback do produto e satisfação do cliente.

Responsabilidades:

Priorização do backlog

– Compreender a experiência do cliente e definir prioridades com base em oportunidades identificadas. Coordenação de times

– Colaborar com UX e Tecnologia em todas as etapas de discovery, design, desenvolvimento e deploy. Acompanhamento e impacto

– Monitorar melhorias, avaliar indicadores e garantir impacto positivo na satisfação do cliente. Gestão de roadmap e métricas

– Construir um roadmap estratégico e acompanhar métricas para ajustar o produto conforme os resultados. Comunicação e alinhamento

– Atuar como ponte entre áreas de negócios, UX, tecnologia e stakeholders, garantindo clareza e visibilidade.

Requisitos Essenciais

Planejamento e organização

– Habilidade para gerenciar prazos, detalhes e documentações detalhadas no Confluence. Comunicação e negociação

– Facilidade para alinhar áreas de negócios e stakeholders sobre a evolução do produto. Trabalho multidisciplinar

– Experiência com times diversos, inspirando e orquestrando esforços em torno do propósito do produto. Resolução de problemas

– Capacidade de sintetizar desafios e propor soluções ágeis e inovadoras, considerando tendências de mercado. Metodologias ágeis

– Experiência com Scrum e Kanban para gestão de backlog e entregas. Análise de dados

– Familiaridade com Google Analytics, Looker e SQL para interpretação de métricas de produto. Mapeamento de processos

– Conhecimento em ferramentas como Camunda, Bizagi, Miro ou Lucidchart para diagramas e fluxos. Noções técnicas

– Compreensão básica de arquitetura de software, APIs e integrações para facilitar colaboração com desenvolvedores. Experiência com UX Analytics

– Uso de ferramentas como Hotjar para analisar comportamento do usuário e transformar insights em melhorias.

Diferenciais Experiência no lançamento de produtos digitais, especialmente no setor

financeiro . Conhecimento em produtos de crédito e empréstimo para pessoas físicas. Vivência no acompanhamento de implementações e novos projetos. Habilidade técnica para definir fluxos e processos no desenvolvimento de produtos.

Como é o ambiente de trabalho? Na MagaluPay, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: Analista Contábil Pleno/a
description:
Estamos com uma oportunidade de Analista Contábil Pleno/a, para atuar em nosso escritório sede, localizado na Zonal Sul de São Paulo/SP. Este/a profissional terá estas principais atribuições:

Dominar os procedimentos e conceitos contábeis corporativos inerentes às operações da empresa; Garantir a correta alocação, registro dos lançamentos contábeis, cumprimento das diretrizes financeiras e uso dos manuais de melhores práticas; Apoiar as obras na montagem dos negócios, através do conhecimento das diferentes estruturas societárias (consórcio, SPE, controlada direta); Capacitar as equipes dos projetos que apoia quanto as práticas contábeis (GAAP); Representar a empresa junto a terceiros (auditores, sócios, fornecedores, fisco, etc), dominando os demonstrativos financeiros da operação. Participar ativamente do processo de revisão das consolidações contábeis das empresas do grupo; Analisar variações (balanço e resultado) de forma a garantir o cumprimento dos normativos contábeis vigentes e as diretrizes da companhia; Revisar Demonstrações Financeiras e suas Notas Explicativas, bem como elaborar relatórios para reporte à gerência; Atender à auditoria interna e externa; Atuar na melhoria de processos, desenvolvendo análise crítica de forma a antecipar possíveis riscos; Oferecer suporte técnico aos usuários do sistema contábil, garantindo a correta alocação das transações no plano de contas e dar suporte técnico aos demais integrantes da equipe.

Perfil Requerido: Possuir formação superior completa em Ciências Contábeis; Ter experiência profissional pregressa em empresas de grande porte; Experiência profissional em empresas do ramo de Construção Civil será um diferencial; Deter conhecimentos avançados em Microsoft Excel; Necessário ter disponibilidade para atuar em híbrido na Zona Sul da cidade de São Paulo/SP.

Sobre a OEC :

A OEC é uma empresa que presta serviços nos segmentos de construção civil pesada e construção, montagem e manutenção de empreendimentos industriais, sediada no Brasil e atende além deste país, outros quatro mercados: Angola, Panamá, Peru e República Dominicana. Composta por mais de 10 mil Integrantes, a OEC gera oportunidades de trabalho para as populações locais e contribui para o desenvolvimento sustentável de cada região, atuando nas seguintes áreas:

✔ Transporte e Logística ✔ Energia ✔ Saneamento ✔ Engenharia Industrial ✔ Desenvolvimento Urbano e Edificações

Nossa Cultura :

A Nossa Cultura é um conjunto de princípios, conceitos e critérios, com foco na educação e no trabalho, que provê os fundamentos éticos, morais e conceituais para a atuação dos integrantes do Grupo. Valorizamos potencialidades do ser humano, como a disposição para servir, a capacidade e o desejo de evoluir e a vontade de superar resultados. Acreditamos, com convicção e determinação, que a prática da Cultura OEC e das nossas políticas, com atuação ética, íntegra e transparente e o compromisso em promover a diversidade, nos fortalecem e aumentam a nossa competitividade, no rumo da sobrevivência, do crescimento e da perpetuidade.

title: Middle Sysadmin&Kubernetes Engineer
description:
This is us Qinshift and Avenga merge together to start a new era of technology that matters. Leveraging the power of innovations, we are on a journey to shape the future of work, and we are inviting you to co-create it with us.

This is the job We are looking for a Middle Sysadmin + Kubernetes Engineer to join our team and play a key role in managing and optimizing our infrastructure and containerized environments. You will work with Linux systems, Kubernetes, and networking technologies, ensuring high availability, security, and scalability for our platforms.

This is you Kubernetes Expertise: Deep knowledge of Kubernetes (K8s networking, general configuration, troubleshooting) – certifications like CKA, CKSS, CKAD are a plus. Linux Administration: Strong experience in system configuration, monitoring, and troubleshooting. Networking: In-depth understanding of network protocols, configurations, and security best practices. Storage Management: Experience with storage solutions is a plus. Customer-Facing Experience: Ability to interact with clients, troubleshoot issues, and provide expert guidance. Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Electrical/Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience. English level - upper intermediate or higher.

This is your role Manage and maintain Linux-based systems for high availability and performance. Administer and optimize Kubernetes clusters, ensuring security and efficiency. Troubleshoot and resolve Kubernetes, Linux, and networking issues. Implement monitoring and logging solutions for system health and performance. Work with teams to improve infrastructure automation and deployment processes. Collaborate with clients and stakeholders, providing technical support and best practices.

We take pride in the diverse skills and character of our teams, welcoming everyone to apply and contribute to our collective strength.

title: Developer Productivity Engineer
description:
Developer Productivity Engineer #2470

Position Summary:

Our partner, a fast-growing SaaS company known for its IT operations and infrastructure product solutions seeks a Developer Productivity Engineer (DPE) to supercharge developer efficiency across the organization. In this role, you’ll build internal tools, optimize CI/CD pipelines, and champion processes that accelerate product delivery. If you’re a software developer at heart who loves DevOps best practices, thrives on automating workflows, and wants to make a real impact on engineering teams, this is your chance.

Experience and Education:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field. 7+ years of experience in software development, DevOps, or a similar role focused on improving development workflows and productivity. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI). Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and branching strategies. Knowledge of automation frameworks and scripting languages (e.g., Ansible, Python, Go, Shell). Experience with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Exposure to cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Familiarity with monitoring and logging systems to track and improve developer workflows.

Skills and Strengths:

AWS (Amazon Web Services) Auto Scaling Development (Typescript, GO, Java) Tooling and Process Optimization CI/CD Pipeline Optimization IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation, Helm, CDK) Scripting (e.g., Ansible, Python, Bash, Shell) Containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) Code Quality Assurance Version Control Systems Optimizing deployment workflows Monitoring and Metrics Tools (e.g., Grafana, Prometheus, Splunk)

Primary Job Responsibilities:

Build, Enhance and optimize internal tooling/products to improve developer productivity and workflow. Design, develop, and maintain automation tools for deployment, testing, and code quality. Work with engineers to identify challenges in development processes and propose solutions. Improve build and deployment pipelines to reduce friction in the software delivery process. Implement DevOps practices to streamline development, integration, and deployment processes, ensuring smoother collaboration between development and QA teams. Evaluate and

redefine

existing build/test/release pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.) to reduce friction. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the effective integration of tooling and processes. Implement best practices for continuous integration, version control, and performance optimization. Optimize the development environment for efficiency, ensuring that tools and processes align with the needs of the engineering teams. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the development environment, tools, and processes. Ensure successful adoption and integration of new tools, systems, and workflows across teams, providing training and support as needed to improve productivity.

description:

title: Atendente de Loja - Goiânia
description:
A Swift tem a missão de alimentar uma vida melhor através de produtos de qualidade, uma boa culinária e um atendimento amigável que ajuda a construir lembranças memoráveis na mesa dos nossos clientes. Nossa missão também se estende na vida de cada colaborador que representa a nossa marca. Aqui, cuidamos das nossas pessoas, pois acreditamos que é o nosso bem mais precioso, proporcionando um ambiente de trabalho leve e com um clima agradável, no qual todos são respeitados e valorizados, independente de raça, gênero, etnia, orientação sexual ou deficiências. Além disso, aqui na Swift, trabalhamos muito para que o nosso time cresça conosco, podendo construir uma carreira emocionante junto a nós, tendo a possibilidade de fazer a diferença.

Então, se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser e quer ajudar a construir essa história, convidamos você a fazer parte do nosso time!

Responsabilidades: O principal papel do Atendente de Loja na Swift é ser

especialista , com foco em oferecer a melhor experiência e solução para o cliente, sendo

embaixador da marca Swift .

Principais Atividades: Atendimento com foco na melhor solução para o cliente; Garantir a melhor experiência do cliente com a marca; Venda consultiva e especializada nos produtos; Operação de caixa / PDV; Recebimento e armazenamento de mercadorias; Abastecimento da loja; PVPS (FIFO): organização direcionada aos produtos que chegam primeiro e com vencimento mais próximo; Organização da câmara fria e estoque seco (alinhamento e etiquetagem); Garantir a limpeza e a organização geral da loja.

Requisitos e qualificações: Idade superior a 18 anos; Residir próximo às lojas; Disponibilidade para trabalhar aos finais de semana e feriados.

DESEJÁVEL: Ensino médio completo; Vivência de 2 anos de experiência em vendas, atendimento ao cliente; Ter atuado no segmento de varejo; Cursos em vendas ou atendimento.

O QUE ESPERAMOS DE VOCÊ:

Nossos Valores (JBS); Brilho nos olhos, alta energia e entusiasmo; Interesse pela marca e desejo por crescer com a Swift; Gostar de cozinhar e/ou fazer churrasco; Comprometimento e estabilidade na carreira; Gostar de trabalhar em equipe; Comunicar-se de forma influente; Protagonismo na vida; Ser ágil nas atividades cotidianas e inquietude; Obstinação por atingir objetivos.

Vale-Refeição e Vale-Alimentação flexível, para usar como quiser; Vale-Transporte; Experiência Swift (mensalmente oferecemos um produto diferenciado para que todos os nossos colaboradores possam experimentar, se deliciar e aprimorar seus argumentos de venda); Acesso ao Sempre JBS (aplicativo interno): Sempre Cuida: oferece acesso gratuito para cuidar do seu bem-estar (saúde mental, física, nutricional, dentre outras); Sempre Educa: disponibiliza conteúdos de treinamentos corporativos, incentivando o seu desenvolvimento profissional; Sempre Cresce: dedicado a oportunidades de carreira no grupo JBS, para que você possa crescer com a gente! Compras na loja com repasse em folha; Parceria com o Gympass (convênio de academias); Assistência Médica/Odontológica e Seguro de vida (opcionais); Descontos em Instituições de Ensino e de Idiomas (opcional).

title: Representante Comercial PJ - RC Cuiaba - MT - CROP SOLUTIONS
description:
Você conhece a HELM?

A HELM é uma empresa familiar com atuação global, sediada em Hamburgo, na Alemanha, com 125 anos de atuação no mercado especializado em produtos químicos, produtos para indústria farmacêutica, fertilizantes especais, defensivos agrícolas e agricultura digital. Atua em 30 países e conta com mais de 100 subsidiárias, escritórios de vendas e 1.500 funcionários.

No Brasil, a HELM atua com importação e exportação há 50 anos, comercializando soluções em proteção de cultivos para o produtor rural, além da atuação no segmento químico, desempenhando um papel relevante no mercado brasileiro. Sempre contando com fornecedores certificados e com processos produtivos com qualidade atestada. Saiba mais: br.helmcrop.com

Representante Comercial PJ / Cuiaba - MT- CROP SOLUTIONS

DESCRIÇÃO DA VAGA: Principais Atividades: Desenvolver a região , fortalecer a marca da HELM através da promoção de seus produtos, geração de demandas, assistência técnica , desenvolvimento dos distribuidores e/ou produtores da região, com visão de negócios para atingimento de metas em venda de produtos e serviços. Atuar no fortalecimento de parceria e relacionamento comercial com os clientes, gerando oportunidades de negócios, atuando com venda direta e distribuidores.

Requisitos e Competências: • Graduação concluída em Engenharia Agronômica, com CREA e CORE ATIVOS. • Experiência anterior na função de vendas, atendimento a distribuidores , experiência em venda direta; • Analisar o território e determinar quais clientes mais adequados para acessar o mercado e realizar as vendas de acordo com as políticas comerciais da empresa; • Analisar o crédito e fornecer os documentos comprovativos necessários de forma a cumprir o procedimento definido pela equipe de crédito e cobrança; • Desenvolver um plano de negócios para a área de cobertura (região), incluindo orçamento, análise de crédito, estratégia e acesso ao mercado, análise dos clientes; • Fazer o Forecast da área, a fim de fornecer informações para o Gestor e demais departamentos; • Fazer visitas regulares a estes clientes de venda direta para implementação de políticas comerciais de forma a cumprir as metas de vendas, volume e targets, em alinhamento com o forecast e budget; • Gerir as informações da região de atuação, relatórios e demais solicitações de informações feitas pela empresa; • Identificar oportunidades e fornecer informações estratégicas para definir o melhor posicionamento do produto para sua área responsável, junto à equipe de gestão; • Implementar posicionamento de produtos e campanhas de marketing, de acordo com as estratégias e orientações de marketing; • Ministrar treinamentos, palestras, dias de campo em clientes chave, a fim de posicionar a empresa em alinhamento com os rumos e metas corporativas. • Planejamento e gerenciamento de vendas; • Execução de dias de campo e campos demonstrativos • Conhecimento da dinâmica do mercado em cultura de soja, milho, feijão, sorgo e algodão. • Impacto e Influência/Visão Estratégica/Iniciativa/Relacionamento/Negociação/ Organização/Resiliência/Liderança e Foco no cliente e no Resultado. • Disponibilidade de viagens

Área de atuação

: Região de Cuiabá - MT. Área com alto potencial em vendas diretas e distribuidores, bem como com uma forte expansão em soja e milho como os principais cultivos , tendo como cultivos de segunda opção feijão, sorgo e algodão. Modelo de Contrato:

Representante Comercial (PJ)

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description:
Open Video project is focused on OTT platform development for one of the largest North American TV providers. We are looking for QA Automation Engineer to assess software quality through automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities: • Review and analyze system specifications • Execute test cases and analyze results • Create logs to document testing phases and defects • Report bugs and errors to development teams • Help troubleshoot issues • Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing • Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle • Selection or identification of test cases for automation. • Creating an automation test plan. • Automation framework design and implementation according to the project structure. • Creating, Enhancing, Debugging, and Running Test Cases. • Organizing, monitoring defect management process Handling changes and conducting regression tests. • Find solutions for issues related to object identity issues and error handling. • Interaction with the people of the client-side to solve problems and update the situation. • Conduct performance testing to verify system scalability, efficiency, and reliability. • Create a test summary report for management review. • Analyze the underlying causes of performance issues and provide corrective action. • Suggest new tools and techniques to improve test efficiency. • Help in project planning, scheduling, budget, and tracking activities. • Assist in project design, development, and deployment activities. • Develop automated test scenarios and environments for performance testing. • Review and recommend improvements in existing test procedures.

Mandatory Skills Description: • Good written/verbal communication skills. • Experience in writing test cases • Good problem-solving, and analytical abilities • Good planning, organizational, and follow-up skills. • Experience in testing Android platforms • Familiar with Git, JIRA, Bitbucket, Jenkins. • Experience with Agile Development. • Development experience with Java, Appium, Selenium, Webdriver.io. • Knowledge and use of Android Studio, Charles Proxy, ADB logcat

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: • Experience with AndroidTV is a plus

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

description:

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity We are looking for a Senior / Staff Engineer

BASED IN LATAM

with full-stack experience, particularly in back-end, distributed, API-based, and platform systems. Ideally, you have a solid understanding of front-end technologies, including React, and have worked in the credit reporting, financial, and/or accounting sectors. You will play a pivotal role in the future growth of our company during a critical time of transformation. You will be responsible for the

credit reporting and internal services technical systems and direction . You will closely work with various product owners and credit reporting specialists to create and own the product and business initiatives and roadmap pertaining to our credit reporting and internal services strategy. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with senior leadership, key managers, and product owners across the organization (e.g, Product, Credit Reporting Specialists, Operations, Risk Management). Your product and technical guidance along with working through and empowering others will enable new products and improve current ones in order to reach more customers and provide delightful and enriching customer experiences.

You will be working on our next generation back-end services and credit reporting engine that will enable the company to benefit millions of people . This work will allow you to own and lead the development of key features across multiple lines of business. In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach, mentor, and develop our engineers by providing professional training and direct mentorship. You will help recruit, hire, and onboard new talent into the team. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, setting expectations, prioritizing, and delegating. You will exhibit and foster the company's culture and operating principles.

Core Competencies Thoughtful and Adaptable Leadership :

As part of the engineering leadership team, you will help set the direction for all data centric initiatives. You are deliberate in your ability to clearly define the vision and approach. You are able to focus on achieving the big picture while being able to drill down into details to enable, empower, guide, and unblock your teams and individuals. Product and Business Acumen :

You demonstrate ownership and an entrepreneurial mindset. You believe that technology is a tool to be leveraged to delight customers and deliver business value. You are able to articulate the definition of a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) without sacrificing quality. You believe that perfection should not hinder progress. You have experience being a Product Owner and/or Business Owner, producing roadmaps and product/business plans. Technology :

Although there is no expectation for you to be working directly with code on a daily basis, it is expected that you are able to write, review, debug, and test code and systems. You get involved in troubleshooting, building proof of concepts, and architecting systems and features. Your experience as a technologist enables you to optimally function in engineering and data design discussions. You champion automation and look for opportunities to automate and codify manual processes. Compliance and Security :

Security considerations are always top of mind for you. You demonstrate good stewardship of data which is demonstrated in your planning and design approach. You apply compliance and governance considerations to every decision you and your team make; making sure to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. You help the company achieve compliance and security attestations. Empathetic Leader :

Your leadership style sets the tone for communication and collaboration within your teams. You invest time in regular 1:1s with your directs and peers. You provide direction and autonomy to your teams and empower them to deliver within time and budget. You coach and provide regular feedback/advice to growth and develop the individuals in your teams. You leverage radical candor, directness, and kindness when communicating with others. Balance Velocity with Long Term Goals :

You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. Your and your team’s work is of the highest quality and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization. When appropriate, you take shortcuts due to customer or business needs; documenting them and outlining fast-follows to remediate any shortcomings. You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.

Basic Qualifications Very Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience. Strong experience in the

credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry. Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers. Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery. Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java. Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS. Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores. Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures. Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps. Experience managing globally distributed teams. Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.

Above and Beyond Experience in the FinTech or PropTech areas. Experience in a startup environment. Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations. Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.

Key Technologies We Use Cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Backend: Go Frontend: Typescript, Javascript, React Mobile: Flutter Data: MongoDB, PostgreSQL

Benefits Competitive Salary for Series B startup Remote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you. Mission driven company with strong culture

title: Security Operations Center Analyst
description:
Long term contract for American Company

A Tier 3 SOC Analyst serves as a critical escalation point and deeper investigation resource within the SOC structure. They are expected to possess a more advanced skillset and broader knowledge base than Tier 2 analysts, allowing them to handle more complex security incidents and contribute to proactive security measures.

I. Incident Investigation and Analysis Advanced Alert Triage and Analysis Thoroughly investigate security alerts escalated from Tier 2 or directly generated by security tools. Reconstruct event timelines, analyze logs across multiple systems, and correlate disparate data points. Deeply understand the context of security incidents, including affected assets, business impact, and potential attack vectors. Differentiate between true positives, false positives, and potential false negatives. Provide actionable guidance to Tier 2 analysts and relevant teams on containment and remediation actions.

Complex Security Incident Handling Lead investigations for complex incidents, such as APTs, malware outbreaks, or significant data breaches. Perform malware analysis, including sandbox reports and identification of indicators of compromise (IOCs). Conduct network traffic analysis using tools like Wireshark to identify malicious activity. Perform endpoint forensic investigations using EDR tools to analyze process execution and registry modifications. Analyze logs across SIEMs, firewalls, and operating systems to identify advanced threats.

II. Threat Intelligence and Proactive Security Threat Intelligence Utilization Actively consume and integrate threat intelligence into security investigations. Contextualize threats by identifying potential threat actors and their tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs). Participate in threat hunting activities based on threat intelligence and anomaly detection.

Detection Engineering and Improvement Tune and optimize detection rules in SIEM, IDS/IPS, and EDR tools to reduce false positives. Identify gaps in detection coverage and propose improvements. Develop new detection rules under the guidance of senior analysts.

III. Tooling, Technology, and Technical Proficiency Advanced Security Tool Proficiency Proficiently use SIEM platforms for alert analysis, correlation, and reporting. Expertly leverage EDR tools for endpoint investigation, containment, and forensic analysis. Analyze firewall logs and contribute to rule tuning. Understand IDS/IPS principles and review alerts for suspicious activity.

Scripting and Automation Develop scripts in Python or PowerShell to automate security processes and data analysis.

IV. Collaboration, Communication, and Escalation Collaboration with Tier 2 and Other Teams Provide guidance and mentorship to Tier 2 analysts. Communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. Escalate complex or high-severity incidents to the Incident Response Team with proper documentation.

V. Knowledge of Threat Actor Tools, Tactics, and Behavior Understanding of TTPs Possess strong knowledge of common attack vectors (phishing, malware, web application attacks). Understand attacker methodologies across different attack stages (reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, etc.). Stay updated on emerging cyber threats and attack trends.

title: Latin American Overseas Market Promotion Advanced Specialist
description: ResponsibilitiesLead Channel Expansion: Take the lead in guiding business regions/overseas branches to set goals and expansion paths for channel expansion and store upgrades. Coordinate resources to drive breakthroughs in overseas untapped channels and promote the expansion and activation of retail touchpoints.Lead Terminal Improvement: Be responsible for the brand display and terminal image management of retail stores to ensure compliance with brand standards. Plan and optimize in-store product displays to enhance the brand's exposure and sales conversion rate at the terminal. Monitor the sales situation of retail terminals, analyze data and put forward optimization suggestions to improve sales efficiency.Assist in Localized Product Selling-point Packaging (Unify the Selling-points of Midea Brand in the Region): Collaborate with the Business Unit (BU) to formulate product packaging strategies and ensure the consistency of strategies in Latin America.Assist in Pre-sales Training: Be responsible for pre-sales product training for overseas branches, including but not limited to product selling-point knowledge, competitor benchmarking, and sales skills.QualificationsA bachelor's degree or above is required. Majors related to marketing, international trade, business administration, etc. are preferred.More than 3 years of experience in trade marketing, channel marketing, or market promotion is required. Experience in the household appliance industry is preferred.Relevant overseas experience is required. A basic command of English is necessary, and a basic knowledge of Spanish or Portuguese is also required.

Será diferencial o conhecimento em projetos com IA.• Power Virtual Agents (PVA): Criação e gestão de chatbots.• Microsoft Fabric: Administração de Data Lakes.• Gestão de changes e incidentes.• Formação superior em: Ciência da Computação, Informática, Engenharia ou áreas afins.Na TIM, o seu bem-estar é o nosso bem-estar, por isso o programa Conexão Bem + Estar tem o propósito de fortalecer o cuidado genuíno da TIM com o TIMe e suas famílias, por meio de iniciativas práticas em diversas frentes para todos e todas estarem sempre bem, na vida pessoal e profissional.Fique por dentro dos nossos benefícios:• Programa de Benefícios Flexíveis• Assistência Médica e Odontológica *• Benefício Medicamentos *• Wellhub (ex-Gympass) *• Vale Alimentação e/ou Refeição• Programa de Bem-Estar Financeiro• Previdência Privada• Aparelho celular com Internet Ilimitada e franquia de Voz• Convênios e Parcerias com mais de 3.000 empresas e instituições, incluindo parcerias para desconto na sua conta de luz e internet banda larga• Curso de inglês online extensível a 1 familiar ou amigo• Programa de Treinamento e Capacitação Internos• Participação nos Lucros• Meu primeiro benefício - Auxílio para filhos até 2 anos de idade• Reembolso Creche (para pais ou mães)• Modelos de trabalho e jornada flexíveis• Happy Day - Dia de folga no mês do aniversário• Licenças estendidas para maternidade, paternidade, casamento e adoção• Vale TransporteE outros!* Extensível a dependentes legais

title: Representante Comercial PJ - RC Rondonópolis - CROP SOLUTIONS
description:
Você conhece a HELM? A HELM é uma empresa familiar com atuação global, sediada em Hamburgo, na Alemanha, com 125 anos de atuação no mercado especializado em produtos químicos, produtos para indústria farmacêutica, fertilizantes especais, defensivos agrícolas e agricultura digital. Atua em 30 países e conta com mais de 100 subsidiárias, escritórios de vendas e 1.500 funcionários.

No Brasil, a HELM atua com importação e exportação há 50 anos, comercializando soluções em proteção de cultivos para o produtor rural, além da atuação no segmento químico, desempenhando um papel relevante no mercado brasileiro. Sempre contando com fornecedores certificados e com processos produtivos com qualidade atestada. Saiba mais: br.helmcrop.com

Representante Comercial PJ / Rondonópolis - MT - CROP SOLUTIONS

DESCRIÇÃO DA VAGA: Principais Atividades: Desenvolver a região , fortalecer a marca da HELM através da promoção de seus produtos, geração de demandas, assistência técnica , desenvolvimento dos distribuidores e/ou produtores da região, com visão de negócios para atingimento de metas em venda de produtos e serviços. Atuar no fortalecimento de parceria e relacionamento comercial com os clientes, gerando oportunidades de negócios, atuando com venda direta e distribuidores.

Requisitos e Competências: • Graduação concluída em Engenharia Agronômica, com CREA e CORE ATIVOS. • Experiência anterior na função de vendas, atendimento a distribuidores , experiência em venda direta; • Analisar o território e determinar quais clientes mais adequados para acessar o mercado e realizar as vendas de acordo com as políticas comerciais da empresa; • Analisar o crédito e fornecer os documentos comprovativos necessários de forma a cumprir o procedimento definido pela equipe de crédito e cobrança; • Desenvolver um plano de negócios para a área de cobertura (região), incluindo orçamento, análise de crédito, estratégia e acesso ao mercado, análise dos clientes; • Fazer o Forecast da área, a fim de fornecer informações para o Gestor e demais departamentos; • Fazer visitas regulares a estes clientes de venda direta para implementação de políticas comerciais de forma a cumprir as metas de vendas, volume e targets, em alinhamento com o forecast e budget; • Gerir as informações da região de atuação, relatórios e demais solicitações de informações feitas pela empresa; • Identificar oportunidades e fornecer informações estratégicas para definir o melhor posicionamento do produto para sua área responsável, junto à equipe de gestão; • Implementar posicionamento de produtos e campanhas de marketing, de acordo com as estratégias e orientações de marketing; • Ministrar treinamentos, palestras, dias de campo em clientes chave, a fim de posicionar a empresa em alinhamento com os rumos e metas corporativas. • Planejamento e gerenciamento de vendas; • Execução de dias de campo e campos demonstrativos • Conhecimento da dinâmica do mercado em cultura de soja, milho, feijão, sorgo e algodão. • Impacto e Influência/Visão Estratégica/Iniciativa/Relacionamento/Negociação/ Organização/Resiliência/Liderança e Foco no cliente e no Resultado. • Disponibilidade de viagens

Área de atuação : Rondonópolis - MT. Área com alto potencial em vendas diretas e distribuidores, bem como com uma forte expansão em soja e milho como os principais cultivos , tendo como cultivos de segunda opção feijão, sorgo e algodão. Modelo de Contrato:

Representante Comercial (PJ)

title: Analista de recursos humanos sênior
description:
Act in a generalist manner in the Training and Development, Attraction and Selection, Performance Management, Labor Relations, Internal Communication and General Affairs subsystems; Handle personnel management activities, including hiring processes, terminations, vacations and other personnel demands. Ensure compliance and efficiency in processes related to employee management and General Affairs Projects required by Labor Law, including third party management. Support the HR Manager on the department main projects: Career Development Plan, Performance Management and Succession Plan Ensure that all human resources policies and processes are in compliance with Brazilian labor laws and other local regulations. Monitor and mitigate labor risks, proposing continuous improvements to minimize liabilities and ensure a safe and legally protected environment; Establish and maintain effective channels of communication with employees, Promote organizational culture.

Advanced English language is mandatory Experience in HR, including payroll

title: Pessoa Gerente Comercial Pré-Vendas
description:
Sobre a vaga #Nosso jeito de fazer história: Entre para a história de construção do maior Hub de Dados e Analytics do Brasil. Além de contribuir diretamente para este objetivo, você estará se desenvolvendo constantemente por meio de grandes desafios de negócios, junto a um time de alto impacto. Na Neoway, acreditamos em fazer as coisas de forma inovadora, colaborativa, responsável e com foco no cliente.

Estamos em busca de uma

Pessoa Gerente Comercial - Pré Vendas

para liderar a equipe de pré-vendas, garantindo o fluxo contínuo de oportunidades de negócios para o time de vendas. Você será o elo estratégico entre marketing e vendas, otimizando processos e impulsionando o crescimento da empresa. Sua missão será assegurar que a equipe esteja alinhada, capacitada e motivada para alcançar resultados.

Responsabilidades e atribuições: Assegurar a realização de reuniões qualificadas diárias para o time de vendas de cada vertical, garantindo um fluxo constante de oportunidades de negócios. Colaborar com os líderes e coordenadores de marketing e vendas de cada vertical, identificando oportunidades de otimização e ajustes nos processos para melhorar a performance geral. Promover o desenvolvimento contínuo da equipe por meio de treinamentos regulares, feedbacks e revisão de processos, garantindo a excelência no desempenho de pré-vendas. Supervisionar a gestão e organização do pipeline pela equipe de pré-vendas, garantindo uma estrutura eficiente e transparente de acompanhamento de oportunidades. Responsabilizar-se pelo cumprimento dos OKRs (Objetivos e Resultados Chave) estabelecidos para o time de pré-vendas. Acompanhar de forma estratégica o controle e as entregas previstas no planejamento anual de pré-vendas, garantindo o alinhamento com as metas da empresa. Mensurar KPIs relevantes, realizar a análise de resultados e fornecer insights para a melhoria contínua dos processos de pré-vendas. Conduzir reuniões de 1:1 com os membros da equipe, oferecendo apoio técnico e orientações para garantir o sucesso nas atividades diárias.

Requisitos: Experiência em liderança de equipes comerciais, desenvolvimento de estratégias de marketing e gestão de relacionamento com clientes, com foco em resultados e engajamento. Domínio de técnicas avançadas de vendas, como SPIN Selling, construção de Rapport e gerenciamento de Funil de Vendas, visando otimização do processo de vendas e maximização de resultados. Conhecimento aprofundado e experiência prática com ferramentas de CRM (Customer Relationship Management), para otimização do gerenciamento de clientes, análise de dados e automação de processos. Formação superior completa.

#NeoJourney l Cardápio de Benefícios:

Vale Alimentação/Refeição; Plano de Assistência médica e odontológica; ‍‍ Licença Maternidade e paternidade estendida; PPR (Programa de participação de resultados); ️‍♀️Gympass - plataforma que te dá acesso a mais de 18 mil academias no Brasil. Nas academias conveniadas são oferecidas mais de 700 modalidades esportivas; Wellz - plataforma de saúde mental e bem estar, com terapia gratuita e muito mais; Ginástica Laboral (presencial) 1x na semana; Quick Massagem (presencial) 2x mês; Auxílio Creche; Day off no aniversário; Seguro de Vida; Parcerias Educacionais com Faculdades e Escolas de Ensino.

Mais sobre o Universo Neoway: Unimos forças com a B3, a maior potência de dados do país. Nossa meta é entrar para a história, e o capítulo deste ano é sobre acelerar. Todos e todas do time são essenciais para escrevermos este capítulo! Entendemos que as jornadas na Neoway são únicas, feitas pela soma do DNA Neoway + o potencial de cada colaborador(a).

#Somos Mudança: Acreditamos na potência da diversidade. Sabemos que temos um longo caminho pela frente, por isso estamos constantemente aprendendo e criando iniciativas para fortalecer a diversidade e inclusão. E essa jornada conta com o apoio dos nossos grupos de afinidade: #NeoLadies #NeoOba e #NeoPride, todos com o propósito de traduzir nossas mudanças internas em responsabilidade como cidadãos.

title: Tech Lead - Software
description:

﻿

Requisitos

Modalidade de Trabalho Carga horária: 168 horas mensais Modelo de contrato: PJ Formato: Remoto

Processo Seletivo 1- Teste técnico de múltipla escolha:  2 - Entrevista com a área de Pessoas 3 - Teste para codar: 3 - Entrevista com o time técnico

Se interessou? Basta fazer o primeiro teste (múltipla escolha) que já estará no processo seletivo!

title: Senior Software Engineer (React)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (React) to work on a project in the data analytics sector.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation.

You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems and you will be responsible for configuring and maintaining tracking solutions for platforms like Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics (GA4), Google AdWords, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Data Management Platforms (DMPs) like LiveRamp, and CDPs like Segment Twilio, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

We are looking for someone with good communication skills, ideally with experience making decisions, being proactive, used to building software from scratch, and with good attention to detail.

What you will do:

Implement and manage third-party marketing and analytics tags/pixels across web and mobile platforms. Integrate and configure CDPs (Segment Twilio, Amperity, Tealium AudienceStream) and align data collection strategies with business goals. Collaborate with marketing, analytics, product, and engineering teams to define tracking requirements and ensure seamless data flow across systems. Draft business requirements documents (BRDs), solution design references (SDRs), and technical implementation guides for tagging and data capture. Develop and maintain data layers to ensure structured and scalable event tracking. Perform QA and troubleshoot tagging issues, ensuring data accuracy through debugging tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and network request monitoring. Ensure privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA) in data collection and align tracking with first-party data strategies and server-side tagging. Collaborate on CDP audience segmentation and activation and enhance attribution capabilities across digital channels.

What you will bring:

Front-end developer with proficiency in JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS with an emphasis on event-based tracking and tag implementation. Ability to draft BRDs, SDRs, and technical documentation for data tracking implementations. Understanding of cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, first-party cookies, and server-side tagging. Knowledge of data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and their impact on data collection and marketing strategies. Excellent troubleshooting and debugging skills using tools like Chrome DevTools, Adobe Debugger, and Tag Assistant.

Nice to have:

Hands-on experience with Tag Management Solutions (TMS) like Google Tag Manager (GTM), Adobe Launch, and Tealium iQ. Experience working with 3rd party event tracking, such as Web Analytics (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics / GA4) and Paid Media (e.g. Google AdWords, Meta Pixels, and DMPs (LiveRamp). Familiarity with Customer Data Platforms (CDPs) like Segment Twilio, Adobe Launch, Amperity, and Tealium AudienceStream.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth: We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

We proudly serve more than 1500 customers through a vast and extremely complete portfolio, which includes the latest in technology, serving various sectors of the national and international market.

Required Skills: Hands on experience in building & maintaining Test Automation Framework using Java or C#; Experience using tools/languages like JIRA, Selenium, Cucumber, Karate, Jenkins, GitHub etc. Analyse, Troubleshoot, Fix issue in Test Automation Framework; Design, Develop new feature in Automation Framework and release to various automation teams; Strong understanding of SDLC in Agile Methodologies; Excellent analytical skills with the ability to identify potential issues early on; Strong communication & collaboration skills to work seamlessly with various stakeholders.

Responsibilities: Employee will be part of Test COE group, responsible to deploy automation Framework build on Java / C#; Requirements Understanding: Analyse product specifications, User stories & comprehend detailed requirements; Participate in story gathering, story pointing; Automation Framework maintenance, add new feature, fix issue etc; Develop and support various automation team to adapt Automation Framework; Self-starter, getting job done without any follow up,

Wipro is an equal company that offers employment opportunities to all people, carrying out a selection process that does not consider race, sex, nationality, ancestry, disability, sexual orientation or any other status protected by applicable law.

title: Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
About Ultahost Ultahost is a leader in premium web hosting services, delivering exceptional solutions to clients worldwide. Our mission is to innovate, empower, and foster a thriving technology ecosystem by attracting top technical talent.

Role Overview We are seeking an experienced

Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist

with a deep understanding of programming languages, frameworks, and IT technologies. This role involves sourcing, evaluating, and onboarding top-tier candidates specializing in

programming frameworks ,

hosting technologies , and

IT infrastructure .

Key Responsibilities

Identify, interview, and manage the hiring process for talented professionals in critical technical roles such as Full Stack, Frontend, Backend, and DevOps. Collaborate with hiring managers to define role requirements and expectations for technical positions. Source, evaluate, and shortlist candidates for positions requiring expertise in: Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, and others. Front-End Frameworks: Next.js, React.js, and Angular. Back-End Frameworks: Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, and Golang. Hosting Technologies: OpenLiteSpeed, NGINX, Apache, and Docker environments. IT Infrastructure: Networking, Linux operating systems, and cloud hosting platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Assess candidates’ technical knowledge through interviews and problem-solving exercises tailored to specific domains. Build a robust pipeline of highly skilled technical talent using modern tools and strategies. Maintain an up-to-date knowledge base of emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends. Utilize platforms like , job boards, and professional networks effectively to find and engage candidates. Coordinate interview logistics and ensure a seamless candidate experience. Collaborate with team leads to provide market insights and recommendations on hiring strategies.

Requirements Proven experience (3+ years) as a Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist or in a similar role. Strong technical understanding of programming frameworks and languages: Front-end: Next.js, React.js, Angular. Back-end: Node.js, Nest.js, Golang, Express.js. Programming: JavaScript, Python, Go. Familiarity with hosting technologies and IT infrastructure, including Linux systems, NGINX, Apache, and cloud platforms. Excellent ability to assess technical competencies through structured interviews. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with a focus on building relationships with candidates and hiring managers. Fluent in English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficiency in using ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) and recruitment platforms. Excellent communication and interview skills.

Nice-to-Have Skills Hands-on coding or technical background in IT-related fields. Experience in hiring for hosting environments and DevOps roles. Familiarity with additional frameworks like Django, Ruby on Rails, and Flask. Understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Certifications in recruitment or technical fields.

What We Offer Competitive Salary in USD Fully remote work with a flexible schedule. Opportunities for career advancement in a fast-paced, global company. A supportive, innovation-driven work culture. Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and recruitment practices.

title: Developer Productivity Engineer
description:
Developer Productivity Engineer #2470

Position Summary:

Our partner, a fast-growing SaaS company known for its IT operations and infrastructure product solutions seeks a Developer Productivity Engineer (DPE) to supercharge developer efficiency across the organization. In this role, you’ll build internal tools, optimize CI/CD pipelines, and champion processes that accelerate product delivery. If you’re a software developer at heart who loves DevOps best practices, thrives on automating workflows, and wants to make a real impact on engineering teams, this is your chance.

Experience and Education:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field. 7+ years of experience in software development, DevOps, or a similar role focused on improving development workflows and productivity. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI). Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and branching strategies. Knowledge of automation frameworks and scripting languages (e.g., Ansible, Python, Go, Shell). Experience with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Exposure to cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Familiarity with monitoring and logging systems to track and improve developer workflows.

Skills and Strengths:

AWS (Amazon Web Services) Auto Scaling Development (Typescript, GO, Java) Tooling and Process Optimization CI/CD Pipeline Optimization IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation, Helm, CDK) Scripting (e.g., Ansible, Python, Bash, Shell) Containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) Code Quality Assurance Version Control Systems Optimizing deployment workflows Monitoring and Metrics Tools (e.g., Grafana, Prometheus, Splunk)

Primary Job Responsibilities:

Build, Enhance and optimize internal tooling/products to improve developer productivity and workflow. Design, develop, and maintain automation tools for deployment, testing, and code quality. Work with engineers to identify challenges in development processes and propose solutions. Improve build and deployment pipelines to reduce friction in the software delivery process. Implement DevOps practices to streamline development, integration, and deployment processes, ensuring smoother collaboration between development and QA teams. Evaluate and

redefine

existing build/test/release pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.) to reduce friction. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the effective integration of tooling and processes. Implement best practices for continuous integration, version control, and performance optimization. Optimize the development environment for efficiency, ensuring that tools and processes align with the needs of the engineering teams. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the development environment, tools, and processes. Ensure successful adoption and integration of new tools, systems, and workflows across teams, providing training and support as needed to improve productivity.

title: Middle Sysadmin&Kubernetes Engineer
description:
This is us Qinshift and Avenga merge together to start a new era of technology that matters. Leveraging the power of innovations, we are on a journey to shape the future of work, and we are inviting you to co-create it with us.

This is the job We are looking for a Middle Sysadmin + Kubernetes Engineer to join our team and play a key role in managing and optimizing our infrastructure and containerized environments. You will work with Linux systems, Kubernetes, and networking technologies, ensuring high availability, security, and scalability for our platforms.

This is you Kubernetes Expertise: Deep knowledge of Kubernetes (K8s networking, general configuration, troubleshooting) – certifications like CKA, CKSS, CKAD are a plus. Linux Administration: Strong experience in system configuration, monitoring, and troubleshooting. Networking: In-depth understanding of network protocols, configurations, and security best practices. Storage Management: Experience with storage solutions is a plus. Customer-Facing Experience: Ability to interact with clients, troubleshoot issues, and provide expert guidance. Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Electrical/Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience. English level - upper intermediate or higher.

This is your role Manage and maintain Linux-based systems for high availability and performance. Administer and optimize Kubernetes clusters, ensuring security and efficiency. Troubleshoot and resolve Kubernetes, Linux, and networking issues. Implement monitoring and logging solutions for system health and performance. Work with teams to improve infrastructure automation and deployment processes. Collaborate with clients and stakeholders, providing technical support and best practices.

We take pride in the diverse skills and character of our teams, welcoming everyone to apply and contribute to our collective strength.

PMC/OTC/Supply Chain experience

title: Technical Service Manager Brazil
description:
JinkoSolar (NYSE: JKS) is one of the world’s largest solar module manufacturers. We distribute our solar products and sell our solutions and services to a diversified international utility, commercial and residential customer based all over the world. We are expanding our team and are currently looking for a

Technical Service Manager in Brazil .

About the job Interested in joining a global number one solar company? We offer an exciting role as

Technical Service Manager

with outstanding career perspective in Sao Paulo

Position Requirements Bachelor’s degree in electrical/energy engineering; preferably master’s degree in electrical, renewable/solar energy or power generation. Proved knowledge of the PV market and the energetic laws of the region. Minimum 2 years of demonstrated experience with companies in the photovoltaic field. Ability to work in a multinational organization. Proficiency in English is a must, plus native knowledge of the local language.

Position Aim The Technical Service Manager will be responsible for all pre-sale and after-sale technical service and consultation within Brazil. The position will be part of a global team focused on managing customer onsite claims, problem solving with both internal and external customers, and communicating all technical information to the headquarters. The Technical Service Manager will be responsible for working closely with customers and the commercial teams to resolve any technical issues or doubts.

Position Responsibilities Responsible for Pre-and After-Sales technical service and consultation to all Latin American and Italy Sales Teams and Customers Technical point of contact for Production and R&D Managing Customer onsite claims, failure analysis, and problem solving in close cooperation with internal resources Contact with regional laboratories and institutes Organize and manage technical training to internal employees of the Company and external customers PV system analysis of DC and AC side, support in PV Design if required Provide support to the headquarters’ Technical Service department Work as part of a dynamic team to meet customer needs Take on ad-hoc projects as instructed by the Headquarters/company management Travel frequently to visit clients and attend exhibitions and conferences Assist other markets as needed at the request of the headquarters/company management. Provide other technical support as instructed by the headquarters/company management

title: Key Accounts Sales Manager of Latin America
description:
Company :Sungrow Hydrogen Postion: Key Accounts Sales Manager Report line: report to SUNGROW Hydrogen Latin America Head of Marketing and Sales Location: Brasil or Chile , could travel as needed.

Company Induction: As the subsidiary of Sungrow (Stock Code: 300274), Sungrow Hydrogen Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. (hereinafter Sungrow Hydrogen) specializes in water electrolysis technology for hydrogen production. Its main products include ALK electrolyzer, PEM electrolyzer, PWM hydrogen production power supply, gas-liquid separation equipment, hydrogen purification equipment and intelligent hydrogen management system. Sungrow Hydrogen is committed to providing“efficient, intelligent, safe” flexible green hydrogen production system solutions. Sungrow Hydrogen adheres to market demand orientation, and takes technological innovation as the driving force for development. It has cultivated a professional R&D team with rich experience and strong independent innovation ability, applied for more than 480 patents and copyright certificates, participated in the drafting of a number of industrial standards, mastering core technologies of flexible green hydrogen production and offshore wind hydrogen production. The company has built a leading 20MW water electrolysis hydrogen production empirical base, a product research center, a key materials research center, a Hydrogen Research Institute in Germany, and the world's leading hydroge

Main responsibilities:

As a key member of sales organization to accomplish the revenue, margin and account receivable target set on annual basis. The candidate will need to manage key accounts and maintain long-term partnership. The candidate will work with all major utilities, owner, developer, EPC, O&M customers to drive the business. The candidate will perform in business development role for potential market segment or new market. The candidate will also need to perform the following: Help to develop product marketing strategy and establish a long-term strategic partnership with key account Have strong sales ability to close deal and achieve the sales target and KPI Periodically visit key customers，and have project order contacts with leading contractors (big scale) in Hydrogen related industry Help company to gain better brand recognition by assisting trade shows and other public functions; Collect market information, including emerging market data, industry trend, product standard and competitor’s information etc. The candidate will work closely with technical team to fulfill customers’ request and timely communicate with HQ; Other assigned tasks as required.

Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years’ sales experience and 2 years’ direct sales experience in the PV and Wind energy related business. Familary with renewable energy industry in Latin America /European and have a good understanding of business culture in this area. Having a wide network with key players in renewable energy industry is perferred. Having strong ability to build up the customer’s relationship quickly is perferred. Professional in dealing with international business. Good teamwork and strong team coordination ability. Public speaking skills is a plus Excellent communication skills and team player Self-starter and continuous learner Strong passion about hydrogen industry

title: Atendente de Loja - Goiânia
description:
A Swift tem a missão de alimentar uma vida melhor através de produtos de qualidade, uma boa culinária e um atendimento amigável que ajuda a construir lembranças memoráveis na mesa dos nossos clientes. Nossa missão também se estende na vida de cada colaborador que representa a nossa marca. Aqui, cuidamos das nossas pessoas, pois acreditamos que é o nosso bem mais precioso, proporcionando um ambiente de trabalho leve e com um clima agradável, no qual todos são respeitados e valorizados, independente de raça, gênero, etnia, orientação sexual ou deficiências. Além disso, aqui na Swift, trabalhamos muito para que o nosso time cresça conosco, podendo construir uma carreira emocionante junto a nós, tendo a possibilidade de fazer a diferença.

Então, se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser e quer ajudar a construir essa história, convidamos você a fazer parte do nosso time!

Responsabilidades: O principal papel do Atendente de Loja na Swift é ser

especialista , com foco em oferecer a melhor experiência e solução para o cliente, sendo

embaixador da marca Swift .

Principais Atividades: Atendimento com foco na melhor solução para o cliente; Garantir a melhor experiência do cliente com a marca; Venda consultiva e especializada nos produtos; Operação de caixa / PDV; Recebimento e armazenamento de mercadorias; Abastecimento da loja; PVPS (FIFO): organização direcionada aos produtos que chegam primeiro e com vencimento mais próximo; Organização da câmara fria e estoque seco (alinhamento e etiquetagem); Garantir a limpeza e a organização geral da loja.

Requisitos e qualificações: Idade superior a 18 anos; Residir próximo às lojas; Disponibilidade para trabalhar aos finais de semana e feriados.

DESEJÁVEL: Ensino médio completo; Vivência de 2 anos de experiência em vendas, atendimento ao cliente; Ter atuado no segmento de varejo; Cursos em vendas ou atendimento.

O QUE ESPERAMOS DE VOCÊ:

Nossos Valores (JBS); Brilho nos olhos, alta energia e entusiasmo; Interesse pela marca e desejo por crescer com a Swift; Gostar de cozinhar e/ou fazer churrasco; Comprometimento e estabilidade na carreira; Gostar de trabalhar em equipe; Comunicar-se de forma influente; Protagonismo na vida; Ser ágil nas atividades cotidianas e inquietude; Obstinação por atingir objetivos.

Informações adicionais Aqui na Swift, oferecemos alguns benefícios que você poderá usufruir assim que iniciar a sua trajetória com a gente! Confira alguns deles abaixo

Vale-Refeição e Vale-Alimentação flexível, para usar como quiser; Vale-Transporte; Experiência Swift (mensalmente oferecemos um produto diferenciado para que todos os nossos colaboradores possam experimentar, se deliciar e aprimorar seus argumentos de venda); Acesso ao Sempre JBS (aplicativo interno): Sempre Cuida: oferece acesso gratuito para cuidar do seu bem-estar (saúde mental, física, nutricional, dentre outras); Sempre Educa: disponibiliza conteúdos de treinamentos corporativos, incentivando o seu desenvolvimento profissional; Sempre Cresce: dedicado a oportunidades de carreira no grupo JBS, para que você possa crescer com a gente! Compras na loja com repasse em folha; Parceria com o Gympass (convênio de academias); Assistência Médica/Odontológica e Seguro de vida (opcionais); Descontos em Instituições de Ensino e de Idiomas (opcional).

Vem pra cá!!
