title: Sales Manager
description:
About Libiao Robotics

Libiao Robotics is the global pioneer of intelligent sorting robots in 2016, and the world's leading supplier of flexible intelligent sorting solutions, creating the world's first portable, modular and automated unit sorting system. original robot tote handling system,The company integrates logistics automation, research and development, production and sales of intelligent equipment.

Now, Libiao's intelligent sorting system has been widely applied across various industries and scenarios, including express delivery, supermarkets, retail, shoes & garments, medicine, catering, cold storage, book publications, manufacturing, etc. In addition, over 50,000 sorting robots are running in many countries and regions such as the US, Japan, South Korea, Australia and Europe.

Responsibilities: Maintain and manage the current End-User customer relationships, and develop sales pipeline to achieve annual sales & revenue targets in the local area; Cooperate deeply with the overseas sales channels, and assisted them to formulate business plan, and build up the strong long-term relationships; Generate new business opportunities, and develop the typical customers; Collect and analyze the market trends, and feedback the demands of customers and market, and promote the development of business.

Qualifications: Bachelor degree or above, science and engineering majors and those have overseas study or work background are preferred; Two year’s or above sales or business development experience in logistics automation equipment, logistics integrators, intelligent manufacturing for local area, or those have the technical support and plan & design experiences for above industries are preferred; Strong business perception and negotiation skills, pressure resistance, and career ambition; Good communication skills, fluent in English, and adapt to overseas long-term business trips.

Corporate Culture: Vision: Make the world more efficient

Mission: Focus on flexible automation of the entire logistics process

Goal: Become leading company in logistics robot industry

title: Deployment Reliability Engineer - Inglês Avançado - Remoto
description:
Deployment Reliability Engineer, HCL Tech

(Remoto) / Deployment Reliability Engineer / Integral

Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Estamos à procura de um

Deployment Reliability Engineer

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

Seu Papel & Responsabilidades

• Continuous delivery and configuration management of the SAP Ariba Cloud products using variety of deployment tools • Continuous delivery and configuration management of the SAP Ariba Cloud products using variety of deployment tools. • Effectively and quickly respond to deployment requests, and provide overall technical support for the SAP Ariba product suite. • Work closely with subject matter experts within various Engineering teams. • Ensure user tickets and change requests are handled according to pre-defined SLA's for response time, updates, and closure. • Develop and automate manual tasks to improve day-to-day activities and scalability of timeconsuming operations. • Manage complex deployment projects – such as setting up new sites, business continuity (DR), provide guidance and recommendations to technical teams, and clearly communicate progress and issues encountered to management teams. • Certificate management, certs renewal and debugging issues. • Document standard operating procedures to effectively utilize ITIL best practices. Qualifications

Qualificações & Experiência

•

Advanced English • Experience working in a Unix environment • Experience working in a 24 x 7 enterprise environment • Experience in provisioning and managing public cloud Environment, preferably GCP and AWS • Experience in Cloud provisioning tools, preferably Terraform • Experience in CI/CD and devops tools like Jenkins, Artifactory, Docker, Vault • Development experience with Python/Go/Groovy • Triage and support system applications including but not limited to Apache, DNS, mail solutions, SSH, TCP/IP, NFS and common Internet protocols. • Excellent knowledge of operating system internals, file system structures and machine architectures in a Linux operating environment. • Experience and excellent knowledge of certificate management • Ability to write and maintain Perl/Python and Shell scripts to automate processes and enhance productivity. • Basic knowledge of Hana database administration • Experienced working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment with well-developed practices and procedures. • Outstanding interpersonal, analytical, and communication skills • Must be reliable and dependable with ability to multi-task across various functions • BA/BS degree in MIS/CS or equivalent experience • Linux/Unix • Cloud provisioning tools, preferably Terraform • CI/CD and devops tools like Jenkins, Artifactory, Docker, Vault • Development experience with Python/Go/Groovy • Triage and support system applications including but not limited to Apache, DNS, mail solutions, SSH, TCP/IP, NFS and common Internet protocols.

Por que nos escolher?

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários

Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos

Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

title: Associate Manager
description:
Introduction of Clearstate Clearstate specializes in healthcare-focused market intelligence and strategic advisory services, assisting MedTech companies, biotechnology firms and healthcare service providers in identifying and leveraging market growth opportunities. We are committed to delivering actionable strategies rooted in robust data analytics, built on the basis of market realities, empowering our clients to make informed decisions. Our mission is to provide credible, actionable and granular market insights globally, and provide value-adding advisory tailored to the needs of the MedTech sector. We are seeking highly motivated Associate Manager/ Manager to lead the development and delivery of market data solutions and custom research projects aligned with our business objectives.

Responsibilities

Project Management Lead a team of analysts in developing global market tracker solutions and custom research projects focused on healthcare market insights Define project requirements, including analytical models, research methodologies, timeline and budgets Ensure project setup, design, and delivery are aligned with client needs, providing actionable, customer-centric insights Innovate and enhance data solutions by conceptualizing new product ideas, additional analyses, and improvements Apply advanced analytical and quantitative tools to extract meaningful business insights

Content Development and Project Delivery Deliver high quality data insights with deep domain knowledge expertise in assigned sectors and regions Develop clear, actionable recommendations based on research and analysis Confidently lead client presentations, ensuring clarity and impact Serve as the client engagement lead, communicating project updates and presenting key milestones

Client and Stakeholder Engagement Collaborate with client to align on deliverables, ensuring insights meet their needs Engage effectively with various client stakeholders during project delivery and presentations Support business development and marketing initiatives by contributing content and domain expertise For Managers:

Lead, appraise and develop team members, fostering skill development and ensuring team success

Experience 5+ years in market analysis, market intelligence, or business consulting, with proven project and client management experience (preferably in healthcare or consulting)

Qualifications Bachelor’s or Masters’ degree in Science, Business or related fields MBA preferred

title: Analista de RH | FOPAG
description:
A GreenYellow é uma empresa globalmente reconhecida por sua expertise em Eficiência Energética, Energia Solar, Comercialização e Gestão de Energia. De origem francesa, a GreenYellow possui presença em oito países e já implementou mais de 3 mil projetos de Eficiência Energética ao redor do mundo, com mais de 1.400 desses projetos no Brasil, onde está presente desde 2013. Estamos em constante crescimento e inovação, com o compromisso de fornecer soluções sustentáveis e de impacto para o futuro energético.

Venha fazer parte do nosso time! Procuramos um(a) Analista de Folha de Pagamento para integrar o time de Recursos Humanos da GreenYellow no Brasil. Se você tem experiência sólida em gestão de folha de pagamento, relações trabalhistas e adora um ambiente dinâmico e desafiador, essa é a sua oportunidade!

Responsabilidades: Conferir e validar a folha de pagamento:

Garantir a precisão e acuracidade da folha de pagamento terceirizada (~150 colaboradores), realizando ajustes e correções quando necessário. Acompanhar adiantamentos salariais, 13º salário, Participação nos Lucros e Resultados (PLR) e garantir a conformidade com as políticas internas. Revisão dos encargos sociais e impostos:

Analisar e revisar os encargos sociais, assegurando que todos os aspectos fiscais estejam em conformidade com a legislação vigente. Controle de ponto eletrônico:

Gerenciar e validar os registros de ponto eletrônico, sistema flexível de horas, banco de horas e demais compensações legais. Gestão de afastamentos e licenças:

Coordenar processos de afastamento (acidente de trabalho, auxílio-doença, licença-maternidade), garantindo o correto processamento e cumprimento das obrigações legais. Controle e processamento de férias:

Organizar e processar o cálculo de férias, garantindo conformidade e cumprimento dos direitos dos colaboradores. Acompanhar os provisionamentos e otimizar o staffing cost. Gestão de admissões e rescisões:

Conferir e simular as rescisões de contratos, incluindo funcionários efetivos, temporários e estagiários. Processar admissões e homologações de forma ágil e precisa. Apoio ao jurídico em demandas trabalhistas:

Atuar como ponto de apoio na gestão de processos trabalhistas, trabalhando em conjunto com a equipe jurídica da empresa. Representar a empresa em audiências e processos trabalhistas, quando necessário, como preposto. Monitoramento de convenções coletivas:

Acompanhar e garantir que a empresa esteja em conformidade com as convenções coletivas da categoria. Controle de contratos temporários e de estágio:

Gerenciar os contratos de trabalho temporário e estagiários, garantindo a regularidade e o cumprimento de todas as normativas. Exames médicos ocupacionais:

Organizar e garantir a execução dos exames admissionais, demissionais, periódicos, e atestados médicos. Controle de crachás e identificações:

Coordenar a confecção e distribuição de crachás para os colaboradores. Acompanhamento de KPIs de folha de pagamento:

Monitorar indicadores como banco de horas, horas extras, férias, afastamentos, entre outros, realizando análises periódicas e reuniões consultivas com gerências e diretorias para identificar desvios e implementar planos de ação corretivos.

Requisitos: Experiência prévia em gestão de folha de pagamento e rotinas trabalhistas. Domínio das ferramentas de folha de pagamento e sistema de ponto eletrônico. Experiência anterior no sistema Senior será um diferencial. Conhecimento profundo da legislação trabalhista e previdenciária. Capacidade analítica para identificar desvios e propor soluções. Habilidade em comunicação para interagir com diferentes áreas e apresentar relatórios de maneira clara. Perfil organizado, proativo(a) e com forte habilidade de gestão de processos.

O que oferecemos: Ambiente inovador e desafiador, com grandes oportunidades de desenvolvimento profissional. Programa de benefícios atrativo. Oportunidade de trabalhar em uma empresa comprometida com a sustentabilidade e com o futuro energético do Brasil e do mundo.

Se você se identifica com os desafios de uma empresa global em expansão e deseja fazer parte de uma equipe comprometida com resultados e inovação, venha para a GreenYellow do Brasil!

title: Testing & commissioning Engineer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Testing and commissioning Engineer to join our dynamic team for Data Center projects in Brazil. This position demands a solid foundation in electrical engineering, particularly in testing and Commissioning power generation equipment. The ideal candidate will ensure that all equipment and systems adhere to Industry standards and regulatory requirements through thorough and safe testing processes. Responsibilities will encompass managing all aspects of testing, including Factory acceptance Tests (FAT), Site acceptance Tests (Sat), and Integrated Systems Tests (IST). The engineer should be proficient in developing and executing test plans That align with customer needs while maintaining clear communication with the factory.

Key responsibilities: Actual participation in testing and commissioning activities including FAT, SAT, and IST; Ensure adherence to industry regulations and safety standards during testing and commissioning processes; Develop and implement testing protocols to validate system functionality and performance according to customer specificity; Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to testing and commissioning; Collaborate with project teams to incorporate testing and commissioning activities into overall project plans; Preparing project documentation, including test reports, commissioning plans, and equipment manuals; Participate in project meetings and effectively communicate with stakeholders to achieve project goals.

Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field is preferred; Proven experience in testing and commissioning power generator preferred; Familiarity with industry standards and regulations related to electrical testing and commissioning (E.g., IEEE, IEC, NEC); Strong troubleshooting abilities and capacity to analyze complex electrical systems; Experience in project management or coordination is a plus; Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; Ability to work independently and as part of a team; Strong commitment to safety and quality; This position may require travel to project sites or customer locations, both locally and internationally as needed. *Please note that this is a 1 year renewable contract position*

title: ANALISTA FISCAL PL
description:
A força motriz por trás de nós é o grupo diversificado e talentoso em todo o mundo que traz sua paixão e experiência para o trabalho todos os dias. E embora sejamos uma organização verdadeiramente global, permanecemos profundamente enraizados nas comunidades em que operamos e em que nosso pessoal vive e trabalha.

Valorizamos ser inclusivos. Abraçamos e celebramos a diversidade de cada um de nossos funcionários. E com cada novo membro de nossa equipe, ficamos ainda mais fortes. Nossas estrelas estão se alinhando. Então junte-se a nossa equipe e aspire pela grandeza.

PRINCIPAIS DESAFIOS:

Atuar na equipe back office - Tax Operations, atendendo às empresas do grupo STELLANTIS. Atender a conciliação de impostos, fechamento livro fiscal, apurações estaduais, municipais e federais, obrigações acessorias e classificação fiscal dos produtos. Apuração de impostos municipais e estaduais e as respectivas obrigações acessoria (ICMS, ICMS ST, DIFAL, IPI, ISS e DAPI/GIA, SPED FISCAL); Atuar no calculo dos impostos e confecção das obrigações acessorias, providenciar o recolhimento ou compensação dos saldos devedores apurados e acompanhar junto ao financeiro a quitação dos mesmos dentro do prazo da agenda tributária;

REQUISITOS NECESSÁRIOS

Superior completo em Ciências contábeis, Administração ou Direito; Inglês nível intermediário; Conhecimento de SAP e Mastersaf; Experiência na área fiscal e/ou tributária.

Na Stellantis, avaliamos os candidatos com base em qualificações, mérito e necessidades do negócio. Acolhemos candidaturas de pessoas de todas as identidades de gênero, idade, etnia, nacionalidade, religião, orientação sexual e deficiência. Equipes diversas nos permitirão responder melhor às necessidades emergentes dos nossos clientes e cuidar do nosso futuro.

Venha fazer parte!

title: Site Readiness Engineer
description:
Pathlock is a leader in application security, access governance, and compliance automation. Our cloud-based solutions help organizations secure critical applications, mitigate risk, and enforce policies across a diverse IT landscape.

We are looking for a skilled

Site Readiness Engineer (SRE)

with experGse in CI/CD automaGon and Azure cloud technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring deployment readiness across our infrastructure, automaGng deployment processes, and maintaining opGmal site performance within our cloud environment.

Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support application deployment and infrastructure provisioning. Develop and enhance automation scripts to streamline deployment processes and minimize manual tasks. Configure, manage, and optimize cloud resources in alignment with security standards and best practices. Collaborate with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve deployment and site readiness issues. Monitor site performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement improvements to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotations to provide production deployment support and incident resolution. Create and maintain technical documentation for deployment processes, system configurations, and troubleshooting procedures. Conduct site readiness assessments and validation tests to ensure infrastructure and applications are production ready. Implement and enforce Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools such as Terraform and ARM templates. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to deployment failures, infrastructure provisioning, and application performance. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in site reliability engineering, DevOps, or similar roles Strong proficiency in CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, or similar Solid experience with Azure cloud services, including Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Database services and networking controls Hands-on experience automating deployment workflows and infrastructure provisioning Working knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or similar tools Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Python, or similar Experience with GitOps tools like ArgoCD or Flux Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Strong understanding of networking principles and Azure networking services Knowledge of security best practices for cloud environments Must be able to read and speak fluently in English Must be able to work at least some time in the US or EU time zone Preferred Qualifications Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, or Azure Administrator) Experience with monitoring tools such as , Application Insights, ELK or Grafana Experience with log aggregation and analysis tools in particular Elastic and Prometheus Understanding of high availability and disaster recovery concepts Experience with containerized applications with a Windows OS Why Join Pathlock? Opportunity to lead a cutting-edge cloud security platform. Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment. Competitive compensation, benefits, and equity options. Collaborative and inclusive company culture.

title: Android Developer
description:
Project Description: Luxoft is one of the major software services companies worldwide. In particular, we develop high-quality software in automotive industry for most famous car makers.

The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. Luxoft's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future.

Responsibilities: Software Engineer for development of Android Automotive platform services and applications

Mandatory Skills Description: Android Framework experience. Android Auto expertise. RUI development for Android Auto stack and Android Auto stack development. Proficiency in Java, JNI, Embedded C/C++ programming. Code debugging skills. Knowledge of configuration management tools and defect tracking tools.

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: Development experience on Android Auto/Linux/QNX OS. Familiarity with JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence, etc. Experience working on Qualcomm Android Platform with QNX Hypervisor (desirable). Proficiency in Android and QNX/Linux development projects. Deep expertise in developing Android Auto supported stacks. Integration experience with RemoteUI/Projection - Android Auto business logic application on Android platforms. Experience with Android 12 or later (desirable). Knowledge of Opensource Android frameworks, Android Auto plugin implementation, and porting. Competencies in software development, architecture, configuration management, integration, and validation for Realtime, embedded, concurrent applications in the automotive field.

title: Pessoa Desenvolvedora Backend C#/.Net Pleno
description:
Venha fazer parte do time Bankly!

Somos uma plataforma de tecnologia financeira e Banking as a Service (BaaS) que tem o objetivo de alavancar tecnologia e quebrar barreiras para empoderar pessoas e empresas na transformação do ecossistema financeiro.

Dá uma olhada nos desafios que te esperam como Pessoa Desenvolvedora Backend C#/.Net Pleno aqui na Bankly:

Projetar, desenvolver e manter APIs RESTful e microserviços usando .NET Core e C#. Garantir a qualidade do código por meio de revisões, testes unitários e integração contínua. Projetar e otimizar modelos de banco de dados (SQL e NoSQL) para alta performance. Trabalhar em conjunto com outras equipes (frontend, DevOps, produto) para entregar soluções integradas. Implementar soluções com foco em segurança e melhores práticas de desenvolvimento. Monitorar e solucionar problemas de performance e escalabilidade das aplicações. Participar de discussões de arquitetura e contribuir com melhorias no design do sistema.

E aí, se identificou? Agora gostaríamos de saber se você tem o perfil e os conhecimentos abaixo:

Experiência com arquitetura de microserviços e APIs RESTful. Familiaridade com práticas de CI/CD usando ferramentas como Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions ou similares. Vivência com C#, incluindo LINQ, async/await e padrões de projeto. Experiência com Entity Framework Core e/ou Dapper. Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) e experiência com bancos NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis). Conhecimento em contêineres (Docker) e orquestração (Kubernetes). Experiência com ferramentas de mensageria, como RabbitMQ e Kafka. Implementação de autenticação/autorização com OAuth, JWT ou IdentityServer. Familiaridade com testes automatizados.

Pra gente, conta como diferencial se você tiver:

Experiência em sistemas distribuídos e arquitetura orientada a eventos. Conhecimento em cloud computing (Azure, AWS ou GCP). Experiência com GraphQL.

. Experience working with Kubernetes. Experience working with Terraform and Helm Experience with Engineering best practices.

title: AI Platform Engineer
description:
We are looking for an

AI Platform Engineer

to lead the adoption, integration, and operationalization of AI tooling across our organization. This role will focus on enabling teams to work more efficiently by implementing AI-powered solutions, best practices, and MLOps strategies. The ideal candidate has

proven experience working with engineering and technology companies to drive AI adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing , ensuring AI initiatives deliver measurable impact and efficiency gains.

This role requires a combination of

technical expertise

in AI/ML infrastructure,

strategic thinking

to identify high-value AI opportunities, and

cross-functional collaboration

to help teams seamlessly integrate AI into their workflows. The AI Platform Engineer will play a key role in

automating processes, optimizing team operations, and ensuring AI solutions align with business goals .

Key Responsibilities:

AI Tooling & Infrastructure:

Design, implement, and scale AI/ML tooling that improves team efficiency, streamlines workflows, and enhances automation. MLOps Best Practices:

Help engineering teams implement effective MLOps processes, including model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Cross-Team Collaboration:

Work closely with software engineering, data science, and operations teams to integrate AI capabilities into their workflows. AI Adoption & Enablement:

Drive organization-wide adoption of AI by identifying key pain points, providing education, and ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions. Automation & Efficiency:

Develop AI-powered automation solutions to reduce manual work, improve productivity, and optimize team operations. Scalability & Performance:

Ensure AI infrastructure and workflows are scalable, resilient, and efficient to support company-wide initiatives. Security & Compliance:

Implement AI governance, security best practices, and compliance measures to align with organizational and regulatory standards. Monitoring & Evaluation:

Establish metrics and feedback loops to measure the impact of AI tooling on team efficiencies and continuously improve processes.

Qualifications:

Technical Expertise:

5+ years of experience in software engineering, MLOps, or AI infrastructure roles. Strong programming skills in Python, Go, or another relevant language. Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face. Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and AI/ML services. Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Familiarity with AI observability, monitoring, and governance tools. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Pulumi), and automation best practices.

MLOps & AI Operations:

Experience implementing MLOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring. Familiarity with vector databases, feature stores, and AI-powered search. Knowledge of distributed computing and optimizing AI workloads for efficiency. Soft Skills & Adoption Focus: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify high-impact AI solutions. Ability to work cross-functionally and communicate effectively with non-technical stakeholders. Strong ability to drive change, facilitate AI adoption, and enable teams to succeed with AI-driven processes. Passion for AI automation, operational efficiency, and developer experience.

Success Metrics for This Role:

Adoption Rate:

Increase in AI tooling adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing teams. Efficiency Gains:

Measurable reductions in manual effort and time spent on repetitive tasks. MLOps Maturity:

Improved model deployment velocity and reliability through MLOps best practices. Developer Productivity:

Reduction in friction for AI-enabled engineering teams. Feedback & Iteration:

Continuous improvement based on team feedback and usage metrics.

Please answer the questions in detail in the given link to move forward with the screening process.

Answer the questions

title: Manager, Renewals LATAM
description:
Our Mission At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission: Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life. Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are. Who We Are We take our mission of protecting the digital way of life seriously. We are relentless in protecting our customers and we believe that the unique ideas of every member of our team contributes to our collective success. Our values were crowdsourced by employees and are brought to life through each of us everyday - from disruptive innovation and collaboration, to execution. From showing up for each other with integrity to creating an environment where we all feel included. As a member of our team, you will be shaping the future of cybersecurity. We work fast, value ongoing learning, and we respect each employee as a unique individual. Knowing we all have different needs, our development and personal wellbeing programs are designed to give you choice in how you are supported. This includes our FLEXBenefits wellbeing spending account with over 1,000 eligible items selected by employees, our mental and financial health resources, and our personalized learning opportunities - just to name a few! At Palo Alto Networks, we believe in the power of collaboration and value in-person interactions. This is why our employees generally work full time from our office with flexibility offered where needed. This setup fosters casual conversations, problem-solving, and trusted relationships. Our goal is to create an environment where we all win with precision. Job Description Your Career Palo Alto Networks is scaling its world-class strategy organization and looking for Team Manager in the area of security services. Though our security services are successful both in the market as well as at preventing attackers, the landscape is continually changing and in need of innovation leadership. The Palo Alto Networks Strategy function is a focused team that works on our most mission-critical business challenges to drive and support our industry-leading growth. As a Manager, of the renewals Team, your efforts will directly impact the overall strategy and success of a world-leading cybersecurity business. You will collaborate on complex business and technology problems that are top-of-mind for our executives, particularly as those relate to key partnerships having strategic value to the business. You will lead initiatives with stakeholders to formulate mutually beneficial and measurable outcomes for technical and business objectives with strategic partners. You possess a unique blend of business insight, business strategy experience, big-picture thinking, influencing skills and ability to collaborate with a large number of constituents within Palo Alto Networks. Your Impact Manage the overall day to day renewal operations of assigned direct reports and districts / regions in the LATAM regions Motivate your direct reports to drive pipeline development and revenues through renewal sales efforts leveraging the partner network Ability to accurately forecast to leadership teams and drive a committed number on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis to SR. Manager and VP Coaching and development of subordinates, bi-weekly 121's Supervise and assist direct reports on large deals through to completion Evaluate, and document, your direct reports based on Key Metrics and goals set by Leadership Monitor the outbound efforts of assigned you renewals reps by tracking and reporting weekly activities Collaborate with Sales Leaders to identify strategies to achieve sales goals and uncover new, high value opportunities alongside renewals Provide accurate, ongoing reporting through the continuous update and maintenance of necessary reports in Salesforce.com and other tools and applications Provide support for renewal escalations and your assigned districts

Qualifications Your Experience At least 3+ years experience in Managing diverse enterprise renewals /sales teams At least 3+ years experience in leading 8-15 people, in the office and remote work environments At least 3+ years Experience in hiring, developing and retaining talent Proven Experience with channel /partner sales models renewals/ upsells Proven to consistently achieve renewal/ sales team goals through your leadership Proven ability to learn new technology quickly, as well as adapt to changing needs Excellent communication skills - the ability to build cross-functional relationships Strong organizational and analytical skills - the ability to work on many projects concurrently Excellent Microsoft Excel, Google Suite and Salesforce.com skills

Additional Information The Team Palo Alto Networks has brought technology to market that is reshaping the cybersecurity threat and protection landscape. Our ability to protect digital transactions is limited only by our ability to establish relationships with our potential customers and help them understand how our products can protect their environments. This is where our sales teams come in. Our sales team members work hand-in-hand with large organizations to keep their digital information safe. Our passionate sales teams educate, inspire, and empower our potential clients. As part of our sales team, you are empowered with unmatched systems and tools, constantly updated research and sales libraries, and a team built on joint success. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our sales team, you are driven by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredibly complex cyberthreats. You’re an amazing salesperson – you’re just looking for something more substantial and challenging as your next step. Our Commitment We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together. We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics. All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Analista de Modelagem Hidráulica Pleno
description:
A Aegea Criada em 2010, a Aegea é líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Em cada município onde atua, leva mais saúde e qualidade de vida para a população, respeitando sempre o meio ambiente e a cultura local.

Programa Respeito dá o Tom O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa. Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030, sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.

A Aegea tem o compromisso com a promoção de um ambiente de trabalho mais igualitário, diverso e inclusivo, e estimula o respeito e a valorização das diferenças. Aqui, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados no processo seletivo, independentemente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, naturalidade, nacionalidade, deficiência, idade ou outras características. Responsabilidades e atribuições

Apoiar na análise e modelagem hidráulica de sistemas de abastecimento de água e esgotamento sanitário Realizar a análise crítica de dados, como medições de vazão e pressão, propondo melhorias nos processos e avaliando riscos Participar de estudos de viabilidade técnica e econômica em projetos de infraestrutura para saneamento básico Colaborar na elaboração de documentação técnica e validar estudos realizados por terceiros Apoiar a implementação de sistemas de monitoramento e controle para otimização do desempenho de redes de água e esgoto Interpretar normas e regulamentações, assegurando conformidade em projetos e operações Contribuir em reuniões técnicas, interagindo com equipes diversas e participando de discussões para a solução de problemas

Requisitos e qualificações

Superior completo em Engenharia Civil, Sanitária, Ambiental, Tecnólogo em Hidráulica e Saneamento, Gestão Ambiental ou áreas correlatas Vivência em modelagem hidráulica, utilizando softwares como Watercad, Sewercad, Bentley ou Epanet, entre outros Conhecimento intermediário/avançado em Excel, com foco em construção e análise de dados Conhecimento básico em GIS Disponibilidade para viagens pontuais em todas as unidades da Aegea

Informações adicionais

Assistência médica; Assistência odontológica; Zenklub (atendimento direcionado à saúde mental e nutricional); Serviço de assistência gratuito (social, jurídico e financeiro); Seguro de vida; Vale transporte; Gympass; Vale alimentação e/ou refeição; Participação nos Lucros e Resultados; Kit office.

title: Android Developer
description:
Project Description: Luxoft is one of the major software services companies worldwide. In particular, we develop high-quality software in automotive industry for most famous car makers.

The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. Luxoft's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future.

Responsibilities: Software Engineer for development of Android Automotive platform services and applications

Mandatory Skills Description: Android Framework experience. Android Auto expertise. RUI development for Android Auto stack and Android Auto stack development. Proficiency in Java, JNI, Embedded C/C++ programming. Code debugging skills. Knowledge of configuration management tools and defect tracking tools.

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: Development experience on Android Auto/Linux/QNX OS. Familiarity with JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence, etc. Experience working on Qualcomm Android Platform with QNX Hypervisor (desirable). Proficiency in Android and QNX/Linux development projects. Deep expertise in developing Android Auto supported stacks. Integration experience with RemoteUI/Projection - Android Auto business logic application on Android platforms. Experience with Android 12 or later (desirable). Knowledge of Opensource Android frameworks, Android Auto plugin implementation, and porting. Competencies in software development, architecture, configuration management, integration, and validation for Realtime, embedded, concurrent applications in the automotive field.

title: Técnico em compressor de ar
description: Responsabilidades e Atividades Diárias: Atendimento ao Cliente: Visitar clientes industriais de diversos portes para realizar manutenções e reparos em compressores de ar parafuso. Diagnosticar e solucionar problemas técnicos de forma eficiente e precisa. Fornecer suporte técnico e orientação aos clientes sobre o uso e manutenção dos equipamentos. Manter a comunicação clara e eficaz com os clientes, informando sobre o andamento dos serviços e fornecendo relatórios detalhados. Manutenção e Reparos: Realizar manutenções preventivas, incluindo inspeções, lubrificação, troca de filtros e ajustes. Executar manutenções corretivas, diagnosticando falhas, substituindo peças e realizando reparos. Realizar testes de funcionamento e ajustes finais para garantir o desempenho adequado dos equipamentos. Realizar a montagem e desmontagem de compressores de ar parafuso. Outras Atividades: Manter o veículo da empresa em boas condições, realizando inspeções e manutenções básicas. Preencher relatórios de serviço e documentação técnica de forma precisa e organizada. Participar de treinamentos e atualizações técnicas para aprimorar conhecimentos e habilidades. Trabalhar em conformidade com as normas de segurança e procedimentos da empresa. Competências Necessárias: Experiência Comprovada: Experiência mínima de (definir tempo) anos na manutenção de compressores de ar parafuso. Conhecimento técnico em sistemas de ar comprimido, hidráulica e elétrica. Habilidades Técnicas: Capacidade de diagnosticar e solucionar problemas técnicos complexos. Habilidade em realizar manutenções preventivas e corretivas de forma eficiente. Conhecimento em leitura e interpretação de diagramas técnicos. Habilidades Interpessoais: Excelente comunicação verbal e escrita. Capacidade de lidar com clientes de forma profissional e cortês. Habilidade em trabalhar em equipe e colaborar com outros técnicos. Capacidade de resolução de problemas e tomada de decisões. Outras Competências: CNH B válida. Disponibilidade para viagens e atendimento a clientes em diferentes localidades. Organização e atenção aos detalhes. Compromisso com a segurança e qualidade do trabalho. Diferenciais: Certificações em manutenção de compressores de ar parafuso. Conhecimento em sistemas de controle e automação de compressores. Experiência em empresas de grande port

title: Especialista de Desenvolvimento II - Devops
description:
Descrição da vaga Buscamos um especialista de desenvolvimento DevOps um profissional híbrido que atue na ponte entre o desenvolvimento de software e as operações de infraestrutura. Sua principal missão será a criação de novas arquiteturas digitais, principalmente na cloud Azure, baseada nas conversas com o cliente. Automatizar e otimizar os processos de desenvolvimento, entrega e operação de aplicações, garantindo agilidade, qualidade, estabilidade e escalabilidade. Responsabilidades e atribuições - DevOps, CI/CD, automação, infraestrutura, cloud Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform. - Ferramentas: Experiência com ferramentas como Git, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, e sistemas de configuração como Puppet ou Chef. - Linguagens de Programação: Conhecimento em linguagens como Python, Bash, PowerShell, e outras utilizadas para automação. - Cloud Computing: Experiência comprovada em uma das principais plataformas de cloud computing: Azure - Sistemas Operacionais: Conhecimento em Linux e Windows. - DevOps: Conhecimento dos princípios e práticas do DevOps. - Automação: Criar e manter scripts e ferramentas para automatizar tarefas repetitivas, como provisionamento de servidores, configuração de ambientes, deployment de aplicações e testes. - Infraestrutura: Gerenciar e configurar ambientes de desenvolvimento, testes e produção, utilizando tecnologias como cloud computing (Azure), containers (Docker, Kubernetes), e sistemas de virtualização. - Integração Contínua (CI): Implementar e manter pipelines de CI/CD para automatizar a construção, teste e deploy de software. - Entrega Contínua (CD): Garantir a entrega rápida e confiável de software para produção. Requisitos e qualificações - Mentalidade de resolução de problemas: Capacidade de identificar e resolver problemas de forma rápida e eficiente. - Foco em resultados: Comprometimento em entregar resultados de alta qualidade e superar expectativas. - Proatividade: Busca contínua por melhorias e otimização dos processos. - Colaboração: Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe, boa comunicação e construir relacionamentos fortes. - Aprendizado contínuo: Disposição para aprender novas tecnologias e ferramentas.

Certificação Obrigatória:

Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate Certificação desejável: Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert Informações adicionais O que oferecemos para você? ✔Vale Refeição ou Alimentação; ✔Assistência médica e Odontológica; ✔Convênio Farmácia (descontos na compra de medicamentos); ✔Seguro de Vida; ✔Convênio Academia; ✔TIVIT Club (descontos e parcerias com as melhores lojas); ✔PAC - Programa de aceleração de carreira; ✔Reembolso para certificações; ✔MOBIFLIX – Nossa academia corporativa tem cursos presenciais e online, alinhados as novas tendências do mercado de tecnologia; ✔Plataforma online de crédito consignado, a TIVIT te ajuda a realizar os seus objetivos pessoais como reforma no seu apê/casa, financiar estudos e quitar dívidas, de acordo com as regras e políticas da cia; ✔Programa de Apoio Pessoal com orientação psicológica, financeira e jurídica em parceria com a Alelo.

Acreditamos que o presente é plural e a inclusão transforma, por isso, todas as pessoas são bem-vindas em nossas vagas, para promovermos um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo, de respeito, justiça e equidade.

title: KCF & RR facilitation senior
description:
Are you our new colleague? We’re looking for a KCF & RR facilitation senior at Randstad Global Sao Paolo , Brasil , hybrid, fulltime

BR&AF The business risk and audit function (BR&AF) provides assurance and recommendations to the Executive Board and the Audit Committee on Randstad Group’s (risk) management, control and governance practices. Therefore the department facilitates in setting governance standards. It provides advice on internal control improvements, it conducts audits, special investigations and assignments worldwide on request of the Executive Board and Audit Committee. BR&AF’s responsibility includes the quarterly reporting based on: the risk and internal control self assessments, audit results, discussions on internal control weaknesses and analysis of the key risks reported throughout the company's management structure. This also substantiates the Group’s in-control statements. The global function consists of team members operating through hubs spread over 4 continents. The team is organized in a matrix consisting of control & audit focus teams on business and functional areas (e.g. digital, talent, client, back office & shared service centers and fraud & forensics) and partners that are the linking pin to operating units (business risk & audit partners) with a global view. A support group is set up for professional practice, learning & development, quality improvement & methods, analytics and PMO. Representatives of the different groups (Focus teams, BR&A Partners and support group) form the BR&AF core management team that reports to the Managing Director BR&AF.

how you will contribute You are part of the Business Risk & Audit Function (BR&AF) that covers all business operations related to Clients, Talents and our (shared) Back-, Mid- and Front offices, as well as our Accounting & Reporting and other specialist functions like HR. With your interpersonal and project support skills you are a key enabler of the operational success of the function.

As KCF & RR facilitation senior you: coordinate and facilitate the operational execution of the management control framework management self assessment process coordinate and facilitate the operational execution of ongoing enterprise risk assessment activities. enable reporting for both enterprise risk assessments as well as management control framework assessment results are willing to travel. As the standard office locations for the BR&AF team are organized in hubs, like in the country mentioned, travelling is estimated to be about 20% to 30% of the job.

what you will be doing In your role as KCF and RR facilitator you: technically enable and support the execution of internal control framework (KCF) self assessment and enterprise risk management as part of a wider GRC support team ensure data quality checks are in place and data is consolidated in support of integrated analytics initiatives support integrated analyses and reporting by designing and rolling out new analytical concepts and reports support the day to day operations of GRC (audit, risk, control) and analytics tooling support projects that are aimed to further automated key BR&AF processes

who will you work with MD BR&AF BR&AF MT business risk & audit Partners focus team teams control assessors throughout the company

what you will bring Your hands-on and in-depth understanding of supporting and managing global operations in combination with a lean way of thinking translates into a service oriented approach in which you bring effectiveness, efficiency and positive client experience together. You constantly seek ways to reduce workloads yet increase the value creation. you are vocal on the different clients of the processes you operate and you actively try to find a balance in optimizing the experience for all.

As a KCF & RR facilitation senior you: have minimum 3-5 years of relevant experience have college or university degree or the equivalent work experience have level BEC B1/B2 or higher Business English have a strong independent mindset are experienced in international stakeholder management & change are an innovative thinker that challenges the status quo have an agile and flexible working style and passion being the "spider in the web" and getting things done define a pragmatic, realistic yet ambitious vision on planning the staff members and getting all projects and audits done deliver full usages of all team members by coordinating their planning that is updated frequently ensuring people are timely informed and ready to start their assignments. work with people and engage them on the job ahead effectively connect and take people with different backgrounds allowing cross functional experts to take ownership of initiatives and projects.

your competencies Within Randstad we defined the following Leadership competencies: delighting people: connect people (client, talent, employee, society), building strong client relationships and delivering client-centric solutions. performing today: resourcefulness securing and developing resources effectively and efficiently. leading change: manages ambiguity operating effectively, even when things are not certain or the way forward is not clear. securing the future: drives vision and purpose painting a compelling picture of the vision and strategy that motivates others into action. creating clarity - showing line of sight: making sense of complex, high quantity and sometimes contradictory information to effectively solve problems and provides direction, is delegating and removing obstacles to get work done courage to challenge: shows courage and confidence to speak up skillfully, challenging others even when they are confronted with resistance or unfamiliar circumstances collaborates, reaches out, you excel in organizational sensitivity: maneuvering comfortably through complex policy, process and people-related organizational dynamics recognizing the value that different perspectives and cultures bring to an organization

what’s in it for you We put people at the heart of everything we do. Our employment conditions reflect this and are in accordance with the applicable (local) Randstad employment policies and related personnel guide. We want our teams and talent to reflect the rich diversity of the societies we serve. We thrive for an environment of belonging, safety and confidence. So everyone can bring their whole selves to work and flourish. Learn more about equity, diversity, inclusion and belonging at randstad here. If you recognize yourself in the profile above, we invite you to apply for this role.

people at the heart of everything we do Working at Randstad is unlike working at any organization. Because at Randstad we put people at the heart of everything we do. This goes for our clients, our talent, our employees and society. We combine our passion for people with the power of today’s technologies. This helps us support people and organizations in realizing their true potential. Learn more about our mission, history and values on our website: more information you can reach out to our recruitment business partner:



The recruitment procedure consists of a screening and at least two interviews. Later in the process, an (online) assessment and a job offer conversation take place.

title: Lead Software Developer - React Native
description:
Project Description: Our Client is one of the largest TV providers in North America and we are searching for a Lead Software Developer (Team Lead) to lead our Delivery Team. The project focuses on developing a mobile application for a video streaming platform.

Responsibilities: You will be implementing new features and enhancing existing functionalities on client applications to support streaming video products. This includes estimation, design, development, testing, and documentation. Lead the Software Engineering Team and collaborate with product managers, and architects in a cross-functional environment to ensure functions and performance meet customer requirements in a cost-effective and maintainable way. Provide on-call support including monitoring, triaging and resolving production issues

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: - Experience with a CICD development environment

Languages: English: C1 Advanced

title: Azure Cloud/Platform Engineer
description:
We're excited to announce an opening for an

Azure Cloud/Platform Engineer

to join our team. This position is fully remote and available to candidates in

Brazil .

Role Overview As an Azure Cloud/Platform Engineer, you will play a critical role in our cloud migration projects. Your focus will be on not only deployment but also architectural and infrastructure management. A strong understanding of

Terraform

and its deployment using

Azure DevOps

pipelines is essential for success in this position.

Key Responsibilities Design, deploy, and manage Azure cloud solutions. Lead cloud migration efforts, ensuring seamless transitions to Azure. Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize cloud architecture and networking setups. Automate CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps for efficient deployment processes.

Key Requirements 5-7+ years of experience in Azure cloud and platform engineering. Proficient in Terraform with a solid background in Azure Networking. Experience with Azure DevOps and CI/CD pipeline automation. Proven track record of managing complex networking configurations.

Nice to Have Knowledge of Azure Virtual WAN and Secure WAN technologies.

If you are passionate about cloud technology and have a desire to work in a dynamic environment, we would love to hear from you! Please apply with your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience.

Manter-se atualizado com as últimas tendências do setor, atualizações das plataformas e melhores práticas. Requisitos:

Mais de 5 anos de experiência

em publicidade digital, especialmente em marketing de performance. Histórico comprovado de gestão de

campanhas de alto orçamento

em uma grande

agência de publicidade . Forte conhecimento do

Facebook Ads Manager, Google Ads e estratégias de mídia paga . Experiência no

processamento mensal de faturas e reconciliação financeira . Excelentes habilidades analíticas, com capacidade de interpretar dados e otimizar campanhas. Habilidades organizacionais e de gerenciamento de projetos. Compensação e Benefícios:

Salário: US$ 7.000 - US$ 9.000 por mês , dependendo da experiência. Oportunidades de crescimento profissional em um ambiente dinâmico. Modalidade de trabalho flexível.

title: Associada
description:
Quem somos?

Ao longo desses 20 anos nossa equipe traz entendimento, técnicas e postura estratégica impecáveis, fruto da paixão pelo direito e pelos seus impactos na vida das empresas que sempre estão diante de grandes desafios de gestão.

Sobre a Vaga

Estamos procurando um(a) advogado(a) que atue na fase de execução judicial ou extrajudicial

para se juntar ao nosso time. Trata-se de uma vaga para atuação, com clientes na fase de execução, cuja remuneração inicial é de R$3.000,00. Exigimos que esteja disponível durante o horário comercial, inclusive para realização de audiências. A atuação é majoritariamente no judicial (confecção de pecas, cumprimento de prazos).

Requisitos

- Dominar o direito material e processual na faze de execução; - Ser responsável, disciplinado e organizado; - Ter proatividade e postura ética; - Saber gerenciar o tempo com senso de urgência e lidar com pessoas; - Saber se comunicar adequadamente com todos em sua volta (advogados e cliente); - Ter vontade de aprender continuamente; - Saber respeitar o crescimento na carreira, de acordo com acúmulo de atribuições, dentro do escritório.

Principais atividades:

- Atendimento aos clientes, com elaboração de relatórios periódicos, focados nos resultados esperados pelo escritório; - Controlar prazos e acompanhar eventuais processos; - Realizar atendimentos presenciais, bem como por videoconferência; - Dominar as ferramentas de trabalho do escritório (rede interna; work flow; Sistema integrado de gestão; fluxo operacional; etc.); - Incorporar a utilização do sistema jurídico, zelando pela constante atualização e manutenção do mesmo; - Elaborar peças processuais (elaborando as teses, quando necessárias) e defesas administrativas; - Trabalhar de maneira colaboradora, auxiliando com qualquer coisa que precisar ser feita; - Seguir procedimentos e rotinas para atingir o cumprimento das atividades; - Realizar análise minunciosa dos documentos relacionados as demandas solicitadas; - Realizar análise minunciosa dos históricos relacionados as demandas solicitadas; - Manter a documentação suficientemente em ordem no DRIVE e sistema do escritório para que os demais tenham condições de examinar e reportar dados; - Informar continuamente como está procedendo quanto aos prazos e tarefas; - Solicitar assessoria/ajuda de colegas mais experientes caso uma situação fora de seu domínio possa surgir; - Solicitar e aceitar feedback sobre o próprio desempenho no trabalho; - Assumir e aprender novas habilidades; - Interagir com os demais de forma respeitosa, paciente, tolerante e compreensiva; - Ter total atenção com a escrita, formal e informal, principalmente para não cometer erros de português e gramaticais; - Produzir comunicação clara e articulada, tanto escrita, quanto falada, com foco em passar segurança ao cliente, superior e/ou sócio.

Preencher o forms abaixo:

title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Currently, we are looking for a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer who will be a part of the general-purpose data science core team and work with tasks covering a wide variety of business needs with a soft focus on NLP or CV applications. In this position, you will work with multiple data sources (usually textual, numerical and time-related data), huge and small datasets to develop, validate and deploy machine learning models, tune their performance & integrate them into data processing pipelines. Responsibilities: Deal with both structured and unstructured data, collaborate with data engineers on defining data storage formats, state data collection requirements; Not only solve technical tasks but understand business needs and offer appropriate solutions, describe a chosen approach to non-technical people; Set up reproducible experiments: selection, training, validation and optimization of machine learning models, evaluation of their quality in business-related terms; Integrate data preprocessing and model inference into general data processing pipelines; Research new tools, papers, etc. in the machine learning area. Requirements: Strong knowledge and deep understanding of Сlassical machine learning (linear models, decision trees, ensembles for classification and regression tasks, clustering and dimensionality reduction) Main concepts and stages of the modelling process (validation scheme, regularization, overfitting and generalization, data leaks, feature selection, etc.) Experience with Python scientific, visualization and ML-related libraries (numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, etc.) Experience with different clustering techniques Experience with classic NLP tools and techniques (nltk, spacy, n-grams, skip-grams, TF-IDF, tokenizers, lemmatization, dependencies parsing, etc.) Experience with NN frameworks, NLP-related architectures and libraries (Pytorch / Tensorflow, HuggingFace, fasttext, flair, sentence transformersWord2Vec, ElMo, RNN, CNN, Transformer, BERT, etc.) Experience in tuning pre-trained models for different NLP tasks Good Python programming skills Good spoken and written English (at least B1) Ability and desire to convert raw business requests into strictly formulated machine learning tasks Ability to formulate data gathering (or data labelling) requirements Minimum 2-year experience in machine learning

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

What you’ll Do ● Move fast while balancing quality. We can’t afford extensive processes, and we also can’t afford show-stopping bugs. We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. What we’re looking for ● 4+ years mobile development experience with multiple parts of the iOS stack. We develop with Swift. Experience with Combine or RxSwift is strongly preferred. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: SAP Data Migration Lead Consultant
description:
ABOUT US Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.

Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators .

Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

The ROLE We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients across the globe. As a lead data migration consultant at Syniti, you will be responsible for managing a team of migration consultants on all aspects of data work for a process area/workstream. You will work closely with functional consultants and key customer resources, gathering requirements through workshops, building conversion objects, and driving your team’s value through all data project phases. You will be responsible for making sure that your team uses your data skills and the Syniti data management platform to assess and iterate through design, build, and deployment, ensuring that the highest customer value is derived from your assigned objects. As a lead member of a Syniti Data Migration team, you will execute against the best practices for successful business transformation and become skilled in the strongest platform to meet all of our customer’s needs.

WHAT YOU WILL DO After an initial training period, a Lead Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:

Demonstrate a strong understanding of Syniti’s Data Migration methodology. Demonstrate strong proficiency in Syniti’s tools, working to prescribed development standards. Good understanding of business processes for one or more assigned functional area, and the ability to quickly learn about new areas. Effectively manage a small team of data migration consultants, to meet assigned responsibilities against the overall project plan. Demonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process area. Develop data migration rules and reports in the Syniti’s tools as per supplied specification. Evaluate and contribute to ongoing data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site Syniti and client colleagues. Create and maintain data load programs. Maintain related documentation and clearly communicate status to Syniti Team Leadership and customer PMO. Execution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliations. Support and mentor junior colleagues.

WHAT IT TAKES Degree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field). Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data Analysis. Experience managing resources to deliver a collective goal/responsibility. Functional ERP experience. Project experience across multiple ERP implementations. Database experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc. Customer facing skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Willingness to travel according to project requirements up to 100%.

WHAT WE OFFER Autonomy and Trust:

Trust that you are proficient at what you do. At Syniti, you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, with minimal micromanagement. Growth Opportunities:

We are growing rapidly, offering you the chance to grow with us, shape our journey, and share in our success story. Collaborative Support:

We value collaboration and support each other, ensuring you won't stand alone in your endeavors. Diversity of Stories:

Genuine interest in your unique story and journey. We celebrate individual achievements and want to hear everyone's story. Recognition:

We appreciate and celebrate individual achievements, acknowledging the contribution of each team member. Open Organization:

We embrace an open and inclusive culture, where hierarchies are minimized, and access is ensured across the board. Everyone is valued, and ideas are welcomed.

title: Electrical BIM Engineer
description:
Exciting Opportunity for Electrical BIM Engineers, Modelers, and Managers! Join Our Team Today!

Are you looking to take your career to the next level by working on some of the largest projects in the USA? Our dynamic team is seeking a talented individual who is eager to contribute to a rapidly growing business based out of NYC.

Responsibilities: Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to develop BIM models for electrical systems within building projects. Utilize BIM software (such as Revit, AutoCAD MEP, Navisworks) to design and coordinate electrical systems effectively. Conduct clash detection and resolution to ensure seamless integration of electrical components with other building systems. Generate accurate quantity take-offs, schedules, and reports from BIM models. Stay updated on industry standards and best practices related to BIM and electrical engineering. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or related field. Proven experience minimum of 4 years working as a BIM Modeler/Engineer. Proficiency in BIM software, including Revit, AutoCAD MEP, and Navisworks. Strong understanding of electrical systems design and installation. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Understanding of Electrical power distribution systems. Experience with large infrastructure including Hospitals, Data Centers, Manufacturing Facilities, Water Treatment Plants, Commercial, and Residential High-Rise Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to be part of a forward-thinking team that is shaping the future of engineering and working on some of the largest projects in the US.

Join us as we pave the way for a brighter, more efficient future in electrical engineering! #ElectricalBIMEngineer #EngineeringJobs #JoinOurTeam.

title: Digital Designer
description:
The Position The main focus of this role is to design ads and landing pages to lift the brand design of our clients. You’ll execute storyboards from creative strategists while bringing in art direction and best practices from across the web and social. The goal of the role is to design high-quality digital assets in a fast-paced environment to improve client ROAS goals.

The ideal candidate for this position will have a portfolio featuring multiple examples of social ads, web design, and will be able to demonstrate a strong understanding of the latest digital trends and emerging technologies.

Required Skills A dynamic portfolio showcasing strengths in typography, design, visual storytelling, campaign concept creation, and art direction across all mediums Strong understanding of Figma and Adobe CS Exceptional art direction and typography skills Work collaboratively on teams to develop creative solutions Incredibly detail-oriented Open and receptive to creative direction and design feedback Someone who works backward on a problem before moving forward towards a solution Understanding of leading social platforms and the responsive web Experience working with eCommerce and DTC brands

Responsibilities Work with creative briefs to design social ads for performance advertising Manage the art direction for multiple clients by building out digital assets, templates, and inspiration boards Work on multiple clients' ad creatives each week to build out extensive libraries for each funnel stage Lead the design of responsive landing pages Driven by details. You’re meticulous, thorough and enjoy being precise

Company Overview Lilo Social is a growth marketing agency focused on full-funnel marketing delivering best-in-class paid media and creative services for a wide range of eCommerce brands focused on scaling. We work across the entire life-cycle of the customer journey covering content creation, ad production, paid media, conversion rate optimization, and email/sms marketing. Select clients include Cheribundi, BAUER, Bearaby, and many more.

title: Pessoa Coordenadora de Design
description:
Prazer, Somos o

Grupo SBF . Para nós, esporte é mais que só a prática: é movimento. Ele tem o poder de mover as pessoas pelo exercício, pela paixão pelo time do coração, pela diversão de uma aula de dança, pela força de marcas icônicas. Por vermos a potência do esporte em todas as suas expressões, trabalhamos juntos com garra e energia para construir o primeiro ecossistema de esporte do mundo, reunindo diversas possibilidades para que as pessoas sejam envolvidas e impactadas pelo poder de se movimentar. Quando você pensar em esporte, pode ter certeza: o Grupo SBF estará ali. Seja por meio das lojas e do e-commerce da Centauro, a maior varejista esportiva multimarcas da América Latina; da Fisia, distribuidora oficial da Nike no Brasil, da FitDance, da NWB, do Studio 7.8, da OneFan e da X3M, aqui o movimento não para. Praticante ou entusiasta, fã ou apaixonado: o Grupo SBF é pra você. Somos saudavelmente inconformados, fazedores e convictos da importância de levar o movimento para cada vez mais gente. Se você se move por esporte, ou é movido por ele, temos um convite: que tal também trabalhar por ele? Ficou interessado(a)? Vem saber mais!

Missão:

Responsável por traduzir as necessidades e objetivos da marca em soluções criativas que impactem positivamente a experiência do usuário e a comunicação da empresa.

Como Pessoa Coordenadora de Design, você entrará em campo com as seguintes estratégias de jogo: Responsabilidades e Atribuições: Coordenar a equipe de design no desenvolvimento das demandas de artes dos departamentos; Trabalhar em conjunto com os times de marketing, planejamento e conteúdo para o desenvolvimento de artes alinhadas com o objetivo da empresa e de cada projeto; Atuar na construção de identidade visual das propriedades e projetos da empresa, garantindo que todos os elementos de design sejam alinhados com a estratégia de marketing e com as expectativas do público-alvo. O que Buscamos: Formação em Marketing, Publicidade, Comunicação ou áreas relacionadas; Experiência comprovada em design e branding e identidade visual; Criatividade e visão estratégica; Excelente comunicação verbal e escrita; Conhecimento de softwares de criação (como Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator e outros) e Google Slides.
